Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Its not always a good deal
Review: I absolutely love Carol's Daughter products, my multi cultural family and I have used the black vanilla, milk and almond products for over two years.  With this gift set I saved over $8 and considered buying more however I would have paid full price rather than what I received.  The shampoo I received is separated, after trying to shake and move shampoo around in the bottle it did nothing but loosen the material on the bottom of the bottle.  I will try to actually mix it up to see what happens.  It feels like old product was put in a set and reduced in price, sold as a gift.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: USE CAUTION!!!
Review: The scent was amazing!! Amazing enough to trick me into using this product for much longer than I should’ve. This was the WORST for my natural 3b/3c hair. It left my hair EXTREMELY tangled! Naïvely i continued use thinking my hair was the problem. Then after a few weeks (I wash only once a week) i noticed my scalp began to flake! I mean SNOWING! I’ve never had that problem before using this product.I’ve switched shampoo and after the first wash my hair and scalp instantly feel and look much better.Just a heads up, if you notice extreme knitting or tangling, TRUST ME it won’t get better. STOP using this product immediately!On the other hand it may work for you, but it was the worst decision of my natural hairs life!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Superior Products That Work Immediately!
Review: Excellent product! Before using this combination of shampoo and conditioner, my hair was extremely dry, brittle, as a result, I had flaking due to dandruff. However, after the first use, all of the aforementioned issues have been totally fixed! I was hesitant to try this, because I'm a man, but they work perfectly, and smells awesome, too! Also, the hair honey Mimosa, in conjunction with the shampoo and conditioner exceeded my expectations -- highly recommend!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Absolute Love
Review: I just happened to try a sample pouch of these last week and just loved how it made my hair feel and look.  I ordered these 2 days ago and they came today in a beautiful package. I am super excited about long term results on my long Asian hair. Will be adding before/after pictures soon :)I did a home keratin treatment about 2 months ago and since then I have been trying to find affordable brands for shampoos and conditioners that are sulfate-free. I think I finally found 1 that I like. It has the most beautiful natural smell I have ever seen in any hair product. I do recommend checking out their website for tutorials and other stuff.Thank You for creating products without harmful chemicals <3

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: smells amazing.
Review: The lid on the shampoo bottle was not on tight, resulting in a lot of spilled shampoo before I ever got it. Have had a chance to actually use it. As as mentioned on another review, the dark "stuff" in the bottle really does not want to mix into the shampoo. I finally dumped it all into a bowl and used a wire whisk to incorporate it. Time will tell if it stays mixed. Before I did that, huge amounts of the dark matter in the bottle was trying to come out. It does smell amazing. Does not work a rich lather, but lather does not actually clean hair. It did rinse well, and I followed with the conditioner. Rinsed out with cool water. Hair did not feel conditioned as I am used to, but again, time will tell with results.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It made my scap itch
Review: I had such high Hope's for this product, especially how bad people were racing about it. I HATE it. What a waste of money ☹. It has a weird muted vanilla smell, chemically. It leaves your hair really really dry! It was awful, my poor hair dried like hay. For w.e reason this product made my scap so itchy and sensitive. Idk how or why but it did. I have washed my hair 4 times with it so far and I just hate how mybhair is looking, it's just so dry and not happy. I was sad my hair and scalp didnt appreciate this product the way everyone else's hair has, bit it was just a no from me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: This is probably the BEST smelling shampoo/conditioner I’ve ever used
Review: This is probably the BEST smelling shampoo/conditioner I’ve ever used. The shampoo is rather thick, which means that just a little can go a long long ways. There’s also a very clean feeling left on your hair & scalp after using this combo for a couple days.I am extremely satisfied so far and definitely plan on ordering this set of shampoo/conditioner again:-)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I love my hair again
Review: I've used this shampoo and conditioner for almost a year, and with Amazon it's been a breeze to order and have it shipped and it's arrived in perfect condition each time, though it's been disappointingly unavailable recently.  I have always had long, thick, wavy, frizzy hair which has been losing its shine in recent years, gotten thinner, and I was losing a battle with dandruff.  Since using this, the dandruff cleared up with the first bottle and shine started coming back.  My hair is less brittle and the ends don't split as quickly, not as frizzy, and its thicker again! I love this shampoo/conditioner. I won't be using anything else in the foreseeable future. I love my hair again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Shampoo looks & feels like mucus
Review: I've bought this before as a set from BJs and it was  ice.  Unfortunately, each time I pressed the pump out comes shampoo with the look AND consistency of a wad of tan and black snot.  What the heck happened in the storage phase if this product?!  From now on, I will only buy it in a walk in retail store.  The only reason I give it 3 stars is for the conditioner that was fine. Would be 5 star IF the shampoo had not been so grotesque in texture.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: My curls have never looked better!
Review: This stuff is SO good. I found it on a BuzzFeed list and thought I'd give it a try. My hair is weird - usually it's only curly on the bottom layers and the top layer is wavy and frizzy and unmanageable, which is why I usually just put it up in a ponytail because I don't have the patience for it. This stuff has changed all of that! The photo attached is after only one use. Every curl is soft and looks great. I also used the Shea Moisture coconut and hibiscus moisture spray after I got out of the shower and I think the two products combined did a fantastic job.This stuff smells great, too - I do smell a bit of a chemical undertone, but it doesn't bother me too much as it's not that noticeable. I have been getting compliments on how I smell all day, as the scent seems to linger.I had no issues with the packaging, either. I was a little worried after reading other reviews, but it all came in one piece and the pumps worked fine.This is a great value for the price - I will definitely be buying again!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It works!
Review: I have wavy damaged hair and a sensitive scalp. If I use Pantene or dove my hair falls out. If I use all natural my scalp becomes very itchy because I think I have allergies to flowers and certain extracts. I have so many unused bottles of shampoo and conditioner and with having wavy hair it can become very frizzy too. I have used this shampoo and conditioner for several weeks now with no itch and it has helped the overall condition of my hair. I’ve been growing out my damaged hair from years of bleaching and it even helps tame that part of my hair. I really feel like I’ve found something that works. Thank you!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: IT WORKS
Review: LOVEEEE. I had a feeling it would be good based off the story but once I opened it and I smelled it, I knew it would be a go-to. Now after I actually used it, I immediately knew my hair was more moisturized. I typically use a leave in conditioner after already conditioning. Im hispanic and my hair is straight with some waves(also dyed for the last 20 years) so I was worried it could be oily after(that happens alot) but it wasn't at all. my boyfriend complimented me 3 times saying how nice and healthy my hair looked. You've earned another happy customer ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Huge mistake
Review: First the smell. It was awful. Smelled like some kind of cheap vanilla musk body spray. You know the kind you know better than to pick up, but you sniff it anyway hoping this time it'll smell like real vanilla? Only its 100 times stronger.  Had to pull my hair back in a bun and the smell still gave me a headache.  As for moisturizing? Umm not a bit. My hair was dry, frizzy, and VERY tangled after using.  Hope this can be returned.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Nothing better
Review: I have been using this set for over three years and I will not default from it. I also use the Black Vanilla 4 in one combing cream. My daughter has really long hair (she sits on it), and she has A LOT of hair. She is also tender headed (oh the dread). These are the only product that give the results I want for her hair. Did i mention it smells AMAZING? Every where we go people tells her how good her hair smells. The first picture I had just shampooed her hair and I straightened it to clip her ends. The second picture was about a year ago and after shampooing her hair, I put it in two strand twist. I ONLY use these three products on her hair from the Black Vanilla line. I do not believe in using a lot of products. Find one thing and stick with it until the hair shows you otherwise. "If it works, don't fix it."

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Very Bad Experience!
Review: I have no idea what was wrong with this shampoo.  It smelled like plastic which somehow I thought might smell different on my hair. But NO it still smelled like something plastic. It made my hair feel like straw immediately!  I had a very hard time getting it out off my hair.  It took 3 washes with another shampoo and conditioner and honestly my hair felt damaged for nearly a week afterwards.  I have natural dark blonde Caucasian hair and my hair is VERY healthy.  I wish I had returned it for my money back but before I realized I could do that I just TRASHED IT.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Beware: Not Carole's Daughter Product.
Review: I have used this product off and on for several years and have recently been getting monthly deliveries through Amazon.  My most recent delivery is NOT a Carole's Daughter Product.  There is no scent. Zero. If you have ever used this product, you know that the scent is distinct. My concern is about what exactly I put on my head!? Cancelled subscription. Knockoffs and quality control have made me decide to shop anywhere but Amazon.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: In Love!
Review: In a bid to move away from my once beloved Moroccan Oil shampoo (which started to leave my hair super dehydrated and sapped of nutrients. It left a great shine though) I opted to try out these Carol's Daughter products on a Black Friday deal: boy am I glad I did. My first time using it this past week and I'm in love with how it treated my hair! The scent is amazing and it left my hair actually feeling clean and moisturized and smelling great. The conditioner especially was my favorite, it was like sweet smelling milk in my hair and a weird pleasure to watch wash down my sink lol. My 4C hair also felt super soft and bouncy after I was through, which Moroccan Oil never did- MO always left my hair feeling like brillo. If you have 4C hair that needs a pick me up try these out its worth every cent.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Try it! It's great ❤👍
Review: I am a white chic with long, fine, thick, color treated hair. I've used Aussie shampoo and conditioner for many many years but my hair and scalp was always oily one day after washing and I started having spots of scabby flakes. I stumbled on this set and took a chance. I love it! My hair stays clean feeling and looking for several days and the itchy scabby spots are correcting (3 washes so far). Con: the pump on my shampoo doesn't work well but hopefully it's just a bad one in the lot. The conditioner is... dryish? Like, hard to spread through my hair. I dont know how else to explain it. I have to pump a lot of it for my long hair. I am going to try the leave-in conditioner to supplement. The smell is lovely! Overall, I love it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: 😇Genuine Review- Make Sure to read Before purchasing🤨
Review: This product is great my scalp was really dirty although I had already washed it. I did a baking soda and apple cider vinegar rinse of my scalp if I had went in with my usual shampoo would have had a lot of breakage because as I am dries out my hair, but this shampoo helped alot to bring the moisture back into my hair since that rinse dryed out my hair. The shampoo had enough slip to separate my hair strands, if I would have went in with the conditioner after my rinse I would have had alot of breakage because I separate before I brush through with the conditioner so that goes back into the shampoo having moisture and slip and shall I add curls were poppin with only the SHAMPOO!!! after separating it of course. Also I may add that I have problems areas in my scalp even after I wash and this helped.NOW THE CONDITIONERI going to say this rn I mixed to different conditioners together for slips and moisture and hydration and softness. This conditioner adds moisture and softness but for my hair alone it doesn't have enough slips even when I let it sit there and soak up the moisture and add plenty of water. I use maui bamboo fibers gives me alot of slips hydrates my hair and strengths my strands. If I use the Carlo's Daughter conditioner alone I get alot of breakage because it doesn't have slip or enough of it for my hair. I have very dense and thick and it getting longer and harder to take care of, I have mainly 3c 4a and a good amount of 4b and low porosity. But both of these two conditioners together are boom 💥. BTW I have been using that combo for about a year maybe almost two and my hair has grown past my bra straps well 4 to maybe 5 inches above my nip. It was at my shoulders and I was learning what working for my hair and what doesn't.ENDING OF REVIEWIf you are looking for a moisturizing shampoo and conditioner then give this a try it worth a shot but can't grantee it will work for your hair you won't know until you try. Well that's it for my review goodbye ladies and gentlemen. 🙃😊

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: May Be Fake
Review: I have not had issues purchasing this specific listing in the past, however, the last delivery I got, did not smell anything like the usual. I have used this shampoo for years now, and the pump was also different and pours a very small amount. The texture of the shampoo was also thicker. I am unsure if I will purchase on Amazon because I suspect it is fake, unless something has changed from the overall formula. The ingredient list on the bottle was not different however.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Very satisfied
Review: I recently started wearing wigs and I want a good moisturizing product for my natural kinky wavy but very dry hair. The shampoo lathers very well and made my hair very soft. The conditioner provided good coverage with little product, actually so did the shampoo. After the wash condition and drying process, my hair felt very soft not waxy silky but almost like a baby blanket lol idk but that's what I thought when I felt it. My used to be dry hair also has a nice shine. It smells ok nice and light after it's dry. It did have a slightly stronger scent when washing but not overpowering. I like it. Even my braids are soft and shiny nice products.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Silky soft curly hair!
Review: I wish I could give this product more than 5 stars! I have never found a product where I don’t need to brush my hair out of the shower again after already brushing it in the shower. When I get out of the shower I put my hair in a microfiber towel and usually I’d have to brush through it again with a wide tooth comb because it’s already frizzy- this was not needed with Carol’s Daughter products! I’m literally blown away at how silky soft my hair is. The picture shown was without any product in and straight out of the shower. Amazing amazing!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great Product
Review: Although I believe there was something wrong with the one bottle I purchased from Amazon.  I used this product many times before and it's amazing especially for dry and curly hair.  For some reason the bottle I received from Amazon the ingredients kept settling at the Bottom of the bottle which I never experiment from previous order before. Had to shake well before used.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells delightful but left my hair like sandpapered straw. Meh
Review: My naturally curly, voluminous, long (almost to the base of my spine), thick hair isa mixture of 2C, 3A, and/or 3Bdepending on differing factors.When sopping wet, my hair is 3B and 3A almost evenly mixed.The strands are individually very fine,but there’s a massive amount of them.It takes a long time for my hair to soak up water or to fully dry after washing.I have several autoimmune diseases and other chronic illnesses/health issues,so I’m pretty picky about my hair productssince the wrong ones can trigger rashes, matting, hives, folliculitis, etc.Sometimes it’s really a pain trying to find anything that might meet my needs.When I read the seemingly endless, glowing reviews of Carol’s Daughter I was thrilled and eager to try it. I really wanted to smell it too.The shampoo and conditioner both smell like a lovely, warm, peaceful yet exciting place.The fragrance is very heady but not overpoweringand makes you feel like you’re receiving a good hug.Unfortunately that’s about the only nice thing I have to say about it.The shampoo couldn’t seem to lather quite right.It felt slippery, slimy, and sticky all at onceand didn’t mix well with the water.Almost instantly after application, my hair started feeling damaged and ultra dehydrated.Bizarrely, I could actually feel my hair getting rougher and drier the longer the shampoo was on my hair.As soon as it was on, the strands immediately started to snag on each other and on my fingertips. I started to worry....After lots of attempted lathering and trying to avoid tangling, my locks were somewhat sudsy.Still, they never got foamy enough to give the sensation of being thoroughly clean.No matter how much I rinsed or what temperature the water was,it never felt like the shampoo washed all the way out.It left a grimy layer on my hair and on my scalp.Ick.The conditioner seemed thick at firstbut then felt thinner and less smooth/rich once it was on my hair.I needed a lot to completely cover everything.It sat on my head for 5 minutes or so.Then I separated and detangled my curls with a wide tooth comb while my hair was still wet and coated with conditioner.It wasn’t easy like it should’ve been though.The comb should’ve slipped through my curls without resistance.Instead, my hair stuck to itself and made little knots all over.Progress was slow and frustratingAt last, when I was done rinsing, my hair didn’t feel at all hydrated or healthy.My sad strands felt fried, fragile, and extremely prone to tangling.Every scratchy single hair kept catching on one another and snarling.I was so upset to have a head of puffed up, frizzled, angry, straw hair after using this stuff.Even my argan oil and my Silk Therapy couldn’t completely fix the state of my hair right away.That’s when I knew just how severely those products had dehydrated and damaged my hair.Another unpleasant bit:99% certain the grimy layer left on my scalp from the shampoo contributed to and possibly directly caused a fungal infection.Sheer misery.It’s taken me almost 2 months of intensive moisturizing treatments, scalp scrubs, leave in conditioners,and antifungal shampooing to return my poor hair to some semblance of normal.So yeah, using these products hasn’t been the best experience for me.But hey, I’m weird and riddled with all kinds of super strange maladies.....so what happened to me probably won’t happen to other folks.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The worst hair product I've ever tried!
Review: I've literally never seen my hair feel so straw-like and dry. The absolute worst product for my hair. Couldn't wash it off my hair fast enough.Natural curly/waivy hair type 2c/3a for reference.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Dry and knotted
Review: I do not like this shampoo and conditioner me and my daughter use it she has natural hair and it made her very tangled and dry I on the other hand has perm hair and it did the same thing. We had to use tresme condition to soften and detangle our hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Black Vanilla Shampoo & Conditioner
Review: I'll start off with my hair, I'm not sure what "type" of hair I have but it's pretty long (comes down to the top of my butt) and is super thick. My hair is also super dry and because of this I can only wash it once a week. I've been using the Black Vanilla shampoo and conditioner for about 3 weeks and I'll start by saying I love the smell, it's strong but not sickeningly strong. Both shampoo and conditioner are pretty thick and a little really does go a long way (I only need about 4 pumps of each) As far as cleaning my hair it does a wonderful job, my hair feels super clean and decently soft but I'm only giving the product a 3 star review because my hair feels dryer than normal after use and I bought this particular kind because it's supposed to help moisturize the hair. Because I like the smell, the cleaning power, and the consistency of this brand I'm going try a different type and see if it does any better for my dry hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love, love this shampoo
Review: My granddaughter is mixed and I was looking for a good shampoo for her hair and I ran across this one and thought I would give it a try and I'm so glad I did. She is sooo happy with the way this shampoo makes her hair look and feel. It also smells so good. Well I gave it a try myself and I love it too so now this is the only shampoo the whole family uses. But the best thing about this shampoo is when you're hair is in between having a black woman's hair and a white woman's hair it makes it so easy to style my granddaughters hair and when she's happy I'm happy!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Formula change
Review: Beware that this IS NOT the original formula that Lisa Price  (founder of Carols Daughter ) created. Since the business was sold to l'oreal, they have changed the original formula. I have bought this product for the last 8 years and it is NOT the same formula as the original. I notified them with screen shots clearly showing that they changed the original product, after they assured me that there was no change. No response from L'oreal. They put natural products as the last ingredients, and put more alcohol based products in, which drys out hair. Not a fan anymore. So sad  ...

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The slime is REAL!
Review: I seriously loved this shampoo the first time I bought it. Enough so that I ordered two of the gift sets to share with my niece and sister, who both have the same hair texture as I do. I read the reviews about the "slime" problem, but didn't think much of it since I had not had that experience in the first order. Luckily, I checked these before gifting, because the "slime" is real, and very gross! It won't even mix together once you have it in your hands. The darker porting stays together and glides over your hands, down your arm, and plops on the shower floor. After pumping out about two inches of the shampoo, I finally got rid of it all. THE if the remaining ingredients work as well as I hoped...Either the ingredients are not being mixed well enough or the formula has changed. I will hesitate to purchase this again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: BUY IT
Review: i love this product my hair became very unmanageable once i did the big chop!! without a perm in my hair washing, shampooing, and blow drying became a 2 hour process. i tried many different brands and none worked and saw carols daughter on a you-tube tutorial. just washing my hair felt amazing it was like i was washing someone else's hair it felt so soft and smooth easy to comb after. i also used it in my daughters (7yrs old) and my son (1yrs old) hair and the results were just as amazing. i recommend this product to anyone that is struggling to find the right hair product for different kids of textures of hair. Im a black women with thick hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells amazing!!
Review: Used it yesterday for the first time and it does smell amazing! Think the way a vanilla candle smells but for your hair lol. It did lather very well and I'm guessing they made it different than what other reviews are saying because there isn't any black stuff in either the shampoo or conditioner. I don't think it's OK for chemically treated hair because after using the conditioner I still had to use a leave in conditioner. Lathers well smells amazing!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Clean, Shiny, Light, Bouncy Hair After One Use
Review: My usual "clarifying" shampoo left a waxy coat on my hair and hands after usage. I'd follow it up with a coconut oil based system, which was moisturizing but heavy. Eventually, my hair became heavy, dull, lifeless, and difficult to style. I considered a few other brands  before taking a chance on Carol's Daughter, and after one use, I've got my hair back!I washed it twice to make sure I got my hair squeaky clean, and left the conditioner on for about 10 minutes while I did other things. Upon blow drying, I could tell how weightless my hair was. It flat-ironed easily, and my hair was left super shiny, light, and bouncy.NOTE:  I am multiracial with very thick, wavy hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not good for our fine, thin hair!
Review: The scent is good. After trying this for a few weeks, my husband and I realized it wasn’t good for our fine, thin hair. It could, of course, be good for others. It made our hair look as if it were full of static electricity. Also, it seemed to worsen my itchy scalp condition.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Best product I've ever used
Review: Shampoos have never made a difference in my hair.  No matter what brand I bought or how expensive.  It's always a rating from terrible or glad it's not terrible.  I had long ago accepted that as long as it cleans my hair and doesn't make it super frizzy, I'm good.  But this Black Vanilla is a game changer.  I didn't even get it for the shampoo.  I got it for the conditioner since historically conditioners are what makes the difference in my hair.  But I thought what the heck, I'll get the shampoo too... and wow.  I was totally caught off guard.  My hair is soft, tame, manageable.  I didn't know it was possible for shampoo to do that!  I highly recommend this one!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells and feels great in my hair
Review: I have curly 3b/3c hair type, and struggle with finding a shampoo and conditioner that makes my hair feel clean, but not weighed down (something fine hair).  These are awesome!! The smell is delicious!! And it leaves my hair feeling clean, but not heavy.  I had used a different Carol's daughter product before and did not like it so I was hesitant, but I am so glad I tried these!  It really does make my hair feel more moisturized!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells wonderful!
Review: I had a sensitivity to this shampoo and conditioner set.  I was told about this brand through my sister who is also very sensitive to many shampoos as well. But unfortunately is wasn't for me even though it made my hair shiny, and smell great. My skin on my scalp, and neck got a rash. But I think most people could do very well with this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: You Will Fall in Love With Carols Daughters Products
Review: This is my daughters absolute favorite shampoo and conditioner. I saw Carols Daughter products on the Tyra Banks show 14 years ago. If you have curly hair this is definitely the product for you. It may not be your hair that’s unmanageable. It could be your shampoo and conditioner.  Carols Daughters products knows exactly what your hair needs and what it doesn’t. It’s called the curly hair method. The smell is  divine and pleasant. When my daughter uses the product she always says how much she loves Carols Daughter.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for thick curly kinky hair
Review: I’m in heaven. I read the ingredients and then I read the reviews and I decided to but this product for my 4a hair type and I used it on my daughters 4c hair type and it worked wonders. Left her hair so shiny, soft and smelling great! I’m a fan and my shampoo and conditioner were packaged fine. No guck and funk and no spillage. The box was new and the bottles had tape around the nozzles to stop any leakage. I’ve been using The Vanilla shampoo and conditioner for a while now but it dries my hair out, but this right here is for me a colored woman with naturally thick curls.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: SO AMAZING
Review: I normally have many different shampoos and conditioners, some better than others. I have curly hair and my hair always wants more moisture and this shampoo and conditioner is amazing.Recently I had to use a color corrector to get a weird color out of my hair and after I rinsed it out I was supposed to shampoo it twice and condition and I was going to put a mask on my hair. Even after I shampooed my hair twice my hair felt super soft and after the conditioner it felt even softer, I debated doing the mask because this shampoo and conditioner is so moistururizing but did it anyways.Moral of the story this stuff is amazing and I think im done with trying out different products and that this one will be my forever brand!! Thank you guys!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Game changer
Review: I recognize this product is marketed to African/Black hair however I will never use another shampoo. My hair was dry, brittle and wasn't growing. I was spending over 100 a month on special shampoos trying to fix my hair. I've been using this shampoo now for a year. My hair has grown, it's not breaking hardly at all and it looks SOOOOOO much healthier.I LOVE this product. Thank you so much!!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for dry hair!!
Review: My daughter has impossibly dry hair and this magic solution actually gets moisture into her strands. She has type 2A hair and we were concerned that it might be too much moisture and make her look oily, but it does not. Her hair is glossy, soft, and manageable.Her one complaint is that the conditioner needs to sit on her hair longer than she likes (5-7 minutes).

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Missing a star only because it's expensive to keep up...
Review: This is a really good product, from the smell to the pump packaging. I've used this for a month and have noticed the shedding and breakage from my very thick shoulder length hair I used to experience dwindled to a few stray hairs being in my comb. My hair is soft, smells good and the tangling I experience when shampooing I don't have that problem anymore. I have relaxed henna treated hair and I wash my hair every week and it has maintained my henna color and increased it's vibrancy. Just not sure I can afford to purchase this stuff twice a month(I run out of product fast) at those prices.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The best shampoo and conditioner I’ve ever used
Review: First off, the scent is wonderful. I washed my hair and left the conditioner in for 3-5 minutes, rinsed and put my hair in a towel. I let my hair air dry through the night and when I woke up the next day, my hair still smells AMAZING. Like I’m talking the best it’s ever smelled. It’s pretty much a vanilla daydream I’m currently living in.Second, my hair is sooooo soft. I recently damaged it pretty badly (my hair has always been blonde) and this set has left my hair feeling like a virgin again.It’s lusciousIt’s curly somehow? I never knew it could do thatIt’s done left my head and gotten it’s own degree at Harvard.This shampoo and conditioner will be the ONLY set that I use for the rest of my life.Just buy it! Your wasting time reading this when you could be living your best hair life!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Trashed
Review: This is the box that the set came in. Quite frankly I'm not sure if product is true. The box looks like it was trashed a while ago then resold.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not sealed packaging. :(
Review: I would rate higher because I do like this company & their hair products but since it came damaged had to give it a lower rating. My favorite shampoo and conditioner from them is the almond milk. I wanted to try the black vanilla one this time & damn did I get unlucky. When I opened the package it’s like it wasn’t sealed properly, was open & dried over like it was sitting there in the warehouse like that. So sad & inconvenient. I had to get a replacement so hopefully this doesn’t happen again cuz I really do love carols daughter products.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Well… the product itself is GREAT! However..
Review: Well, the product itself is GREAT! The smell is oh so amazing .. the softness it spot on. My ONLY BUT biggest complaint, is now after ordering this once.. it arriving and neither bottle would open from the top. After trying several try’s the lid broke. We could only access it if we twisted the And used it that way. So I ordered another order same stuff and got another set the same way same malfunction. The product itself is great the bottle is horrendous now not only have I got two sets of conditioner and shampoo bowls with pumps that do not work and now broken lids.. the bottles get dumped so easily and you loose over half the product :-/

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Italian girl with mid-length wavy wavy hair
Review: OMG this shampoo/conditioner are awesome!  I've used professional products most of my life but none have performed like this.  I dried and styled my natural silver hair using no products (that's a first!) .  My hair is manageable, has a nice sheen and OMG, it's bouncy!!  No looking further for my fav shampoo/conditioner.  Going back to dry some of the other stuff.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for me
Review: I must be allergic to something in the product. Made my scalp itchy & dry. Also, it's very thick, like honey. A little goes a long way, but it's so thick that it gets stuck in the dispenser and you can't pump it out. I had to open each bottle to use. Tried twice to give it a chance, but it was bothering me. Gave it 2 stars for at least trying to be a more natural product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: SUCKS! !
Review: IT KNOTS UP YOUR HAIR AND MAKES IT EXTREMELY FRIZZY.  CLUMPS OF HAIR CAME OUT FROM THE ROOTS.  IT'S HORRIBLE AND SHOULD BE BANNED!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not a good product at all.
Review: I thought this would work well for my daughter hair because it’s thick and curly and often dry. When I washed her hair with this it seems as though it stripped all her natural oils out of her hair and the smell was awful. I’m very disappointed in the results.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Dry hair
Review: The conditioner is nicer than the shampoo however these leave the hair feeling extremely dry. It was bought for my daughter's natural hair and I regret it. Maybe something else in the product line would be better.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Bottles are no good!!
Review: This is the third time that I have gotten this product and the pumps on bottles don’t work. Makes it very aggravating when giving my grandbabies a bath and washing hair.  I will not be ordering again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Review: I have naturally curly, blond, course hair. It is constantly dry. In the past I had to just weight my hair down with oils & creams just to make it manageable.  All those products left a film/residue on my scalp & my hair was still dry.  Since I started using Carol's shampoo & condition, my hair is soft, and hydrated for the first time ever. I also use the 4-in-1 combing cream. I love it so much I bought a set for family members that have hair imbalances and they love it as well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells amazing
Review: I do love this combo. Smells amazing, my hair and scalp feel sooooo clean. It’s definitely a difference from my other well known brands.I’m just kind of disappointed with the conditioner, I need to bring wide tooth comb in shower with me to untangle my hair. I’ve never ever had to do that before and that’s the only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars. I will continue to purchase this. Hubs even loves the way my hair smells.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I have low porosity 4 type hair at this works miracles
Review: Smells absolutely incredible I can't believe for the price it's one of the best product I've ever used in my low porosity 4 type hair. I thought the product wasn't going to be as good as people said in the reviews because of the price but since I am one year natural and I'm still experimenting on products that work on my hair I decided to go for it and this is literally one of the best decisions I've made in my life LOL I was not disappointed the moisture was incredible it makes my hair crazy soft which made me shook because no other products other than tgin Miracle Mask and Creme of Nature products make my hair soft and moisturize if you have a similar issue like I do you should just buy this product go for it and the price is so worth it

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: MAJOR MOISTURE!! No more itchy hair!
Review: I bought this for my boyfriend, as he is biracial and is unable to use drug store shampoo/conditioner. This has kept his hair from being so dry/itchy. He used to scratch his head like crazy and he hasn’t in months bc this product has been good for his hair!The scent is okay. It doesn’t necessarily smell good or bad. It just.. is. His hair has been incredibly soft though and I credit that to this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Makes hair soft supple full of light shine
Review: Product honestly i was very skeptical about it I thought why not after having gastric sleeve surgery my hair being thin and sparse and almost straw like in texture I didn’t think any shampo or conditioner would help my hair not only came out soft softer than I can remember but smelled fabulous I nixed and used shampo as a body wash to enjoy the scent even more would love to find a honeysuckle fragrance one day maybe great shampo and conditioner

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Horrible
Review: I had high hopes but it weighed down my curls and made my hair stringy weirdly textured. Can return so I’ll use it for the dog I guess.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Gives your hair and scalp a cleaner feel.
Review: This product is fantastic!  My hair and scalp feels much cleaner than any  of the other products I have ever used. It gives my scalp a tingling feeling when shampooing.  I can tell the difference in how it gives my hair a much cleaner feel.  The moisturizer detangles and makes my hair softer therefore making it easier to manage.  It smells really great.  I am very very happy with this shampoo and conditioning.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love it!
Review: I have been using this product for some time, and it always gets my hair really clean and mousturized.  My hair is also shiny, and it smells amazing.  The only draw back is I have to use a lot of the product to get my hair really lathered, but that is more to do with my coarser, more curly hair type and not the product itself.  Anyway I would definitely recommend this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Average
Review: Hard to get a good lather without a lot of product. Conditioner hard to remove from bottle also, and the top broke. This is a brand i love but for the price and quality of this particular hair care duo, will not purchase again. The scent should be stronger as well, only lasted while showering, but not in clean hair. I hope they use the feedback to improve.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Disgusting smell
Review: Normally buy this product directly from Carol's Daughter and I will do so in the future.  I do not know how old these particular items are, but they smell terrible and had I not held onto them until I finished the ones I had, and opened them as soon as I received them, I would have returned them without a doubt.  They are definitely outdated.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Soft hair alert
Review: My hair is prone to dryness.  I mean sandpaper dryness and after using this ONE TIME, I noticed a huge difference.  My son and I fight over it because he has a completely different hair texture but he also has dry hair too. Could be the hard water but this product is the truth.  Love it to pieces!  Definitely getting another shipment.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great Shampoo/Conditioner
Review: Bought this for my wife and 2 teenage girls to try. They love it and they rave about how good their hair feels and how shiny their hair gets. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the company won’t replace damaged products. Amazon fixed an issue I had, but the company that sold the product did not.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Dried my hair horribly bad.
Review: Wish I had never spent my money on this. This is probably the most drying product I have ever bought. I thought maybe my hair would adjust. However, after 3 uses, it's worse than ever. I have long, straight, thick hair. My hair had so much breakage after the 3rd AND LAST use, I will never use again. Can I return this?

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Best Shampoo/Conditioner for Curls
Review: I have been using Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla for about three years now and love it! I have bought it from here and from Walmart and the product is always consistent. About a month after I started using it my hair stylist did my hair and told me how incredibly healthy it looked! She’s been doing my hair my whole life, so she definitely knows what she’s looking at! I love this product and will buy it as long as they make it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: More than i expected
Review: These 2 products are amazing. I recently just had a child. Have been suffering severe breakage and dry hair since begining of pregnanacy until now. As soon as i open both items can smell nice scent both shampoo and conditioner left hair feeling revived and somewhat rejuvenated. Never i have i used same brand of products that instanly had my natural curls poping out so wonderfully.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great product, but arrived damaged.
Review: The product itself is amazing. I have shoulder length thin blonde hair (never color treated) and it makes my hair soft and smells amazing. This gift pack came with the product leaking and the box ruined. The shampoo contents had also separated out, so I’m not sure if it was an old product or shipping in the cold weather did that. Needed to be more secured during shipment. Returned since it was damaged and leaking.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Dope product! 10/10
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Moisturizing Shampoo and conditioner is the best kind for me. That's why I love this brand and product. It's soft too and makes my hair the same way. It really makes my curls pop and I deep condition with the conditioner with my steamer. It works wonders for me. The scent is lovely too!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Faulty bottle pumps
Review: The star is based not on the product but the bottles of the product. The push pump for the shampoo does not work whatsoever. It doesn't open, therefore, it doesn't pump. The conditioner pump worked just fine. The pumps on each are styled differently for some reason. Will update review of product itself if/when I hear anything from the sellers.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: This conditioner is a joke!
Review: My hair is about shoulder blade length and I had to use a third of the bottle. It didn't seem  to de-tangle at all!!! On the bright side,... it smells AWESOME!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love this stuff!!!
Review: I am an middle age red head with naturally curly/wavy hair. I tried this stuff because my hair was damaged from swimming, and frizzing horribly.  Talk about having bad hair days! 😢 This shampoo and conditioner has brought my hair to life! It’s shiny (not greasy at all) soft and smells fabulous! I am a Carols Daughters fan! I highly recommend it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: SMEELL IS OVERPOWERING
Review: This product really moisturize hair but the SMELL is over powering. It made me feel sick. It's winter and I had to open the bathroom window cuz it's giving me headache and triggered my sinusitis every time I use it. This product is probably good for people who only want to wash their hair once a week. I had to rinse my hair too many time. Even when I'm about to go to sleep I rinsed my hair again because the smell makes me feel nauseous.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I love this shampoo/conditioner but....
Review: I love this set so much, but the pump is horrible!! it is so hard to get the shampoo out! Please please please make a squeeze bottle!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Gave Me Dandruff
Review: It’s really nice scent but even though it’s really moisturizing, I started getting a deep itch in my scalp that I never had before. Come to find out, I somehow have dandruff (which I never have even with other shampoos.) Also, my hair gets greasier in under 24hrs with this stuff. No clue what that is about but I’m going to find a different product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not sure if this is the real brand? Smelled terrible.
Review: I got this because the reviews say it smelled amazing, and I couldn't disagree more. Maybe I got an imitation? Doesn't lather very well and conditioner is just OK.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Softest & Happiest My Hair Has Been
Review: The title says it all. I have never felt my hair as soft as it is now. The scent is light and on the sweet side (thankfully, because I can't stand harsh flowery scents). I have thick, curly, thirsty hair and after a couple weeks of this combo, it actually feels moisturized for once! I'm a fan of this formula.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It’s sooo good to/for your hair
Review: I like the moisturizing feel to my hair that it presents, and the easy manageability that has resulted after each use.  The beautiful smelling fragrance is clean, but only slightly detectable

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good Smell
Review: This was a purchase that I am still testing on my hair. I am not sure of anything that is different from my other hair products only that it smells amazing. I have really stubborn kinky grey hair, and I am on a journey of trying to find the right shampoo and conditioner that will help me manage this texter. But this is by far the best smelling shampoo and conditioner that I have used so far.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Very good product
Review: Purchased for the first time.within first use I could see so much changes in my kids curly hair. It looks lot hydrated now. Also I love the mild scent. A drop of shampoo was enough for my kid. Conditioner is awesome too. Highly recommended

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Wouldn’t buy again
Review: This dried out my hair more then any other shampoo and conditioner i have ever used (including store brands).The Scent was decent, and the packaging was fine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Amazing product
Review: I love this product it smells great but I felt the shampoo was drying my hair alot and the conditioner is super soft and smell but not enough moisture for my dry hair I have a c4 hair texture but it wasn't doing the job of moisturizing my hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Definitely buy this if you want
Review: …your hair to be dry, tangled, and somewhat stiff??? I use the Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla leave in conditioner and I love it. But this shampoo and conditioner set is awful. The shampoo seems to have a hard time coming out of the pump and it’s the consistency and color of honey. The conditioner seemed fine and smelled good- however it did no conditioning whatsoever. Could probably break all the teeth off a comb after using this. Straight in the trash.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Dried out my hair
Review: Made my hair really dry, even after using the conditioner and a leave in afterwards.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good
Review: The shampoo lathers very well and cleans hair without over drying. The conditioner also smooths and detangles my hair while adding moisture, easy to wash out and doesn't weigh hair down. The scent is like coconuts and sweet vanilla, very nice.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Gross
Review: I've used this shampoo for a couple of years now and love it. However, I can no longer purchase it locally and decided to order it here. I've purchased this shampoo and conditioner set twice now and both times the product has been thick and slimy, separated and downright gross. I never had that problem when I bought it at my local store.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Nice Scent
Review: This is the second line I have tried from Carol's Daughter, while I didn't notice much in the way of shine it did give my hair some needed moisture. The scent was nice too, sometimes shampoos with vanilla scents can be too overpowering or smell like a cupcake, but this had more of a natural vanilla scent and I appreciated that,

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Stay away if you are sensitive to perfumes and chemicals.
Review: I decided to do the big chop a year ago, to stop using harsh chemicals on my scalp as part of the reason. The shampoo contains some kind of chemical that made my scalp EXTREMELY itchy. Strangely, not the conditioner though. I tested by just using the conditioner on one day, and just the shampoo a few days later just to make sure.  It's a shame because the conditioner is a fantastic detangler and my curls look good and all, but stay away from the shampoo if your skin is sensitive to perfumes or harsh chemicals.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Noticeable improvement  in my wavy hair
Review: I have wavy, curly and highlighted hair.  The ingredients are great. I especially love the conditioner. I could tell a big difference after two uses in the texture of my hair. It felt softer and stronger. I have repurchased this product again yesterday. I even bought one for my daughter. The quality is comparable to a much more expensive product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not good
Review: The bottle is small, rather thick, and terribly uncomfortable. The consistency of the shampoo is like some kind of mucus, disgustingly stretches between the boys, sticks. It felt like mucus was out on my hair. My hair remained oily after the wash if not worse.disadvantages: - does not match the declared properties - uncomfortable dispenser and bottle cap-It is hard to wash off shampoo from hair-Strong smellThe only plus is hair conditioner

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: NO. BECAUSE WAIT. HOLD ON!!!
Review: OK. SO I WAS SURE I WAS GOING TO DISLIKE THIS. I WAS READY TO DISLIKE THIS. THE SMELL IS HEAVENLY!!! IT MAKES MY HAIR FEEL AMAZING. WHEN I WASH MY HAIR, IT DOES NOT STRIP MY HAIR. THE SCENT IS SOFT BUT IT LASTS. THE CONDITIONER SEALED THE DEAL. LITERALLY. IT SEALED THE MOISTURE AND SHINE IN. I KNOW MANY PEOPLE MAY FEEL LIEK THIS IS NOTHING BUT FOR MY HAIR, THIS IS A FIRST. I USUALLY HAVE TO GLOB OTHER THINGS IN MY HAIR TO GET IT TO FEEL SOFT AFTER. WASH. THIS IS AMAZIN. THIS IS ALL AFTER ONE WASH! ONE! WILL BE BUYING FROM THIS BRAND. WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING THAT WORKS AFTER MANY YEARS, YOU HAVE TO WRITE THE REVIEW IN ALL CAPS!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Black vanilla Carol's Daughter shampoo and conditioner combo
Review: Black vanilla shampoo and conditioner are fantastic. Come in 12 oz.. pump containers and moisturize, shine, detangle and smell fresh and lovely. Great value. Also helps with breakage as well. Will keep regimen of this product. Waited a long time to finally find product that works. Thanks amazon.

Review: Just ordered this for the first and last time. My hair is frizzy and not what I've come.to expect after using this brand. I'll stick with store bought from now on. the goddess strength is the only way to go for me. Smells nice but is giving herbal essence.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE A FULL REFUND
Review: I got this product and it is a great product! However, it did not work for my hair type. So I returned it with the thought that I was going to get my full refund back! That was not the case! This was very upsetting because I was sured I was guaranteed a full refund! SO if you are not sure if it is going to work for your hair DO NOT BUY IT! You will not get your money back.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for me
Review: I was very excited to try this after reading all of the positive reviews, but I just did not get good results. My hair is dry and unmanageable when I use these products. I did better using Suave Moroccan Infusion. So my hair is thick, but fine and pretty straight. I also used it on my curly haired daughter and it really does not work for her. Her hair has become a brittle mess.  I gave 3 stars because it's likely a good product, just not for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It is very dry
Review: First of all, it’s a nice large size and they both smell strongly of vanilla. This product just isn’t really “it,” it makes my hair so dry which gives me more tangles, and mind you, I have natural hair so I have to cut so much hair off after using the product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: BEST PRODUCTS ON THE MARKET
Review: If you are thinking of getting this shampoo and conditioner DO IT!!!!!!! This has completely changed my hair in a matter of 2 WEEKS! HOW?!?!? I have been using professional hair care for the past 2 years as I use to be a hairstylist. After spending 20-30$ per bottle I needed something more affordable. Let me tell you... I was skeptical of going to a more “drug store” brand. I couldn’t be more happy. This has made my hair thicker, stronger, less frizzy and SOOO SOFT! I was not a fan of the scent after smelling the bottle but I LOVEEEE the way it makes my hair smell. I will not only be repurchasing these items but will be trying more items from carols daughter. 10/10!!!

If you are looking for a natural shampoo, I highly recommend this stuff!  The pump dispenser is a different story.  I absolutely hate the bottles this comes in!  My husband figured out how to make it work, but it is beyond me!  So good luck, and the shampoo has leaked upon shipment every single time!  That is why I am giving 4 instead of 5 stars.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Sulfate-Free Holy Grail
Review: I have been on the lookout for a sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner combo that (a) actually works and (b) doesn't cost an arm and a leg.  This hits both of the marks tenfold.  I have very fine hair that is weighed down easily by products with any sort of buildup or gets super static-y and flat if it strips the hair too harshly; it's hard to find a happy medium.  This is the perfect in-between.  I also usually steer clear of conditioners as my hair does not need any help in the oil department, but when I use this (mid-shaft to ends only), it doesn't weigh it down but moisturizes for very healthy looking hair.  My hair feels clean, shiny and still has body and movement.  It smells SO good too!  Can't beat the gift set price either; both products individually are around $10 at any store. Highly recommended.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Very misleading pictures. Pictures include advertisements of leave-in conditioner ...
Review: Very misleading pictures. Pictures include advertisements of leave-in conditioner, edge control smoother, and hair smoothie, yet those items are not included. Items are titled "Carols Daughter Black Vanilla Hair Care Gift Set for Dry/Dull & Brittle Hair" in order to allude to the fact that they are supplying everything in the picture, yet they only include shampoo and conditioner.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Excellent product
Review: I must state that I have not used the conditioner but have used the shampoo for about three years.  I am a Caucasian senior citizen lady with extremely sensitive scalp and skin.  I also have many intolerances to various shampoos and their formulations as I have scalp psoriasis and many allergies.  Carol's Daughter's shampoo has always left my hair in excellent condition, beautiful and shiny, and have never had a sensitivity problem.  Excellent product and price.  I am used to paying $11 for the shampoo alone at a supposedly discount store.  I wish Carol's would develop some kind of hair spray and/or hair gel with a similar gentle formulation.  A deodorant would be wonderful too as I have the same problems with them.  Thanks!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for coarse textured hair
Review: I have been trying to find a new shampoo and conditioner since my current brand is ridiculously priced. I wanted to love this shampoo and conditioner. It smells great and I love the pumps. I also feel that the price is very reasonable. However it left my hair really dry and feeling like hay. I am a little confused because it says it's good for dry and brittle hair. I guess it's just not for my hair type.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love the scent!
Review: I got these when the set was on sale during Prime Day and don't regret the purchase at all. The scent of these products is straight-up delicious. Not just a one-note vanilla scent, but almost a dark and musky vanilla. I absolutely love it. As for the quality of the products, so far I have no complaints. Shampoo and Conditioner both work great on my dry super-fine hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for curls!
Review: My girls have the curliest of curls and this helps to moisturize and keep them bouncy.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love this collection!
Review: I love this collection from Carols Daughter it works so well with my low porosity hair! My only gripe is that the conditioner I received top came broken but I replaced it with one that I previously owned as a quick fix. It was most likely due to damage during shipping.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: mucus consistency
Review: I have purchased this product various times in retail stores and decided to purchase through amazon. I was VERY disappointed by the quality of both the shampoo and conditioner. The shampoo had a mucus consistency and the conditioner did NOT moisturize my hair as well as the product that I would buy in store. The SMELL (which is the best part about the shampoo/conditioner) was NOT like the original vanilla at all. Smelled lightly of vanilla. I will definitely buy in store from now on.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Subpar quality
Review: The sample I used from the Amazon sample box of this product was FANTASTIC so I purchased the gift set with my credit. The shampoo has separated. I've tried to mix it together, but its to thick.Over all the quality of both products is subpar. I will probably cut my losses and pitch both

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Silky smooth
Review: Hair gets so silky smooth with this product and It smells delightful. Best part about this product is the conditioner made my toddlers hair knot free! Happy Momma :)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: WORTH IT. SUPER SOFT. WORKS WELL.
Review: Honestly this is the BEST shampoo and conditioner I have ever used. My hair is left absolutely SOFT. I now recommend this to everyone I know, with both relaxed and natural hair.*I always put a shower cap over my hair for deeper conditioning. Makes it even softer. Love this.

Title: Not for my 4C!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Shampoo has separated, old.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Wish I could use to full potential.
Review: Love it. Only problem it's shampoo sometimes isnt well mixed so I feel I'm not using it to it's full potential.  Also I wish the bottle was designed in a way that I wouldnt have to open it to use the last of the product. Other than that I love the smell and the product is nice. I've been using it for about 2 years or so.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: This product might would work better for a different hair type
Review: I have very thick hair and I just couldn't get this stuff to suds up.  It takes more time in the shower and it makes my hair feel stripped so I still end up using my old conditioner.  This product might would work better for a different hair type.  It smells good.  I really wished it would have worked but it didn't.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Residue left behind
Review: Does not work!! I have curly hair left white residue in my hair it made my hair feel straw like. I had to rewash with another shampoo and conditioner. Terrible it’s pricey too I was hoping it Would work :(

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
