Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: The ABSOLUTE BEST SHAMPOO AND CONDITIONER FOR *EXTREMELY* COURSE HAIR.  I am in l💗ve!!
Review: I absolutely had to post this review because I am amazed at how soft, clean, fresh, and moisturized my natural *extremely* course hair is this morning as a result of washing it and conditioning it with the Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla...  I will NEVER, and I mean NEVER use another shampoo and conditioner on my hair for the rest of my life (I am not exaggerating) and so I hope they never stop making this.  Understand that I have had natural (unprocessed/untreated) for 2 1/2 years and have tried everything from Creme of Nature Botanicals, to Cantu, to Mizanni (I do love Mizanni products, however, it still has never made my hair feel so moisturized and cottony soft), to Pantene... to just so many other products and nothing compares.  So if anyone is on the fence about buying this, please take it from someone who has extremely course hair that is about 14 inches long from the root (so imagine how I dreaded washing and combing my hair out).  This shampoo and conditioner from Carol's Daughter makes me look forward to washing my hair because it smells so fresh and it has improved the texture of my hair in just one use. It makes my hair very manageable. I can comb right through it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: CD virgin and my first time was AMAZING! Great shine, but shampoo might strip hair a bit!
Review: I did say too much looking around for an affordable yet quality shampoo and conditioner. So I checked out carol's daughter for awhile (lol) and after reading reviews I decided to try A few of the CD products! I am so happy that I did because I loved how this made my hair feel and look. Even the shampoo is very moisturizing! I got the curls foam stuff, the orange hair mask, and the green restorative leave in stuff in junction with the S&C.I have seen incredible shine in it and noticed results right away ❤️ Today my hair looks kind of frazzled; yesterday seemed a little dry and today it was more so, but I did do a lot of scrunching so that may have been a part of it. I've been using the hair mask as well as the S&C so that would be crazy if it were from the wash.I've read people saying this stuff could be stripping your hair, and it might be true. I'll report back after a month. I shampoo and condition 5 times in a week. I'll try skipping the shampoo and see if it makes a differenceThe shampoo trigger thing is either stuck on the shampoo or it sucks- it operates way more rigidly than the conditioners so maybe it was busted.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Excellent product👌🏽
Review: Absolutely recommend this product first let me start with my package came intacked no damage and the bottles were full. This is my first time using it and I fell in love. But I have been using the pomade honey mimosa and decided to try the shampoo and conditioner and my hair feels clean, soft and lightweight, Also I have notice that my hair doesn't shed or tangle as it usto. I have dried curly hair and this product makes it easy to manage.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: 3b Low porosity curl savior
Review: I literally only used this product twice and I can already see the difference. I was using products that were too heavy for my hair and my curls were suffering badly. After doing some research, I realized I have low porosity hair. I read that this product could be a good fit for my hair type. It turns out that it surely is! I love the smell, the texture, the slip, and the way my hair dries without product in it. This picture is literally what my hair looked like after my hair dried with only using the shampoo and conditioner. There is no other product in my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Love love love!

It had my hair feeling soft and the conditioner immediately detangled my hair with me just rubbing my fingers through it. Once I blow dried my hair, it had a lot of shine and softness to it. This has made me even more excited about washing my own hair. Carol’s Daughter is about to save me some money. I’m now going to switch to every two weeks.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Shampoo and Conditioner Set For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, Sulfate Free Shampoo and Hydrating Hair Conditioner (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Detangling Win!!!

Since it is so fine and then I process it the damage is starting to take its toll.  It is almost impossible to get the knots out. This shampoo and conditioner made it so easy to comb out my wet hair!!! It smells yummy too. Well packaged. No spilling. Highly recommend.

Title: Severe Hair Loss
Review: I used this shampoo and conditioner set for about 3 weeks. First I noticed my hair being noticeable drier but chalked it up to the weather. Got a hair cut to trim off split ends that I thought was negatively impacting the health of my hair. It wasn’t until my boyfriend had to sweep the floors multiple times a week due to the amount of hair that was piling up. Clumps of hair! Than I looked At recent pictures and we could tell how thin and patchy my hair had become! I’m 27 years old my family has the luck of good head of hair on both sides. My diet and routine hasn’t changed. The only thing that I changed was the terrible decision to try this “healthy” shampoo.. do NOT try. Your hair could fall out at an alarming rate!

Title: Great Scent & Packaging; Formula not for me

I wash my hair every other day. Up until this point, I'd been using bar shampoo, so I was already accustomed to shampoo that didn't have a bunch of sulfates and silicone.This duo of products smells really nice, and the packaging is fantastic, but the formulas just didn't do much for me. My hair feels dry and looks dull. These quarantine days has me caring a less about the efficacy of my beauty products, so I'll stick with it and use this up, but I'll probably be treating myself to a hydrating hair mask at the end of it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: TERRIBLE FOR 3B - 4C HAIR
Review: It nearly destroyed my hair in just one month. I bought all of it too. I bought the moisturizer/ leave-in, I bought the curl cream and this shampoo and conditioner. I have 3C hair and I would not recommend this for anyone with 3B - 4C. Essentially, I’m saying this ain’t for us sisters. It dried my hair out, it caused hair loss, split ends and other damage. My hair gets matted after ONE nights sleep (even with silk cap). My hair is brittle and dry right now. I have also had horrible dandruff for two weeks, which is very unusual for me.I’m truly, truly upset I used this product for just one month and have the damage that I do. I shaved my head in 2012 and have been natural since. So I am very particular about my hair and products. I typically use “As I Am” products and I HIGHLY recommend that brand. DO NOT USE CAROLS DAUGHTER.I threw what was left of these in the trash. I thought about putting them in the guest bathroom but that would just be evil. Please don’t put this on your curls and coils. It’s going to take months for my hair to rejuvenate and recover. Literally after 2 days of discontinuing the use of Carols Daughter, my hair is starting to feel less brittle and hold moisture.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Love! Incidents
Review: I am soooooo excited my product came....I absolutely love this stuff on my hair...my curls are popping ....my hair loves it...so I did a wash work another product that was trying on my hair and today when this came I took a small section of my hair (shown in pic ) and rubbed the conditioner over it and immediately my curls pop....I will upload a pic with my full head washed with the product.....please Carol daughter don't change a thing about this product 🖤2nd pic update

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: I stand by this product!
Review: The first time I used this shampoo/conditioner duo IT SAVED MY LIFE. I had made the poorest of choices to save money and go to the hair cuttery for a revamp on my platinum blonde dye....The woman bleached my hair TWICE in one sitting and my hair was DESTROYED. I scoured the first drug store I came too and read every bottle label for moisturizing products and finally landed on this gem. Honest ingredients, reasonable price and most importantly - IT WORKS. My hair immediately began to bounce back from the damage after just one use and it never broke or split. Seriously shook by the wonders it did. And, although L'Oreal purchased them, it's still a black-owned company that aims their products towards black women so it's great to support that. But, like me, you definitely don't need to be black to enjoy this product!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: !!fake product!!
Review: !!Fake carols daughter products!! This looks like a legit carols daughter store but it's not. I have the real shampoo and compared it. The fake one smells more like chemicals. The color is completely off, and the label looks like a watered down printed copy. The dispenser pump is also a slightly different size. I have been buying carols daughter from target for years. Will not be putting this in my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Dead honest review.
Review: I've heard pretty good things about Carol's Daughter, mainly from the internet when I look up best shampoos for curly hair, but this was bad. I am truly not one to leave reviews or complain about products.That said, this shampoo seriously TANGLES your hair as you put it in. Suddenly every time I washed my hair I was having to deal with serious knots! I heard this happened for others and decided to endure but ever since switching from Carol's Daughter to a new brand, idk why I ever endured that pain. It makes your hair feel so dehydrated while showering and even after.For context, I am mixed, black, indian, and italian, with loosely curly hair, but I need good shampoo and conditioner to manage it.I used this after the devacurl scandal, looking for a good replacement. I used it for about 6 months and went through lots of bottles, and I didn't realize how bad it was for my hair until I stopped using it. I went through soooo much conditioner as well which was the worst part. To combat the tangling that the shampoo caused, I was having to buy 2 or 3 bottles of conditioner per bottle of shampoo which was horrible. I think I was able to ignore the flaws of Carol's because of the price-point, especially coming from devacurl which is pricey, and the reviews seemed good so I figured it wasn't too good to be true, but it was.I genuinely just want people to know the struggles cause finding a good formula is hard. I currently am using a much better product which made me realize that my hair can be nice and soft and manageable. I don't want to give the name because I don't want this review to seem fake or planted, but I definitely wanted anyone who has these hair struggles with this product to realize that it's probably time to move on from it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Not effective, drying, heavily scented
Review: Their monoi formula is much more effective when it comes to strengthening and conditioning damaged / over-processed hair. This product left my hair course / stiff and has a heavy heavy scent. It smelled really bad out of the bottle, like a strong cheap perfume, but as I used it in the shower I picked up some more natural notes of almond and possibly coconut, but after I rinsed it out the only sent that was left was the artificial perfume. The scent was so strong even after it dried I received multiple comments from people in the office throughout the day about it, people thought I was wearing a very strong and unpleasant smelling baby powder based perfume. I like this company's products, and even though its more than twice the price, I will stick with the monoi formula. I thought I could save some money with this since it's the same company and promises similar results, but the products couldn't be more different.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Seems to be working for me
Review: Been using carols daughter hair products ONLY as well as rinsing my hair with ACV and my curls are looking super healthy now. After so much damage I did to my hair, I basically went from long kinky curls, to SOME curls, and mostly just waves in my hair and it looked horrible! But I seriously ONLY USE Carols daughter products, such as gel and leave in conditioner to take my curls. I hope that this like other really good products on Amazon don't go away! I hate finding something that works and then not being able to purchase here anymore. This shampoo and conditioner is gentle enough to use every day, which I still don't, but you could, if you use hair products to style.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Not for me 🤷‍♀️
Review: This shampoo smell amazing 😉.  After washing my hair with this product my hair felt weighed down. If you have dry hair like I do try the Black Vanilla. It left my hair feeling like silk

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Try this product white people LOL
Review: Did that get your attention? *SMILE*  This company's products might appear to be primarily for AA females, but let me assure you that this product set is fantastic.  I am a WF, and my hair is really very healthy.  It tends to get a little dry after I get a color or highlight, for a while.  I have started using these products, after having bought the gift set.  They leave my hair super soft, and I use them daily or every other day.  I have noticed a reduction in frizz.  I love these products.  The smell is almond milky, if that makes sense.  Its not my favorite scent, tbh, but its not bad at all,  and its not strong.  And it does not linger on my hair after drying.  I would def recommend this product to anyone, of any ethnicity.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Heavy scent
Review: I like the products and they do well on my hair.  I do feel that they are more supermarket grade hair products and not salon quality.  I like the scent but it is a very heavy scent.  I wish there was less perfume in it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: USE THIS IF YOU WANT TO LOSE ALL YOUR HAIR
Review: This is the worst product ever!!!!! I purchased this attempting to support Black businesses, which I found out it is not Black owned, and this product literally took out ALL of my hair.  At a salon where I went to try to repair the damage, the stylists reported countless customers who had the same thing happen to them after using this product. I also read the reviews too late and discovered many other customers saying the same thing. This product ruined my hair and it may never be the same. This product needs to be taken off the market and this company sued with a class action lawsuit. Amazon should allow a rating of 0 or negative because that is what they deserve.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Will be returning!!
Review: I bought this product because my hair is basically on the bottle... "extremely damaged and over processed."1. This smells awful. Like fake almond perfume that your grandma weighs. Honestly it is so intense2. The shampoo takes forever to lather and left my hair very dry3. The conditioner is OK. I didn't put my normal hair oil on after to see how moisturized it feels and it's fine.I've only used it once so we'll see, but I don't know if I can get past the smell.**Updated 5 hours after I washed my hair...**IT IS SO DRY. The ends are literally breaking off and the scent is getting worse somewhere? I wasn't expecting it at one point and it made me actually gag. I'll be returning this asap.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Hair comes out a lot
Review: I got this product on referral from my sister. I used it about 4 times and each time I noticed my hair would come out in clumps. This last time I washed, I used my old shampoo and conditioner just to see if there would be a difference in hair shed. It was a HUGE DIFFERENCE! My hair barely went down the sink which proved to me it was Carol's daughter almond shampoo and conditioner that was making me lose a lot of my hair. When I asked my sister about it she said she stopped using hers because her hair came out too! I'm throwing this stuff away asap! I won't even donate it, nor will I refer this brand to anyone else! Not for black 4a or 4c hair period!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Terrible smell
Review: I only used it once. My hair did feel light and soft. BUT the smell is awful and overpowering. I read some reviews that said it was like "cheap perfume"... Not how I would describe it. I'd say it's more of a public restroom soap smell (not the nice pink bubblegum smelling one) . Kind of looked like it too. I could smell it all day. It even stuck to my pillow case. Immediately after I got out of the shower I had tried spritzing a leave in conditioner to help mask the smell, wasn't enough. It might be worth it some, not me. Gave it 3 stars bc I didn't give it a fair shot.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Gentle & strengthens processed hair
Review: I LOVE this shampoo and conditioner. I have heard good things about this product but I finally used it for the first time today. My hair is bleached and dyed so it dries out easily more than ever. As soon as I washed my hair and applied conditioner, my hair instantaneously became soft again and went back to its normal curl pattern. Love this.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Trust me, you need this!
Review: Best shampoo/conditioner combo I've used. Having gone from jet back to my natural dark blonde, my hair was super brittle and dry. Although it's healed through the years it's still very dry being blonde. This set restored all of the moisture and moisture to my hair after even the first use. My hair is so shiny, smooth, and super healthy after using just a couple of times. Love that my hair feels clean and without any film left like some cheaper conditioners do. Even the expensive shampoo/conditioners don't hold a candle to this set. Officially hooked!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Not moisturizing
Review: I attached 2 pictures here, the one where my hair has more individual waves is without this product and just my regular routine (no product just wash and diffuse) the other picture is after using this product, I was excited because my hair tends to be dry so I wanted something that could add moisture without all the unnecessary stuff in it. BUT the shampoo was drying, it made my hair feel more coarse than usual and I had a lot of hair coming out  More than the normal amount for me, but I thought maybe after the conditioner it will feel better ? It says apply generously so I did and left it on about 10 minutes, rinsed out , and then got out and diffused, my hair was just flat, barely any wave to it, doesn’t feel moisturized. The only parts of my hair that feel softer are my roots because I didn’t apply any of this product there also it DOES smell like old lady perfume so if you don’t like strong smells like that it’s not for you.. that’s pretty much it. Might work for other people but not for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: A must have for unruly crazy hair!
Review: This product has made my unruly hair so much easier to comb through. It’s helped with the frizz as well. It smells so good! I love that it’s sulfate free and doesn’t strip my hair color as fast as some others I’ve tried. I have ALOT of hair and it’s curly and wild. I’ve had a lot of problems finding products that work well on my hair type. I highly recommend!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Best shampoo and conditioner I have found in a very long time
Review: I tried the leave in conditioner because it was highly recommended in a curly girl forum and decided to try the whole line after a friend’s recommendation.  I love these products!!  As I’ve gotten older the texture of my hair has changed drastically so I have patches of straight, wavy and curly not one overall texture. I have also been dying and highlighting my hair for years. It’s become dry and tangles constantly. This shampoo and conditioner solves all my problems!!  My hair feels soft and amazingly, even the curly bits!!!  I think the scent is a little to strong and perfumy for me but I don’t care!!!  I am 109% a convert and can’t see myself using any other brand!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Did more damage than caring for my hair
Review: Honestly terrible. I was using other Carol's daughters products and i was in love with them. So, i wanted to give this one a try.  Unfortunately:It made my hair extremely DRY. It created more tangles than if I were to use no product at all. Having curly hair, it was upsetting having to pull my hair trying to untangle my hair. I have pretty sensitive skin, including my scalp. I developed dandruff. I it was so uncomfortable and painful.I wish I had the same experience as others who have given good reviews but unfortunately I did not. I gave the shampoo and conditioner a week, hoping that my hair reacted differently but every time i showered I was scared for my hair. it felt damaged and I am pretty sure it cause my hair fall off more than normal.Immediately returning.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: I used their shampoo. It was not a mistake!
Review: My kids have curly hair, so this brand is a staple in my house. I have stick straight hair, though, but was out of my shampoo so I used this stuff!  First off, I do nothing with my hair. I wash and go, no color treatments, no chemicals at all, but this is for deeply damaged hair. I also have oily hair. Everything about this shampoo and conditioner says I shouldn’t use it, but out of necessity, I did!  My hair feels amazing, smells amazing, and looks great!!!!  I’m so glad I discovered this brand works for me!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Bad smell and frizzy hair
Review: I personally didn't find the smell of this set to be that bad. My coworkers however, kept asking "Who's wearing old lady perfume???" Litterly three people asked that question.My hair was extremely dry and frizzy while using this, even after I put in some leave-in conditioner. My hair without it was atrocious.However, it did make my hair soft and maybe if I had a different hair type it would've worked better. My hairs extremely curly and temperamental.Maybe someone with easier hair would have a better time?

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Works wonders..TRUE SNAP BACK
Review: Let me say, live and work in NYC.Had a bad experience at one of Caroles stores.So I respectfully decline to follow or purchase anything from her..CHILE!!! That was over, well ova 10 years ago BEFORE she sold the bizzz....Well now my hair falling out..used the Mimosa Hair Honey on my scalp & hair. I ordered the Shampoo Conditioning sets and love IT ALLL!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: My Favorite Carol's Daughter Product
Review: I simply LOVE the smell of this product.  It reminds me of the smell of a new born baby freshly bathed. The fragrance and soft but lasts for days. My daughter is constantly getting compliments on how nice her hair smells from those in close proximity to her.  The Shampoo seems to be a bit more fragrant than the conditioner but both are great. The moisturizing component works well enough but could be a little better especially for those with dry or brittle hair. Still by far my Fav

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Great Smell. Great Feel.
Review: Carol’s daughter was my first step into natural shampoo and conditioner. It has definitely transformed me from using a 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner. Unfortunately not many hair products are anchored towards African-American men and this product helped make washing my hair easier. I mean, the conditioner has 100% made picking my hair so much less of a hassle as well as washing it. I can feel my fingers go straight through without getting tangled in any naps. I love it.  Not only me, but my bf is not even African American (Caucasian) and he uses it because he liked it. Go figure.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Almond Milk Shampoo, Conditioner, and Leave In
Review: As a woman of color it can become a chore to find quality hair care products that not only nourish but provide essential moisture when it comes to routine hair maintenance. I discovered the Carol’s Daughter products a few years ago now and have not turned away since.  Not only are the ingredients incredibly nourishing, but they keep your hair healthy, strong and manageable. My favorite of the line has been the Almond Milk. It keeps my hair free of dryness, breakage, dandruff while including manageability, and a wonderful scent that lingers for days after a shampoo, conditioner and leave in. I highly recommend giving their line of products a try. They’re most certainly worth the money while providing nourishment and health to your hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: My Curls bestfriend
Review: I am extremely happy with this purchase. I have very thick curly hair, I'm biracial and really wanted something to aide in repairing my color damaged hair. This set is gentle and is working wonders for my curls!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Love it!
Review: I LOVE this shampoo and conditioner. I'm mixed. and my hair is too! After having used this set for about 6 months now, i seriously can't believe how great and luxurious and perfect my hair looks! I didnt think just shampoo and conditioner could "doo" that!!! I work outside everyday in Colorado where the sun constantly burns and dries out your hair. Carol's Daughter has restored my hair to luxury!!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Love this stuff, got my curls back
Review: I had gotten a sample of this product, and I absolutely love the results so I had to get full sizes to share with my daughter. She colors her hair a lot and well her hair was looking unhealthy, once she started using Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate-Free Shampoo and Conditioner, The huge difference in her hair was almost instant! after a few days her natural curls were curly again. The smell is amazing. So pleased with this buy will be getting Carol's Daughter products again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Amazing
Review: Gave as a gift, and she absolutely loved it. The smell is divine. I myself have used this brand, and my hair feels softer afterwards. Despite some people believing otherwise, Carol’s Daughter is a great natural brand for everyone; my friend is white with very long, very thin hair and has already noticed a difference, while I’m white/Latino and this works excellent for my coarse-thick hair as well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Changed owners=changed formula!?
Review: I use to love Carol's Daughter products, but I've noticed a difference past few times I've bought from them. At first I thought my scalp was just getting dry from weather change, or that maybe I needed to use colder water when washing my hair. Come to find out they've recently sold their company and I've noticed the quality drop significantly. It was the shampoo and conditioner creating buld up and dry scalp! I never had this problem before, I tried using another brand and didn't have a problem. I've talked with my other curly haired friends and they told me they've experienced the same issues!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Good For The Price
Review: A good set for the price. I have dry, thick, yet fine, gray hair that is short. These work well for what I need which is moisture. The conditioner isn't heavy by any means, but substantial and the shampoo is creamy. Not a wild almond scent fan but I didn't get it for that. If anyone remembers the Vidal Sassoon shampoo/conditioner of old, it smells just like that. Definite almond but it doesn't linger.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Really does repair hair!
Review: Not too fond of the smell, it smells just like the hand soap they use in public restrooms lol.  BUT after using this product only once, my hair is so much softer and already repaired from years of damage due to straightening every single day!  I did not find that the smell was too strong or anything, and after washing it just smells like regular clean hair without any strong smell.  I do like shampoo to have a lot of extra fruity smells, but those are generally the ones with all that extra crap in it that's bad for your hair.  I believe this shampoo smell is just a natural almond milk smell, nothing over the top at all.  I will probably use this shampoo/conditioner forever!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Amazing products
Review: This is the second scent I've tried and this one isn't the best smell? It's a very strong almond and it does linger for two days it seems. The product is great though. The shampoo really lathers so these bottles will last longer than expected. You'll feel a noticeable different right away. Definitely recommend the brand.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: I'm in love!!!
Review: I'm a HUGE fan of this product!! I absolutely love the scent, it's really nice without being overpowering at all. I've noticed that it's really helped in the overall itchiness that I get on my scalp. I'm sensitive to some products and I've noticed that I haven't had an issue with this shampoo and conditioner. It's my favorite shampoo and conditioner right now!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: dont like at all
Review: i bought this based on reviews and im trying a new treatment on my natural kinky hair but this is a no go my hair feels like its stripped of all moisture when washed then i deep condition it and it still leaves my hair rough it claims it doesnt have sulfate in it but it seems to be untrue will not buy again

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: 5 star with less scent!
Review: My hair is fried and has broken off above my shoulders. (Over processed) This duo is wonderful for my hair and makes it feel amazing. The only downside is the smell. I wish companies would realize that people with allergies need products that won't blow your head off with scent. A much milder version would be great. I also bought the spray but cannot tolerate the smell enough to use it. Otherwise, this is a very nice product

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: It’s okay but not for damaged hair.
Review: This product is really good but not for intense moisture. I much preferred there deep conditioning treatment. The smell is amazing but doesn’t last long after you rinse out the product. I would say for healthy hair this is amazing at maintaining the health of the hair. However for people with more damaged hair like mine this doesn’t do much.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Worth It
Review: This product exceeded my expectations...I wasn’t sure how good it would be at repairing my damaged hair but I have only used it once and my hair is the smoothest it’s been in awhile. I’ve never heard of this brand but I thought the price was reasonable so I went for it and I’m so glad I did. It’s the best hair product I’ve had in a long time and I can’t believe the results with such a decent price. I would recommend this product to anyone with extremely dry hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Initially felt good
Review: It initially felt great lathering my hair but after washing the shampoo and conditioner out, my hair felt really dry and brittle. Then it was really flaky. I had to rewash my hair with my old stuff. I chucked it immediately because I was passed the 30 day return. Never buying again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: LOVE! Fekkai shea butter and full gloss dupe
Review: I am in LOVE with how my hair looks after I use this. In the shower, it smells strongly of almonds (odd reference, but like the Great Wolf Lodge shampoo?) and lathers enough to feel like my thick and oily hair gets a good clean. The conditioner is smoothing and silicon-y feeling, but it leaves my hair looking soft and clean. When I air or blow dry, my hair is silky, voluminous, and tangle free. It looks good undone or styled--overall, it is a very versatile shampoo that is a good dupe for more expensive versions.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Like it. Good price point and quality.
Review: I have wavy hair that doesn't like humidity and is currently postpartum aka falling out.Obviously, I'm trying to eat healthy and take right supplements but this shampoo/conditioner duo makes my hair (whatever is left) almost silky and pretty manageable because as a new mom it's really hard to do anything and hair during covid is definitely not on my priority list.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Very strong smell but worth it for the result
Review: Have to admit I don't like the way this smells. You know the way a public bathroom smells? Or the way those portable bathrooms smell? Yeah that's what it reminds me of. The scent is very strong but I LOVE how it treats my hair. Literally made my hair feel like silk. I'll definitely try other products from this brand. Bye bye drugstore hair care!!!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Good but not for me!
Review: I bought these for my daughter since she has very curly hair and more often than not it gets frizzy. I didn't see a difference in her hair while using this shampoo and conditioner but it does smell great. I like that it's s not a heavy or greasy conditioner. They both come well packaged in a box separate from any other items(if you ordered multiple items) in case they pop open they won't spill all over everything. They are good products just not what I was looking for, I was expecting more since they ARE a bit pricey.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Just what I have been searching for
Review: Love, love, love this stuff! I have been looking for shampoo that actually lathers that is free of sulfates and this is amazing! I love the smell and it makes my hair so soft. My hair is thick and curly and it helps with frizz. I also got the hair mask, which is separate but I love just as much and recommend also!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!
Review: I first tried the Black Vanilla flavor in Carols Daughter shampoo and conditioner and loved how moisturized and silky my hair felt after using it. BUT the Almond Milk flavor now has my Heart! I LoVE LoVE LovE this product! Highly recommend if you are looking for a product that brings out your natural curls, smells oh so good and make your hair so soft no silky

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Buy it!
Review: This product has proven to be superior to any other line I have used for my natural hair. I work as an investigator with COVID-19 and have to wash my hair daily. This is gentle enough for just that. I highly recommend!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: My "go to" shampoo & conditioner
Review: I have curly hair that is mainly red with some grey streaks now.  My hair is pretty dry BUT this combo not only smells great, it is my go to combo whenever I wash my hair.  Having curly hair AND being in my 50's, it tends to be pretty dry.  This is amazing stuff!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: It works...
Review: I used another product for years before I tried this... the mail order company wouldn’t stop the auto delivery so I finally just deleted the whole thing... this product is good for natural curls,  moisturizing and the conditioner is really awesome.  I use a bit of conditioner on the ends of towel dried hair and let my hair dry naturally.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Smells great! Super soft hair!
Review: First time trying this and i was hooked! Will be repurchasing! Love the background story of the owner- love the way it makes my hair look, feel and smell!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Creamy and the scent is lovely
Review: Great products that do not strip your hair or leave it feeling weighed down.  And such a lovely scent.  My asthma can be triggered by certain scents, especially in cleaning products and beauty products, but no issues here!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: New Go-To Shampoo / Conditioner
Review: I’m so happy with this shampoo. First off, they do a fantastic job of packaging. I’ve bought three different orders and none of them are damaged in any way. Second, the product itself is just fanatic and more than the products I was using before, a little goes a long way. I do think it’s important to mention that the scent is very strong. The almond milk smells exactly like a bottle of almond extract and that took some getting use to, but now I really enjoy how long the smell lasts in my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Dries you out
Review: Im a black and multiracial person with some loose curls.  Looking for a replacement for deva curl.  Tried this.  Won't but it again.  The shampoo dried my hair out so much.  I have to soak it in leave in conditioner to bring it back to life.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Great product!!
Review: I was searching for a new haircare line after using IGK and not being able to keep up on the cost of their products for the time being and stumbled upon this line, I have straight-colored blonde hair and this makes my hair look amazing!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Amazing almond scent!
Review: My new favorite shampoo and conditioner! Long lasting almond smell, cleans hair well, and makes my kinky textured hair feel very soft.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Loving these products
Review: I love Carol's Daughter products, this shampoo and conditioner set works great for my hair, my hair feels healthier softer more manageable I have noticed less hair loss as well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Meant to soften and unfurl kinks and curls
Review: I love the shampoo and conditioner but the leave in conditioner straightens out my curls too much so I use something else for lean in. If carols daughter does a curl activator or enhancer I will be first in line. It really softens hair though

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Added Moisture in my hair
Review: I really loved this combo! I have low porosity hair and it’s very hard to add moisture in my hair. The shampoo made my hair super soft and the conditioner made my hair moisturized. I love these products ❤️

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Happy Carols’ daughter lol
Review: First off this is a miracle I love it and this is just my first week. The shampoo and conditioner are great but I’m just at awe with the coil enhancing moisture butter more like enchanting lol I fuse it with my cantu curl activator cream.. I smell like heaven and my hair is extra soft and moist all day and it’s easier to manage. Thanks, you’ll definitely see me again the price is ok ppl fi pay for di good tings dem 😎

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Must Have Set!!
Review: Hello, Carols Daughter Almond Milk Care Gift Set is just lovely, Especially if you need to add moisture to your hair, if your hair is dry or over processed this is the perfect Gift set for you.  This shampoo and conditioner is concentrated and it latthers up very nicely and the conditioner is thick so you know you are really getting a good deep conditioned hair. I really love this product it works great on my thick curly hair.  Thank You.  Darlene.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: It’s great for natural hair
Review: I love everything about carol daughters products. It’s excellent for women of color hair!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: This is perfect!!!
Review: I love this product I have thick curly hair I have no frizzy hair and it relaxed my hair. it smells so good I will definitely keep buying this the scent is also so good.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Brushing hair
Review: I had super dry, damaged hair from coloring. I couldn’t get my brush through my hair.  I used this product and it brought the life back to my hair. I use it everyday and it has not stripped my hair of its coloring.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Honest review from a real customer
Review: I got this shampoo hoping it would help revive my hair. But instead my hair doesnt feel soft and silky. It feels very dry and it is hard to comb through. I like the scent. I like the bottles. But I do not like how my hair is starting to thin more with using this product. I am going to go try Gardiner whole blends revive honey instead of this. I just dont like the way it leaves my hair more messed up. This is a real customer. I bought the product February 7th so I been using it for a entire month. Now I will search for a better hair product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: decent
Review: It did moisturize and make my hair soft, but it dried out and irritated my scalp. i don’t think it’s because of the shampoo and condition, but my hair started thinning very bad. i’m pretty sure that was a new brush i was using. might try this stuff again someday.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Soft hair
Review: Leaves my hair soft and shiny when I use the leave in conditioner. I have sensitive skin and this seems to be the only hair product that doesn't irritate the rest of my body when I rinse in the shower. The conditioner leaves buildup so I dont often apply to my scalp just the ends. I've tried a couple other scents in this brand but this is the only one I've seen great results with.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: NOT FOR RELAXED HAIR
Review: If you have relaxed black people hair DO NOT BUY THIS, if I knew L’Oréal took over this company I would have never purchased this. Even though I called to clarify if this is good for relaxed black hair and was told yes, I am living the consequences now. I don’t know what’s worst this or the monoi leave in conditioner.. I HATE THIS AND THE HAIR MASK AND THE MONOI LINE.. my hair is so damaged I can cry..  I went by a hair dresser and she has treated my hair to the gods , my hair was horrific after using most of the carol daughters line, but after getting it treated by the salon, I had to wash my hair at home and I ran out of my regular great stuff and I had no choice but to use my almond milk line. So I gave it another try, and guess what ? I nearly ran over the bottles with a car, I almost threw them in the oven to watch it burn slowly. My hair is DESTROYED .. I’m never wasting my $150 on carols daughter products AGAIN

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Will just purchase from target or walmart
Review: I’m too disgusted to use this. Besides the delivery being late, it arrived used. Like someone shampooed and conditioned their hair with the product prior to shipping it to me. I’m a fan of this brand so I know the product is great but I will just continue purchasing it from target as this is super disgusting not to mention that their is actually hair on the side I don’t the bottle. I just really can’t believe this

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: I like the conditioner more than the shampoo
Review: This is a very good product if you want to get rid of product build up in your hair and scalp, which the shampoo does a good job at but once it's washed out, my hair feels rubbery(?). As if all the softness has been stripped away. The conditioner however restores the softness and moisture to my hair. I also use it as a co-wash in between was days. It's really nice and the scent is pleasant.The results are further enhanced by the hair masque (Almond Milk) which I reviewed also.This didn't get a full 5 stars because the shampoo strips too much of my hair's (4c) integrity.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Hair feels better
Review: My hair looks and feels so healthy now that I've been using this for a few months now. The first time though, because I was so used to sulfates and silicone fillers in my hair, there was a transition period. Once my hair got used to the routine, I got compliments on my hair every time I went out. Should definitely try it out!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Shampoo makes hair feel like hay
Review: The shampoo made my already damaged hair feel super dry and knotted in the shower. I would put the conditioner in and try to rake my fingers through my hair and it would be super knotted because of the shampoo. I don't understand why it makes my hair so much drier when it's supposed to help damaged hair and heal split ends. Literally can't use it - switched to Olaplex.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: Great conditioner that smells horrendous.
Review: I loved what the conditioner did to my hair, and I love the product line, but the smell is god awful. Much like an old lady perfume. Its too much and I can't use it anymore.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Almond Milk Daily Damage Repair Sulfate Free Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Damaged Hair, Shampoo and Restoring Hair Conditioner with Shea and Aloe
Title: First review, because it was that bad.
Review: I bought the complete set of Carol's Daughter's Almond Milk shampoo, conditioner and leave in conditioner because I wanted to try something new & wanted to moisturize my hair. I have 3B hair and after using the shampoo it made my hair feel stripped and dry (while in the shower)! I thought the conditioner would be better and more moisturizing but it gave my hair the same feeling. Again, hoping for the best I tried the leave in conditioner to help detangle and it did nothing. The products all also smell like baby lotion, which is was really unflattering.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Contains silicones
Review: Just just received my set of carols daughter goddess strength shampoo, conditioner, leave in cream and seven oil blend. I’m trying this after suffering from extensive damage to my hair by other “curly girl” products.  I have not used it yet, but I was happy to receive it so quickly and without any leakage.  At this point all I can say is that I’m very disappointed to see dimethicone in all the products except for the Oil. (See photos.)  Dimethicone isn’t the greatest thing to put on your hair or scalp, so I’m very hesitant to use it.  Dimethicone is a type of silicone that can make your hair look smooth, soft and silky initially but can build up on your hair and scalp, leaving a residue that blocks moisture from getting into the hair shaft, acting almost like waterproofing. Over time, hair not only appears dull, but it gets dehydrated and weak from lack of moisture. For this reason I’ve given these products only 2 stars even though I haven’t used them and will probably not use them.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: This Hair Product Is Amazing.  It Exceeds Expectations.
Review: I tried this Carol's Daughter Goddess set to help me manage my naturally curly hair.  I followed the suggestion on the bottle to use the shampoo first, then the conditioner, then the oil, and lastly the leave-in cream conditioner. The Scent of the Shampoo blew me away. It is very fruity-scented and refreshing. I was pleased to find a little amount went a long way and the lather was a lot. I shampooed my hair twice, rinsed, then added the conditioner. I must say the softness and the slip were so pleasing. After rinsing my hair I added the oil, by pouring a little amount ion my hands and fingering it into my scalp and to the strands of hair. The final outcome was very shiny and well-moisturized hair that was so silky and soft to the touch. Moisture and control are what my hair needed most. I must say my style did last almost a full week.  I like playing with my hair so I was tempted to use the products again to see the improvement after a second use because the first use was beyond my expectations. You will not be disappointed.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Makes your hair fall out!!!!
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   This product I'd super disappointing makes my hair itch and dry plus not to mention me and my wife's hair has been falling out constantly since the first use this company will be hearing from us 6 days ago my wife's hair was down past her shoulders now it doesn't even pass her neck

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Disappointing Products
Review: I purchased the Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set in hopes it would work wonders on my 30-inch dry, white hair, but these were all very disappointing products. I really wanted to support Carol's Daughter and have purchased various products over the years; unfortunately, I've consistently been disappointed with them.  I don't like using products with any colorant at all because they tend to stain white hair.  The Goddess Strength products are beige, which isn't bad but certainly doesn't help brighten my hair.  My major complaint is that I've never used a product that dried my hair so!  I'm no hairdresser, but I do know that moisture is good for strengthening black women's hair.  My hair is a mixture of waves, kinks, and curls, and the last thing I want to do is use a product that dries it out. I'm older and my hair has thinned over the years as well, which is why I tried these 'strengthening' products.  However, I only used the products for a few weeks, and they appeared to cause more hair breakage, rather than less.  Back to Shea Moisture for me!

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Strong Oil
Review: Wanted to like this collection. I have dry hair and scalp. I sampled the oil first. Put a few drops on my clean finger tips and gently rubbed onto my clean scalp. Within minutes it felt warm then hot. By one hour I had to shampoo it out of my hair and scalp. Too fearful to use other products.Maybe great for others just not me.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Shampoo and conditioner should be used frequently.
Review: Mary TessmerMy hair is thining -  every time I wash it there is hair in the drain. I stopped coloring it because I want a light blond but I get this God-awful Army green. I go to the professional store to get my supplies.  I bought your product because I could put the oil and deep condition on my hair for hours but the texture is still ugly. My original hair is now white. It’s thining my hair instead of having very thick hair. I take oral chemo and  called for if dye was was causing hair loss and weird color results. They said no. Your shampoo cleans and lathers well.Your conditioner doesn’t make my hair silky soft.Your other products are good too.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Surprised that I was so disappointed
Review: I'm surprised that this didn't work out for me as I like this brand. The scalp oil made my hair extremely greasy - I barely put any on the first try and won't be keeping it. Maybe I don't have the right type of hair but I have curly hair and somewhat dry and flaky scalp and this seemed to make my scalp even worse plus greasy hair. I am giving to my sister to see if it works better for her but I won't be buying this again and I'm warning her before she tries it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: THIS PRODUCT IS THE ABSOLUTE TRUTH!!!
Review: This product is the absolute truth and it works during your first wash! My hair is extremely thick and kinky and this product tames. I used to take 30 minutes detangling my entire head. Now it takes 5-10 minutes max. My hair was moisturized throughout the entire wash process and I lost very little hair during detangling. My hair is extremely soft and even DAYS later, my hair is still moisturized without touching up or adding other stuff. I pushed my friend to try it and she already has her set. She said she never had an easier wash day. I highly recommend this product and I will be buying again. It smells amazing and your hair will definitely thank you for it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: DO NOT BUY THIS. Caused MAJOR hair loss
Review: I’ve used the Carol’s daughter brand before but not this particular line. I usually use the black vanilla line and haven’t t had any problems.I used these products one time. ONE time. I begin to notice dryness and shedding within the first two days. I then began to notice and outrageous amount of shedding . I do not normally have any issues with shedding and keep up with my trims so I knew it was the products.I did not use them anymore. Quickly washed them out of my hair after continuing to see clumps of my hair fall out every time I touched it. I went from having thick healthy hair to having thin dry hair within a two weeks. My hair continued fall out to the point where I now have bald spots from the shedding. And Will have to go to the dermatologist to make sure this product did not damage my scalp.Please do not buy this. It is not worth the risk, and I plan on reaching out to corporate to complain because I see tht I am not the only one who has had this experience of hair loss based on the reviews I see here on Amazon and reviews on Google.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: 10 STARS ⭐️
Review: The intoxicating smell and blend of ingredients are what I am loving about this product! This product markets exactly what it provides! My hair was incredibly soft and manageable after using the shampoo and conditioner alone and after applying the oil my hair felt healthy and well fed 🙌🏾 The leave in conditioner should give my edges the extra support it needs to withstand this Texas heat! My hair is more thin and I am excited to see what this blend of ingredients will continue to do to support the growth and strength of my hair over time!!

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Ok if you can tolerate strong scents
Review: The smell is very strong, too strong for my liking. For my hair type, which is fine and curly, it did not really make a difference. After applying the oil after showering, then the cream, my hair, surprisingly, was stiff and dry a few hours later. Maybe it will work for other hair types.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Nope! Hair dropping

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: 1 use and you'll be loving your hair again!
Review: This has got to be the best brand I have found. Quite unexpectedly I might add. Found it searching for a completely unrelated product. I only need about a quarter size shampoo & conditioner to give my curls the strength and hydration it deperately needed. Also, frizz is non-existent when using this product. I do not have to use the oil though. It makes my hair greasy. The whole system works perfectly for my teenager. My daughter's hair is very curly and very, very dry. Both of our hair is prone to breakage. Even before we decided to use hair color. This product after 1 use has most definitely helped.  It has given me hope that managing our hair will be easier now. Although, i don't like the scent much.... It isn't that bad. I'm just sensitive with scents amd very picky with certain things. I can deal. It isn't terrible. Just makes me sneeze some. The moisture it gives starts with that shampoo. I have never in my life found a shampoo that makes my hair soft. Usually, it feels worse. I Love this stuff amd my daughter doesn't want to go w/o it. Great product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: Smells AMAZING and Moisturizing!
Review: Does wonders for my biracial 3 year old's 3C - 4A curls! It also smells AMAZING. It is a great value for the price. I love every product in the bundle. The smell is long lasting and I just LOVE it. I use the shampoo once a week, the conditioner at every bath. I use the oil on the scalp once a week and the cream before his swimming lessons to protect his hair from the chlorine. Will definitely purchase this set again. I always loved Carol's Daughter and I used their almond set, black vanilla set, cococreme mask and hair oil spray but this is by far my favorite product line of theirs now.

Product: Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength 4 Full Size Products Hair Care Set - Sulfate Free Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave In, Scalp & Hair Oil Treatment- For Curly, Natural Hair
Title: I HAVE NEVER EXPERIENCED SUCH WONDER <3
Review: FIRST OF ALL I LOVE THIS 4 PIECE HAIR SET IT SAVED MY HAIR!!!!!!!! I have thick Puertorican curls, my dad is bald and i have the gene, i feel like my hair was starting to thin and fall because of it and i was freaking out, i bought this on a whim because of all of the great reviews and OMG my hair stopped falling and my hair is so thick soft and shiny, my curls are bouncy and overall my hair looks great! If you are debating to buy this product just do it!! i reccommend the set of 4 shampoo, conditioner, leave in cream and oil! after my shower i mix some of the cream and oil together and put it in my hair and my hair turns out great and smells so FRICKEN good :) 10/10 products! Good luck girls!

Title: Amazing!
Review: I have 4A hair, it has looser coils, it is thick but manageable in its natural state. I've been experiencing shedding and brittleness due to not properly taking care of my hair. I tried this conditioner and shampoo and immediately I could tell the difference! My hair did not shed once im the shower! It was soft and the comb slid right through after 1 wash!!  I couldn't believe it!  It feels stronger, stays soft and tangle free from wash to wash which is about 3 days.  The smell is different but not bad.  You can smell the vanilla but there is another ingredient/scent that is an acquired taste.  However, now, I enjoy the scent; it's my "healthy hair" smell.  If you're on he fence about trying this line, you should definitely do it!
