Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Awesome!
Review: My daughter is 7 and had the most awful hair to deal with. I could brush her hair an five mins later it would be super ratty again. She has fine hair but A LOT of hair. Everything I have tried never kept her hair soft and not as tangly. It would get so bad I would constantly have to have her hair in a braid to keep it from ratting up. The jelly to cream conditioner is an absolute must have in my house!! The shampoo is good but the conditioner is the star of the show. No more trying out masks or conditioners trying to figure out which one will keep her hair soft and a lot less tangly! I use it on my hair as well as my younger daughters hair and it works amazing!!! If you buy anything, buy the dream to jelly conditioner. My 7 year old has red hair an my youngest daughter and I have brown hair, all of us have fine hair but A LOT of hair that is beyond tangly… until now. I didn’t get paid to write this, I bought my own products and will continue to buy them!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Both shampoo and conditioner are super weird!
Review: Okay so the first time you put the shampoo in your hair it doesn't feel like anything is in your hair. So I fingered out that when you put the shampoo in then wash it off then put it in your hair for a second time it starts to lather up. This happened with both my hair (3c-4a) and my fiancés hair (4b-4c). I used the shampoo once and half the bottle is gone. So I don't like the shampoo. The conditioner on the other hand is pretty cool it does turn into a cream and makes your hair so soft. The only complaint I have is that the conditioner has these hard clean flakes in them they look and feel like plastic. It does dissolve into your hair but at first you would think its plastic.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Shampoo doesn't lather or foam at all
Review: I was pretty excited to try this as I've seen it recommended before. The smell is really nice, not super strong but very clean smelling.I tried to use the shampoo first, it was like putting water on my hair. The video shows it sudsing and foaming but it did neither. I tried rubbing it in my hands to lather it, nothing. So it basically just went on my scalp and rinsed off. I expected it to dry my hair a bit as a clarifying shampoo, but it didn't do that, it did nothing but tangle my hair. I used a different shampoo and went on to the conditioner.The conditioner on the other hand was fantastic in the shower, it felt a bit like Vaseline but I was able to comb my hair out of all the tangles caused by the shampoo. I wouldn't use it on top of my scalp because it's heavy and leaves a slight oily feeling, but it was perfect for my ends.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Just no
Review: I was really excited for this shampoo and conditioner because it sounded like exactly what I needed. I have really thick, low porosity, 4c hair and so I liked he idea of the applicator nozzle on the shampoo and a really thick conditioner that makes detangling easy. The problem is that nothing worked. The nozzle is actually great but you need a crap ton of shampoo for it to start foaming (in just two uses I’ve used a third of the bottle) and it leaves your hair feeling stripped after words. I’d be okay with the shampoo being a bit harsh if the conditioner did anything but it was almost worse than just your average condition that’s not even meant for kinky/coily hair. It barely added any slip, just like the shampoo I needed a ton of it, and when you rinse it out your hair still feels stripped. I gave this set a second try just to see if it was me being crazy but it’s just a complete and absolute no for me. If you’re looking for actual moisture just use the coco creme line from Carole’s Daughter cause this new one just isn’t it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: CLEAN, SOFT HAIR
Review: I am a huge fan of Carol's Daughters. Best thing I ever did for my hair was finding this brand. I've gone between CD and other products and nothing compares to it. The only problem I have with their products is not liking the smell. This completely solved my problems. Smell is very fresh and not over powering either. Starting with the shampoo I love the bottle. Super easy to apply and while this did an awesome job cleansing my hair it didn't leave it feeling dry and stripped. On to the conditioner, I don't love the packaging (wish they would do the pump top like their other products) but it's something I can live with because it felt amazing the moment I put it in my hair. And after letting my hair dry naturally, my curls look amazing and feel so soft! Thank you Carol's Daughters! I'll never got to another brand. This literally saved my hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: You can love or hate this product
Review: I'm white, with coarse and wavy/curly hair. I know that this product may not work for me because it's not quite formulated for my hair type. However, I do use other curly hair products that work just fine. So I'm going to rank this a 3 to try to be fair.The shampoo seemed fine, it was easy to distribute it through my hair and foamed up well. I can't remark on how my hair felt after because the conditioner that I followed with totally wrecked my hair. So I'm willing to give it another shot and use a different conditioner with it.Now for this conditioner, I had such high hopes because I need something that gives me a lot of slip so I can detangle in the shower and at first I thought it was going to be great. I love the scent of it and it made the tangles just melt out of my hair, it seemed to rinse out just fine and I thought everything was good. I let my hair air dry and it was so crusty and sticky after, I don't know if that's due to the glycerin in the conditioner or what, but I've never had a conditioner make my hair feel like that before.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Amazing!!!
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   I love this product! My husband loves the smell even. I love the texture I get after use and how easily the conditioner detangles with you. It leaves the hair fluffy and light. I also purchased Carol's daughter leave in conditioner and hair oils. They all work amazingly together. This comes from a woman whom has never been able to properly manage her own hair. I'm thankful to have found these products.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Great for thick tangled hair!
Review: I love this shampoo and conditioner so much! I wish I could hug who ever created it! My daughter is 12 and has EXTREMELY thick and long (past her bottom) hair with a curly under layer. Keeping her hair clean and detangled has always been a huge source of contention for us. During the summer, she swims daily and even though I keep her hair braided, she still comes out with terrible tangles. I saw a woman on tiktok using this conditioner on her daughter's tangled hair. We have literally tried everything with no success so I thought I'd give it a try. I am so sick of having to wash/condition a preteen girls hair! Our next step was cutting her hair, even though she loves it long so much. Y'ALL! THIS STUFF IS AMAZING! When she gets out of the pool a tangled mess, she puts the conditioner on her hair and is able to WORK HER OWN TANGLES OUT before she gets in the shower. The nozzle on the shampoo allows her to get it worked in all over- no more greasy patches on the underneath. It rinses out beautifully and doesn't leave her with a ton of build up. We are customers for life!! This is the best hair care product i have come across in a LONG time.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Awesome on textured hair!
Review: I've tried soooo many shampoo/conditioner combos on my daughter's hair over the years. This was the only one I've continued purchasing. Both the aloe and the rose smell nice. I'm not a rose fan but it's still pleasant. It cleans well and detangles beautifully. It's moisturizing however her hair drinks everything right up so still use whatever leave in moisturizer you use.The kicker is that it doesn't work for my hair. It's too heavy of a product for my thin, wavy hair. If you've got textured hair, its a game changer!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Better than any salon brand
Review: This stuff is absolutely amazing.  You don't have to use a lot of it and it's a miracle on my hair.  It feels good on the scalp, makes it so easy to detangle, and moisturizes perfectly.  I used to go through a bottle of Nexxus in 2 weeks.  A jar of this will last me 2 months and works so much better than anything I've ever used.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: DETANGLES EVEN THE WORST TANGLES!
Review: My hair is very long, course, thick, tangles easily, and damaged. It takes a bit of product for me. It took 2-3 shampoos and conditions for me to notice the softness in my hair and it keeps my hair from getting greasy longer in between showering. Once you put the conditioner in your hair immediately starts to detangle and you can gel it getting softer. This stuff works amazing!!! I can detangle my almost dreaded knotted mess of a hair at times with my fingers in the shower while the conditioner is in! It’s amazing. It is pricey but best shampoo/conditioner combo I’ve ever used hands down.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: True!!!
Review: I love everything about this product!!! I prayed for a product that will not knot up my natural African American hair. I usually wash three times with other products, but with this product, I washed only two times. The first wash striped the oil, grease and dirt off my hair. You will know this because your hair will feel dry! The second wash provided so much suds that I knew my hair was squeaky clean.  My hair is so soft and manageable. I used the honey grease which helped me put nice braids in my hair!!!! Perfect product!!!! My Forever!!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: This is a must have for 4c low porosity hair
Review: So I was going to wait until I finished out my other products before buying this one but I'm glad I didn't. These products are everything my hair needed. Not only did it do what it was suppose to do, penetrating through my stubborn hair but it also uplifted my spirits to have a product that actually works.I washed my hair 3x with the shampoo to achieve the result I was looking for due to product overload from my previous hairstylist. The 1st wash my hair was super stubborn it barely retained the water, hence low porosity hair. I also detangled during shampoos. Anyway after the 3rd wash I rinsed my hair with hot water to prep it for the conditioner. I worked it through my hair as advised and my hair felt like it was being feed food. My hair was left feeling very soft and full. My coily hair literally tighten up and shrunk to its root. Also my hair was  glistening when all was said and done.It's a must buy. 10 stars !!!!Perfect for a wash and go!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Smells great but has silicones.
Review: I loved the smell of this stuff. It was so refreshing and summery and green that I couldn't stop smelling my hair and I was super in love with the way it made my hair feel. However I didn't notice that there's silicone in the conditioner which is a no go for my hair. I am sad because that means I can't really enjoy it the way I want because over time my hair will be made worse by the product instead of better. If they remade this without silicone I would 100% repurchase but considering their market is people with natural hair I'm surprised they put silicone in it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: It smells good but
Review: It smells good but it’s not the product for my girls 3c hair type. It leaves their hair very dry the next day. The conditioner does work well while washing hair but I don’t like how my girls hair looks the next morning I even use their brand leave in conditioner and their hair is very stiff and dry the next day. Because of my experience I would recommend. Disclaimer my daughters use a satin pillow case and hair still hard the next day so it’s def the product

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Great for Caucasian curly hair too!

I took a chance after seeing someone a review from someone who was white with curly hair, and it works great! I feel like my hair is light and bouncy. Big fan!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: (4a/4b texture) Love It!
Review: Love the way it smells - not too powerful. The shampoo didn’t get as sudsy as I was expecting but that’s okay for me. If you prefer more suds, I recommend two or three washes. Conditioner gives my hair a TON of slip for detangling and I LOVE that! My hair feels moisturized after rinsing the conditioner out and I just followed up with my regular moisture routine. Definitely sticking with it

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Shampoo is great, Conditioner SUCKS
Review: I received a recommendation for this based on my fine, straight, oily, naturally blonde hair. Everything seems to weigh it down. I will most likely buy the shampoo again, but the one time I used the conditioner my hair looked like a grease pit. I took like ten minutes rinsing it out, but it didn’t matter. I think the glycerin clung to my fine strands. I had to completely rewash my hair, and I was getting ready for work. It still seemed weighed down and greasy after an attempt to wash it out.  The shampoo clarifies my hair and leaves it shiny as long as I use another conditioner.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Great Shampoo and Conditioner Duo
Review: Amazon had the set on sale and I liked the idea of water to foam shampoo, plus the scent sounded clean. I have very thick, wavy hair, and found the shampoo to be absolutely delightful to use, the name does it justice! The smell is clean and pleasant, and it really works up a lather. It rinses easily, and then I apply the conditioner, which is also a great product. It's thick but applies easily to my hair, and also rinses out well. My hair is smooth and tangle free after using both products, and the smell lingers even after drying. I will definitely buy again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Well Pleased
Review: I have low porosity hair and can only use clear non-creamy or non-greasy products so this line works for me. The shampoo is perfect because I can apply it directly to my scalp. The conditioner gives just the right amount of moisture and slip. Both are easily rinsed out without leaving residue. The scent is pleasant and my hair feels very manageable using this product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: My New Favorite Smell
Review: The smell is heavenly. I wish I had linen spray for my bed so I could smell it when I go to sleep! It’s so clean a fresh and mild.I also think it’s doing wonders for my hair. My hair was really dry before, so it’s not miraculously perfect, but it’s much softer than it used to be. I think if I keep using it my hair will be the way I want it after a few months.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: I finally found our forever hair wash products
Review: I love Wash Day Delight, both the shampoo and cream-to-foam conditioner. I've gone through multiple products, trying to find the right one that adds necessary moisture without feeling heavy. Wash Day Delight is it. The aloe scent is fresh and invigorating. The products are light and you don't have to use a lot to get enough lather. They rinse clean, leaving my hair soft and light. I use these products on both my hair and my young daughter's hair. The ingredients are safe and the products are great on a variety of hair textures. My daughter has a lot of tangles and the cream-to-foam conditioner detangles in a breeze. My daughter generally fusses and cries on wash day, but she barely notices when I am working through her tangles with these products.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Try it!
Review: Love it! Although the shampoo doesn't lather much it is very clarifying. I don't use the little nozzle because the heaviness of the bottle makes me poke myself in the head. The jelly conditioner is that girl. I don't use it as a wash out conditioner, but as a leave in on soaking wet hair. Easy to comb, easy to twist, keeps hair soft and smelling wonderful for a week. Looking forward to trying the floral scent too.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Just what I’ve been looking for!
Review: This shampoo and conditioner is amazing. I’m 41 years old and have used 100’s of shampoos and conditioners and this by far is my favorite and new “keeper”.My son and I have fine hair but a lot of it and it is porous so it easily tangles. This is the first shampoo and conditioner that has given our hair slip and shine within weighing it down and making it more unmanageable.I highly recommend for fine yet thick and porous hair, you will be delighted by the fragrance and fun of using this product.My scalp feels clean and refreshed and brushing my hair afterwards is a dream!! I look forward to washing my hair using these products. THANK YOU Carol’s Daughter for creating this masterpiece, I will use this wash and rinse again and again!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: No More Brushing

I started using this shampoo and especially conditioner and I haven’t had to brush since. It detangles in seconds and you can finger comb through your hair in the shower. Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Highly recommend! 10/10!

It has taken me a minute to adjust to how much is needed to wash and condition but even that is a bonus bc it seems like less is more making them both last longer than your average shampoo and condition! Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Beyond Impressed

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: The products are excellent, the scent is the most amazing thing in the world
Review: I love the scent of this product so much that I may start using it as body wash.As for my hair; my hair is a mixture of 4B/3C and a patch of 4C. Like the racial admixture of African American people, my hair is literally mixed.I do not regularly wash my hair with shampoo.  Shampoo of all types strip my hair of the oils that are needed, and make it more vulnerable to breakage.  For the people who say that this shampoo makes their hair dry - well duh, yes. It washes away all creams and oils and residue and dirt in your hair because its shampoo.  Shampoos be shampooing.  And that is why I use it sparingly.I co-wash my hair maybe every two weeks, and will only shampoo my hair, i.e. strip my hair of the butters and creams that protect it, maybe once a month or whenever needed.So, the clarifying shampoo only gets used once/twice a month.  The conditioner gel - I use that several times a week as "hair grease".  I don't wash it out.  I use it on every inch of my hair to keep it moisturized.  For me, it does not dry to a brittle, ashy mess atop my head, and that is a big plus.  I'm a low-maintenance, seldom-fancy hair woman, but I do care about what it looks like, and I don't want my hair to ever look "dirty" because of a gel or conditioner build-up.I also use the conditioner as a setting lotion when I'm doing twists and want spiral curls.In fact, I've never used the conditioner in the shower & washed it out.  I love it as an everyday pomade and curl enhancer.And then...I always smell like the flowers behind the ear of a unicorn dancing in the rain.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Made Hair Hard and Dry
Review: Made my Hair Hard and dry, Was SO Surprised  that I Used  Other Carols daughter products But this Shampoo and Conditioner was A Bust, O to none the least the conditioner was weird when i Smooth this in my Hair it was like Gel This product didn’t Do what it was supposed to do, I had to use Shea Moisturizer conditioner On Top of it so I can At Least Detangle my hair I spent more time doing my hair than the normal, Well maybe it works better on Caucasian hair than 4-A, B Type African American Hair… this stuff is Wack… No more for me… I Agree with All the Negative Reports the shampoo and conditioner I Gave a Double Negative!!.. I’m Sticking with Shea Moisturizer Shampoo and Conditioner At Least it Detangles me hair and my hair I very Thick… was Hoping that this product would Do what it says.. i Even gave it a second try… Nope that’s what I get for trying New Products 😳😳

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Where have you been all my life!???
Review: I have literally tried so many shampoos and conditioners, hoping to get my hair back to it’s once youthful and healthy appearance, I’ve spent hundreds of dollars on products that only made my hair worse. I was struggling with dry scalp recently and I felt intuitively led to try this- on a whim, and I’m so glad I did. I don’t leave reviews, but this stuff is awesome! I will forever use all Carols daughter products from this day forward. I could cry I’m so excited about it. It smells so clean, and the conditioner is the coolest ever! It immediately makes your hair super silky! Blown away at how easy it was to comb through my hair, and I have very long hair and always struggle to blow dry and brush, because it is so tangled after washing, but not anymore. Definitely try this! You’ll be so glad you did

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Cleansing and non-irritating
Review: I really like this shampoo, I’m white and Mexican with course wavy to loose-curly hair. I usually only wash my hair every 7-10 days so by that time i have some build up and itchiness going on. This Shampoo has salicylic acid and I think that helps a lot with calming my scalp and getting rid of the itch without being super harsh and drying. I like the thin consistency and the applicator tip, it makes it easy to get down to the scalp. I’m ordering a second bottle of the shampoo and this time I’ll try out the conditioner as well.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: I really loved this shampoo and conditioner.
Review: Let me begin by saying that I have 4 daughters who have a ton of hair, plus my own. The idea of cutting down wash time was enough to pique my interest, but after reading the reviews, I had to give Carol’s Daughter one last try. I’d tried a few products in the past, and I wasn’t very impressed. When I got my package today, I was actually excited about washing my 2 yr old’s hair just so I could try them out, and they did not disappoint.  Her hair was so much easier to manage and detangle, I was truly blown away. I let her eat dinner while letting the conditioner sit for about 30 mins, and I could literally see her hair getting softer and shinier the longer she sat.  It was amazing. If you’re on the fence about these products, I would definitely recommend them. I also used these along with the Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair. This combo is unmatched and will be my go-tos from now on!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Too much
Review: I purchased this wash day delight and my hair is soft and shiny, too silky that barrets don't stay, they lide out of my hair. The downside is the next day I feel that I have to wash my hair again and I know the shampoo n conditioner is causing it even though I rinse thoroughly, I just get that icky feeling on my scalp. So I'll only use this once every other month instead once a week.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products

The conditioner is really thick like a Vaseline it works great on her hair probably  not for people with fine hair though. I will buy this again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Bigger containers then youd think
Review:

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Curly haired ppl, rejoice!
Review: If Carol's Daughter ever stops making the Wash Day Delight formula, I may just shave my head and finally be done with it. That's how much I love this product.I have naturally curly type 2c/3a hair and a preference for longer tresses. I've tried many (many, many) products over the years, this one is my favorite. So glad it's back in stock!The shampoo smells amazing, is light yet suds up beautifully and rinses clean. I love that the bottle allows me to target application at the scalp!The conditioner though is really where the goodness is. It magically untangles the tangles! No more struggling with breakage or annoyingly painful comb outs. With other brand conditioners I had to use a lot of product to coat my hair and get the results I expected - not the case with this product! At most I use a tablespoon of the conditioner on wash day (my hair is long and I have a lot of it!) combing it through while still in the shower. It's the best!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: The smell is TOO OVERWHELMING!!
Review: I couldn’t wait to try this since everyone I know is raving about this brand. Although none of them have seen the “clarifying” version I decided to try since I needed a good clarifying shampoo. I mean if everyone says it’s a great brand usually all their products are great, right? Product felt great on my scalp, the applicator made it easy to apply and I could feel the deep penetrating clean but right after that an intense chemical smell that was the level of mustard gas. (I wish I was exaggerating!!!) I was gagging and choking in the shower trying to hurry up and rinse the smell out! Ended up vomiting the recent contents of my stomach in the process. Now I am not normally a scent sensitive person, seriously I love scented stuff (I buy Victoria Secret and Bath and Body Work products) but WOW I swear I was dying! I could taste the freaking smell. And it lingers for days in your hair!!! Even my husband said it smelled like I got a “perm or something”. Hope my hair doesn’t start falling out one wonders with such a smell what is really in that shampoo.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Sulfate Free Clarifying Shampoo and Conditioner Set with Aloe ($22 Value) - For Curly, Natural Hair, 2 Full Size Products
Title: Great product
Review: I enjoyed that it did not take much to lather with shampoo, and conditioner also the ease of detangling  hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Great buy
Review: I tell everyone to use this conditioner because it is my favorite. My sister has 4C hair, my hair is 4A and my mom has 4A/B. Works for all of us as far as moisturizing. Not too heavy on my hair and lowkey, when I mix this with flax seeds, I use it as a hair mask. Decently priced and coming from a black woman with psoriasis, this is great because it doesn’t irritate my scalp

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: An absolute dream come true....
Review: Okay, I know this is going to sound excessive for a hair care product, but I love love LOVE this conditioner. I have thin, 2c/3a, low porosity, brittle hair with extremely hard water.  (I use ion iron-removing shampoo to combat the hardness). However, the slip, scent, and softness of this conditioner are a dream come true! First, I don't rip my hair out when I'm brushing it. Second, it stays moist for days. Third, the scent... omg, the scent.  They should name it GREEN goddess conditioner because it literally smells like you're laying in a fresh meadow. It has a natural, earthy, gender-neutral scent (i.e. you can smell the castor oil if you know what that smells like). There are absolutely ZERO eye-watering, obnoxious perfume scents, so if that's what you like, keep looking. Otherwise, give this a try.  I was pleasantly surprised.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Love it !
Review: It’s so nice to support made in USA business and also one that is literally from the neighborhood where my kids were born. That being said, the product is phenomenal . I have 2 B curls and have been experimenting with a LOT of conditioners (dove, herbal essence, etc) to my detriment. After literally one wash my curls are shiny and bouncy and held their shape even after and awkward nap. Finally something that works for everyday and doesn’t require me to put on styling products just to see my curls.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: My Hair is Young Again!
Review: A few things: I don’t know about reducing breakage because I only began using this product this week so that remains to be seen. The strong perfume smell did take me by surprise, and I admit I didn’t look at the ingredients list until my first use and realizing the perfume-y scent from this was so strong (I work in health care, and don’t wear perfume-y stuff because of my patients). Also, I have a lot of long, thick hair, but it is very prone to breakage. Buuuut, upon applying this conditioner, it was so thick and luxurious, and I was able to comb through my wet hair in the shower incredibly easy with little product, I honestly could not believe it. I have never used a product that could detangle my hair with such ease unless I globbed it on.MY HAIR ACTS YOUNG AGAIN, if that makes any sense. It has the body and bounce it had when I was in my early 20s. I’m in my mid 30s now and have been disappointed in the change in my hair over time. This product literally changed my hair back to its golden days in one use!Yes, I’m giving it 4 stars, but this is because the perfume smell is so strong and unnecessary, and yes, it’s one of the first ingredients, which I really feel takes away from the quality of this product. Nothing but actual perfume needs to smell this strong, so I hope the makers of this product consider at least toning it down. But also I want to tell the makers THANK YOU for making this stuff! I could cry having my old hair back, I’m so grateful!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: It's ok
Review: I do not know why Carol's Daughter discontinued the Mirabella plum products, that stuff literally saved my hair. Ever since my brother died I've had horrible hair loss I'm 27 he died when I was 25, and that mirabella plum stuff stopped my hair loss. I wish I would have bought 50 bottles while they still had it on beauty outlet sites. This stuff is OK, it's doing just an OK job with the hair loss, it's very oily and has a really strong fragrance compared to mirabella plum. For hair breakage it's the best thing carols daughter has right now.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Wonderful Scent!
Review: Lightening the hair can have drying effects, which results in an increased emphasis on hair products that do not contribute to these drying effects (such as sulfates, parabens, drying alcohols). This conditioner not only provides ample moisture, but it also has such a wonderful, aromatic scent that stays on the hair post-rinse. I would definitely recommend this conditioner for those with dry, damaged, over-processed hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Shocked and impressed
Review: Shocked and Impressive. I have thin, weak wavy hair but a lot of it with frizzy and fluffy, this product has blown my mind and smoothed my tresses with out weighing bit down. My hair is soft and manageable.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Gross

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Shocked
Review: I really am shocked that this made such a difference on my dry frizzy hair. I have tried so many products and had pretty much given up. I have always had shiny straight hair but it became very dry and frizzy with menopause in addition to a Sjogrens diagnosis. After one use, my hair is SO much softer and less frizzy and dry. I don’t even know if I would still call it frizzy, it is very mild. I am a fan for life, so don’t change anything in the ingredients!! Thank you!

Title: Softer, healthier, stronger great smelling hair in only one use!
Review: I got this at Walmart on clearance for 5 bucks they had a few bottles.left only the conditioner I wish I would have bought them all I use it and leave it in for a few minutes my hair LOVES IT, IT MAKES MY HAIR SOOO SHINY AND SMELLS SOO.GOOD.FOE.A FEW DAYS. I have been growing my hair out for about 4 years now wish I would have discovered this product in the beginning of my hair growth journey it really works. I can promise you it's well worth every penny! I have good hair as it is but have a lot of split ends this product makes my hair look 1000x healthier and shinier than it.iit normally is I get compliments all day people say wow you have the nicest hair I have ever seen it is sooo healthy and shiny what do you do?!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: It Will Make A Difference
Review: I’ve only used it once so far and ordinarily I wouldn’t think that’s enough time to make a good review. This case however, is an exception. It’s the first time I have ever used a conditioner that actually made a difference. I have very fine, damaged, light colored hair that breaks very easily. I had extensions eight months ago and when I took them out three months ago I had a lot of breakage and damage. Usually after I wash my hair and dry it, there is broken, damaged, flyaway hair on the back of my head that will never settle down, no matter what I do. I used this conditioner one time, and my hair already feels smoother and stronger already. I have tried so many different products trying to get the same results, over time, that I got with the first time use of this product. I don’t know how it will react on other types of hair. But I can tell you, if you have damaged, broken, flyaway, baby hair like mine, it will make a huge difference for the better. It doesn’t feel greasy, it feels smooth and silky going through your hair, rinses easily and has a very pleasant aroma. Carol has a great daughter.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like the way this leaves my hair, with body and without frizz. I don't know about the reparative part, can't tell.The scent starts off strong and bright, mellows to a persistent whisper (to mix my metaphors). To me it's sweet berry with a little spice, including ginger.The scent may be designed to cover the seed oils, which by themselves don't smell good to some people, though they're fairly far down in the list of ingredients here. (The ingredients are listed in order by weight on the Amazon main product page under Important Information.)Came taped to avoid leakage. There was a film of conditioner on the tube, but it was slight enough that I couldn't feel it until it got wet. I don't think it leaked, I think it was from the manufacturing process.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: TOP 100 REVIEWER
Review: I am using this fortifying conditioner as a weekly deep conditioning treatment because the delicate and somewhat curly texture of my hair causes products like this to weigh it down, so daily use is too intense. Always a difficult balance because curly hair with a thin texture breaks and tangles easily so it needs a conditioner but the solution for my hair is weekly rather than daily and this product works well used that way.The scent is an interesting blend that is difficult to describe but it is more perfume than herbal. The concentration is quite strong so if avoiding fragrances in personal care products this may be an issue, otherwise liking or disliking the scent is subjective.The conditioner is thick and rich and the 11 ounce flip-top tube is large so it is a generous supply. No artificial dyes, parabens, petrolatum, mineral oil or animal derived ingredients are used and internet research confirms that this brand’s products are cruelty-free although not noted on the tube.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: This product won't disappoint you, it does exactly what it says!!
Review: I was in the hospital for a month d/t a serious condition ......after emergency surgery, I was taken to ICU and was unconscious for ten days....I stayed in hospital for a month and then rehab.  I had to learn how to walk again and use my muscles, very weak from not using muscles.  I had problems with the above mention and I told my son that I knew I had lost my hair, sister locks, d/t my inability to care for my hair.  I had been using Carol's Daughter Godess Strenght- leave in conditioner, Mimosa Hair Honeyand hair oil to prevent breakage.  Went today to have hair retighten today and the stylist that retighten my locks was amaze at the good condition my hair was in!  She kept saying " your hair is in good shape and strong!"  This was repeated several times by her, I was so proud!Thanks to Carol's Daughter, my hair continues to grow long and beutiful!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Fortifying conditioner, Moisturizing,Scent,Sheerness
Review: I've littlerly just took braids out my hair  wash my hair real good before applying this fortifying conditioner (NOW DEEP CONDITIONER) I have 4B hair (Fine) and let me Tell Ya THIS SHYT IS THE TRUTH MADE MY HAIR SOO SILKY SOFT I WAS ABLE TO COMB MY FINGERS THROUGH MY HAIR SUPER LESS TANGLES AS WHAT OTHER LEAVE IN CONDITIONERS I EVER USED AND I SOOO LOVE THE SMELL🤗🤗AND THE NATURAL INGREDIENTS IN IT THAT IM USE TO SO THAT WAS A PLUS FOR ME WANTING TO PURCHASE IT UNFORTUNATELY I BROUGHT THIS PRODUCT FROM SALLY'S AND GLAD I GOT THE LAST ONE IN STORE IT WAS 12.99 😒AND 2.00$ CHEAPER HERE 😯😏SO WEA U THINK MY NEXT PURCHASES GONE BE COMIN FROM 😉😉 ..NOW GRANTED DIFFERENT STROKES FOR DIFFERENT FOLKS I SEE SUM FOLKS DIDNT LIKE THE PRODUCT,BUT FOR ME IT DID WHAT WAS NECESSARY AND I SOOO LOVED IT I WILL BE PURCHASING SHAMPOO AND OIL AS WELL I WILL STICK TO THESE PRODUCTS AND I KNW MY HAIR GONE FLOURISH MORE🌺🌺AND LESS BREAKAGE

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Worked wonders on my fine hair after first use
Review: I bought this at Walgreen's on a fluke. I have very fine, straight hair with a slight wave of air dried that is very oily at the roots but dry and brittle at the ends.  My hair has been getting more and more fizzy as well.  Because of the pandemic, I’ve grown my hair out quite a bit (down to the bra strap line), but because my hair is so fine, it’s hard to do without my ends thinning out and breaking a lot.  I bought this even though it’s supposed to be for curly hair because it touted the strengthening qualities, which is what I need. I’ve also read about how castor oil is great for hair.On the day I first used it, my husband commented on how long my hair was getting while I was brushing before bed.  When I threw it back and turned around so he could see it on my back, he exclaimed, “wow! It looks so thick!”  Again, I have very fine hair that gets scraggly and straw-like very easily if I don’t brush it (which is hard because I can’t brush too much since it’s dry at the ends and therefore breaks easily).  I thought it was a fluke because I had just trimmed about half an inch off my hair.  But I’ve used it a couple times since I bought it and I’m just so thrilled with this conditioner! It certainly FEELS like my hair is stronger and it definitely looks thicker.  I can’t stop running my hands through it!I was worried about what it would do because of how oily my hair gets (I’ve been trying to train it for over a year by only washing a two to three times a week, but I’m just now barely getting to the point where day two isn’t a full on oil slick on my head), but I haven’t experienced any oiliness that I would attribute to ths conditioner.  It’s really hard for me to find a conditioner that will actually condition and moisturize without making my hair greasy by the afternoon.  So far, this conditioner simply leaves my hair soft all day.I wasn't thrilled with the smell, but it’s NOTHING like what some of the reviews here say.  I’m wondering if they got some sort of bad or spoiled batch. It doesn’t have an overpowering smell at all.  In fact, I can’t strand strong perfume smells because I have a sensitive sense of smell.  The smell is earthy with a hint of vanilla.  It’s not like most hair products so it threw me off, but its actually very pleasant once you get used to it. I think many of us are just used to that pretty flowery or fruity smell almost all other hair products have.  But the reviews saying it’s horrendous and overpowering to the point of giving headaches is very surprising to me.  I was using a conditioner before his that I could smell even just sitting around, but this one I have to put my hair right up to my nose to smell it. I was worried I wouldn't like it because it didn’t smell enough or as well as other conditioners, but it’s just right and definitely has grown on me. It’s a very natural smell that reminds me of being in nature—that’s the best way I can put it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I have been using this conditioner all week on my blonde, heavily highlighted hair since I do experience breakage after salon visits and thought this might help. And it does, to some extent, my hair feels soft and has more body and volume than usual which I really like but as for the breakage, I don't see a ton of improvement. It is however easy to use, it squeezes out easily so you have to be careful not to use too much since a little goes a long way and it is easy to distribute thru my hair and rinses great. The scent, well, it's not too strong which is good because I only marginally like it but it's only there while using it in the shower and does not linger.  Comb out isn't bad but not as effortless as some conditioners I have used. I did not see much difference in shine and actually get more shine from other conditioners like Seven and Purology. But it did leave my hair feeling pretty silky and thick.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: First of all, each of the ingredients are known to strengthen and grow hair, so combined together without any harsh chemicals, this conditioner soaks in and does exactly what it claims to as far as my hair is concerned. My hair is silky soft, less frizzy, and non-greasy with each use. But let’s talk about the smell…it’s a spicy, warm scent, almost masculine to me, but my husband loves the fragrance and thinks it smells fresh and neutral. He literally buried his nose in my hair to take it in the first time I conditioned with this product. The scent lingers as this conditioner really does drench the hair follicle doing wondrous repairs all the while. I’m used to conditioners that smell fruity or floral, so this is a departure for me, but my husband’s opinion of it is enough for me to not dock any stars over it. The conditioner works well, really well, so it’s a win for my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: TOP 50 REVIEWER
Review: This conditioner is very thick and creamy. It leaves hair feeling soft and hydrated. The castor oil and black seed oil make your scalp tingle a little in a good way if you use it with heat. I haven't used it long enough to say it strengthened my hair, but it definitely feels improved after only one use. I highly recommend this entire line.Thanks so much for taking the time to read this review. I hope the information that I've provided makes your decision a little easier.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I'm already a huge fan of the Carol's Daughter brand because I have been using the spray on almond milk leave in conditioner for a couple of years. I was hesitant to try their shampoos and conditioners because I assumed with all of the  oils it wouldn't work well for my thin, flat hair. I am so in love with the conditioner. It is thick and rich. I only need about a nickle to quarter sized amount for my hair that is a few inches past my shoulders. The scent it interesting and kind of fancy. The ginger and black cumin come though a lot but it smells like a perfume scent...not a food scent. I have the type of hair that gets tangled 5 minutes after I brush it and I have to brush it ALL the time. Whenever I use this conditioner my hair stays relatively tangle free and so soft and easy to deal with. It doesn't weigh my hair down at all even with daily use.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the invigorating scent of this product.  The ginger makes it a bit peppery (like celery is peppery, not like black pepper), and it helps to wake me up when I use it.  I've noticed that my fine hair has developed fewer split ends and those that do appear, appear at a much slower rate than before I used this product.  I only apply this conditioner once or twice a week as it tends to weigh down fine hair if used on a daily basis.  I store the tube with the lid up so that it doesn't leak.  I would recommend this product for men or women as it smells wonderful.I received this product for free in exchange for this review.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Love the smell
Review: I absolutely loved the smell of this conditioner.  It left my hair feeling stronger but silky smooth at the same time.  I think the smell is a preference thing - I really liked the way it made my hair smell.The only thing that was a negative for me was that the bottle felt as if some of the product leaked out during shipping.  It seemed sealed, but the container felt slick to the touch.  They should make sure the shipping packaging is protecting it from leakage.  Otherwise, great product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I generally like this company's products. My daughter has super tight curly hair that I would call 3B and a minimum. It is very frizzy and hard to manage so I'm always looking for that miracle that will help keep things under control. While this works, I can deal with the super strong smell. This isn't even on my head but I can't take it when my daughter walks by and she doesn't seem to care for it either. If you don't mind that sent then this is a good product but for me, it's overwhelming.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have fine but frizzy, color-treated hair that I abuse with the dryer and flatiron. So even with frequent trims, it needs extra help. So I thought I would give a very intense conditioner a try.This conditioner did a good job repairing my hair. Actually, a little too good, as my hair is now very soft and I needed to add styling products to manage it. This is a conditioner that I would only need to use once or twice a month for it to be effective on my type of hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Amazing!!
Review: I LOVED the Scent of this!!!I was super excited to have the chance to give this Brand a try... as a Curly Hair Specialist, I had heard about it from many of my clients and I must say that I was pleasantly surprised! This worked extremely well and the scent was to die for! No wonder so many loved it!! I wish they had this available for Stylist to sell!!! Would definitely recommend!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Works great, great price
Review: I like the brand - Carol's Daughter a lot. I've used their products before and there is a common running theme among them - a little goes a long way.Little conditioner is needed for my shoulder-length, very thick and heavy hair. Hair comes out really soft. Many of the ingredients are natural, and that can be felt when applying it to your hair. The smell is a bit on the stronger side but I do not mind it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have ridiculously dry hair and am forever in search of decent conditioners.  I am really impressed with this one.  First the scent was a little weird, but it's not too bad.  Everything else is great.  I left it on for a few minutes while I washed up and my hair was noticeably  less frizzy and soft.  I will definitely be keeping this in my regular arsenal of hair care.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Unusual scent from an unusual combination of ingredients, but very nicely conditioning, leaving hair soft and tangle-free. Easy to use in the shower since the product is meant to be stored with the cap down. A little on the expensive side, but a small amount is all you need for daily use.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This conditioner did a great job in keeping my hair tangle free. It adds more "body" to my thin hair. The scent is new to me but is pleasant. My wife has thicker hair but she likes it too. It comes in a 11 fl oz tube, which is a good amount. I would prefer it come in a pump bottle though.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like the way my hair feels after using this product.  I know most shampoo/conditioner products have added scents, but this one is not a scent I cared for.  It also seems to linger.  Good price for the quality.  They just need to figure a way to make it smell better.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love Carol’s Daughter Conditioner. My hair:• is softer• is glossier• is smoother• is more manageable• smells lovelyI give Goddess Strength Conditioner 2 thumbs up! I’ll recommend this conditioner to all my friends.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Awful Smell
Review: I LOVED Carol’s Daughter.  It hydrated my curls and reduced a ton of frizz.  Unfortunately, they changed the formula and it smells awful.  I stopped buying it becaue of the smell.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This deep conditioner feels great on my hair.  Feels very silky and hydrating when rinsed out but doesn't leave the hair heavy or greasy.  Has a weird underlying scent when using but not after rinsing.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Moisturizing but Stinks!
Review: This is a great conditioner. Very easy to brush my hair out after towel drying...however...I can't stand the smell! I want to throw up everything I use it. I'll be trying something else.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Works pretty good, makes the hair look good, seems to be made with good ingredients.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Terrible Smell
Review: Unfortunately, I couldn’t get past the smell. I tried to ignore it but I just couldn’t. Sadly, just threw it away.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: My Favorite Conditioner!
Review: Smells so nice and makes my hair feel amazing! #1 conditioner for me so far!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Super healthy, silky, and stronger hair!
Review: I love this product!!! A friend of mine gifted me the shampoo she had bought because it wasn’t the right product for her hair. I loved it and went on to buy this conditioner despite other reviews that it isn’t the right product for my hair type either. I still love the scent and how moisturized my hair feels since I started using this conditioner. My hair truly feels silkier and healthier.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Lightweight but deep moisturizing
Review: Large amount. Smooth consistency. Lightweight but very moisturizing.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Conditioner
Review: Works very good on hair keeps hair soft

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: I love this shampoo but the smell is not that strong as I bought for the first time
Review: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner. But I’m very sad because the smell is not that strong as before

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The conditioner smells good, I used it to detangle my hair. Also, I use it as a leave-in conditioner.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Amazing
Review: I don’t love the scent but my hair is SO soft and so much stronger so I don’t even mind the scent. And I only notice the scent when I shower, but not once it’s dry. I LOVE this stuff

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Paraben Free Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, For Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, 11 fl oz
Title: Love it
Review: One of the best conditioners in the market

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 1.0 out of 5 stars
Review:
Video Player is loading.Play VideoPlayMuteCurrent Time 0:00/Duration 0:07Loaded: 31.67%Stream Type LIVESeek to live, currently behind liveLIVERemaining Time -0:07 1xPlayback RateChaptersChaptersDescriptionsdescriptions off, selectedCaptionsCaptions off, selectedAudio TrackFullscreenThis is a modal window.



   I've tried other products from Carol's Daughter that never seemed to work well on my 4c hair, even after washing a bunch of HSN segments. I've compared this to other top-rated brands (TGIN, Maui, Aunt Jackie) and this product is definitely all hyped when it comes to true kinky 4-type coily hair.Disclaimer: I have color-treated (bleached) 4c hair that's very thick, dry, damaged, and easily turns into a kinky fro.💁🏾‍♀️ ABOUT THE PRODUCT'S FORMULA→ Product's Thickness: Very Thick.→ Product's Creaminess: Creamy like a thick whipped butter.→ Product's Scent: VERY VERY STRONG scent (like Men's cologne)→ Has obvious oil contents: No (more like a serum feel)💁🏾‍♀️ INITIAL APPLICATION / PRODUCT APPLIED ON HAIR:→ Weightiness on Hair Wet: very heavy→ The weightiness of Dried Hair: very heavy, weighs down as if you're hair is drenched in water.→ Stickiness on Hair: very sticky→ Water needed to detangle: Not a detangler, more of a styling product.💁🏾‍♀️ STYLING / APPLICATION:→ Best for dry hair (for styling): Yes, but it makes your hair have a "wet" look (but not in a curl defining way)→ Best for wet hair (as a base): Maybe, since it's so heavy (I tried on damp and fully dry hair). I felt like this would work better as a rinse out product.→ A lot of product needed on dry hair: Yes.→ A lot of product needed on wet hair: Yes, on damp hair since it's more of a whipped product than a cream.→ Adds Curl Definition: None.→ Adds Volume: No, weighs it down.→ Moisturizes when dry: No, it leaves hair feeling sticky and heavy.→ Dries down and keeps moisture: No.→ Does product sit on to of hair: Yes, this product feels like it coats the hair (laying on top of it) but the hair never absorbs it.→ Does product soften hair (when dry): No, it just makes it feel like wet hair. It bunches your hair up and doesn't help to separate your curls.💁🏾‍♀️ PRODUCT DUPES AND/OR SIMILARITIES→ This product reminds me of brands like Cantu, creme of nature, dark and lovely, more of the popular drugstore brands targets to WOC. The products that smell really good (and too strong) but don't really work the best for 4c hair.OVERALL/FINAL THOUGHTS→ I would NOT recommend this product for thick, coarse, coily, 4c hair because it weighs it down too much and leaves a sticky residue. This product doesn't feel moisturizing, doesn't add much slip to help with detangling, and it's a product that doesn't absorb well into my 4c hair. This product would be better for other wavy or straighter hair types who can stand the strong scent and desire heavyweight products. I would recommend tgin Miracle RepaiRx Curl Food Daily Moisturizer (link: https://www.amazon.com/Miracle-RepaiRx-Daily-Moisturizer-Natural/dp/B07K6TWB9D) for an everyday moisturizer as its simply the best for 4c hair. I hope this detailed review really helps :)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Not for me
Review: I have thick, wavy, coarse, frizzy hair and this product didnt do anything for me. It felt like glue, sticky, thick and weighed my hair down. I tried it with damp hair & dry hair for a week hoping for a different result but no, I guess it just doesnt work with my hair type.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: My new favorite!!
Review: It's AMAZING!! It is so slippery that the tiniest twirl of your fingers encourages immediate curls! It literally cut my styling time by 1 1/2 hours doing my finger twists. My style held strong for three days before finally getting frizzy, and even then it still didn't look that bad(but I always sleep on silk pillow sheets and that helps alot). Hair is incredibly soft and light. The one thing you'll notice though when you take a shower is that wherever your hair had contact with (shoulders, neck, face) will feel super slippery like soap when washing off. On the positive, it reactivates immediately with water so it's almost like you don't need conditioner when detangling so that's a big plus! This is hands on my new go to leave in/ styling product. Will buy again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 1 product  Serious curl definition
Review: Very great product for naturals the best I’ve ever tried.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: It worked! I have bouncy curls now!
Review: I never thought I could just let my curls air dry and be done, but with this hair mask that is very much possible! I’m so happy with my purchase! I no longer need curl gels or creams after the shower! I just let it air dry and my curls are so bouncy and defined! I’m very pleased with my purchase!I just apply the cream mainly to the bottom half of my hair after my conditioner and let it sit for 5 minutes then rinse!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: ZERO STARS - WORST. SMELL. EVER. And no way to get it out of hair.
Review: I shampooed my hair six times with anothe product and cannot get this horrific smell out of my hair. God help me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Best Conditioner I've Used
Review: This is the best conditioner I've found to work with my hair. I have what I believe is 4C hair and it has been very difficult to work with. I've attached a picture of my hair before use (2 weeks after last wash) and I may post an after as an update to this review. This conditioner cut my shower time for my wash day down from approximately 4 hours to about 2 and it leaves my hair soft and moisturized. I use it in conjunction with the Marguerite's Magic restorative cream by Carol's Daughter when I do a twist out and they leave my hair manageable and easy to comb through. I think I might be allergic to the Murumuru seed as, when it got in my eyes or nose when washing in the shower, I became hoarse and couldn't stop sneezing for hours the first time but this has worked so well for me I still intend to use it. On my second use I just needed to be careful not to get it on my face and that technique worked wonders. The benefits outweigh this con as long as I'm careful! Unfortunately this will probably prevent me from using their shampoo but I planned to use texture id on recommendation from a youtube influencer anyway once I finish my stock of shea moisturizer shampoo.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Great for Day 1 styling
Review: Love the hold, definition, and shine it adds to my hair on day 1. If you are looking for a good product for great day 2+ hair this will become dull, frizzy and hard to refresh. Doesn't become flaky or crusty put once the cast is softened it is hard to get the same results on day 2 or more hair without completely rewetting and reapplying fresh product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Love this!
Review: This is now my favorite product. It is now a permanent event in my weekly hair routine. I use it in my LCO method and it leaves my hair so soft when it dries. A little goes a long way so be careful, because it is heavy.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: New favorite hair mask (type 3c/4a/4b hair)
Review: The hair mask is AMAZING... im not a fan of the smell and it does linger in your hair (reminds me of the Aveeno lavender baby lotion) ... BUT it has amazing slip, left my hair super soft, and my curls were defined after using so I can’t complain. I have multiple textures and porosities throughout my hair but my hair is mainly 4a, low porosity. Sometimes products dont work in all textures of my hair but this one worked extremely well! This will definitely be a new staple in my routine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: This actually works !
Review: So I have the worst dry hair. Like the worst. When people say don’t use too much it’ll make your hair oily .. I just laugh. Not my hair. I can (and do) use straight oil on my hair. Anyway, I use this product instead of conditioner. I can really tell a difference in the  softness of my hair. It feels softer and healthier. I am for sure a returning customer.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: HOLY GRAIL HAIR PRODUCT
Review: THE HOLY GRAIL CURLY HAIR PRODUCT, PPL!!Everyone go buy this - and then go back and buy it again for anyone you love. This stuff lasts for days on end, doesn’t leave hair crunchy or frizzy - cost effective and a little bit goes an incredibly long way. I have spiral curls and this goes on great. I’ve bought it for friends with wavy hair and will use it for the rest of my life. Cannot believe i finally found a product that does it all. Get this. You’re welcome.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Good hold but SUPER flaky
Review: It has a good hold, but…. You don’t notice all the flakes that develop until you’re wearing a black shirt or lean against something and it looks like it snowed on it. It also does not leave your hair shiny. It creates a dull cast and take a very long time to dry.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: High hopes but didn’t deliver
Review: I am trying to find something less expensive than Kinky Curls custard. Tried this after spraying with leave-in conditioner and dried with a diffuser. Curls looked fine, but it was very crunchy and crispy and my hair felt ridiculously dry. The only thing i loved about it was the scent.Will try again and just let my hair air-dry, maybe it will be better but I personally cannot recommend this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Amazing product.
Review: I have issues with odors ; My friends know not to come around me with smelly ( perfumes soaps deodorant etc.)  this has a nice clean smell and does not linger.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Not enough moisture
Review: This curl quenching moisturizer didn’t provide as much moisture as I would have liked. I washed my hair and applied it while wet and it just didn’t seem like enough. I had to apply a pretty generous amount for me to be satisfied with it. I have a weird curl pattern that’s between kinky curly and wavy. Lol. My hair is also more on the fine side. Not very thick at all. Yes I told you all my hair is weird. I don’t think I would buy this again although I have loved all of their other products.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Says for curly hair but for my thick course frizzy hair
Review: This product was recommended as I live in Florida and the humidity really makes my hair frizz. I have been buying expensive shampoos, and I must say I like this better. Very comparable to those salon alternatives as far as rich lather and quality, but even better if you have fly away frizzy hair in humid conditions. Usually I have to wash and dry my hair and it looks better the second day after the frizz settles, but with this product I look more like I came from the salon the same day that I wash my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Smells amazing, great hold and shine
Review: This stuff is great! I’ve been using the black vanilla shampoo as well and I love it all. My curls don’t really curl anymore, just wave, but I needed something to give it great hold and shine. This stuff does just that. Smells amazing, slight crunch to it which I like, gives shine, and great hold

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Carols Daughter Coco Creme EXCELLENT Product!
Review: I love Carols Daughter products and was happy to see the launch of the Coco Creme line.  I have not been disappointed with this shampoo.  My hair is extremely dry due to having several processes on it.  I am always looking for a shampoo and conditioner to help with the dryness.  I am very happy with the results.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Works great, but may take a bit of time
Review: I did not like this shampoo at first, and wouldn't have used it again if I had another option, but at the time I did not. I'm very glad I didn't, b/c 2 or 3 shampoos later, the stuff kicked in and my hair started looking great and feeling soft. I am older, so my hair is dryer than it used to be, and its natural wavy/curly structure was starting to lose its oomph. Once this shampoo kicked in, everything came back to normal. I shampoo every other day in the summer and every 3 days in the winter, and this shampoo is now my brand of choice.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Will never ever put this near my hair again.
Review: I have natural hair. I wash, tshirt dry and add moisturizer. Have done this routine for 20+ years.I heard raves about this company. So I decided to try it.This left a nasty flaky film in my hair when it dried. My hair felt gross. It’s normally soft and curly and bouncy. This made me look like I needed a deep oil treatment. I had to check the bottle again to make sure it wasn’t supposed to be rinsed and I bought the wrong product. Nope. It’s a leave-in.Not impressed. I use Cantu, Olive Oil and Lusters with no issues. This was the worst.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Great Product. Heavy/Moisture Rich. Lasts a while.
Review: Can't go wrong with this product if you're hair is thirsty. It is heavy so this will only work with certain hair types. I use this as a leave in conditioner after I shampoo. By taking a dime size amount or less and distributing it to my curls (but not my scalp) when my hair is already wet. I just squeeze out the excess water and it locks in the moisture. One of these will probably last me 2 years considering how little I need to use since it is so heavy.My curls are fine so I would not recommend using this without diluting it for a leave in conditioner and I would not use this more than once per week as a regular conditioner. But that's just me and my fine curls. They can't take the weight.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Best find for my kinky curls, after 40 years of searching!
Review: I had stopped buying products since nothing seemed to work for my kinky, white-girl curls. I literally had started using the clippers on my hair so it wasn't long enough to curl up. But someone suggested this exact product, and I haven't looked back! It's now on my Amazon Prime subscription list forever...and cheaper here than anywhere I have looked. Thanks for making my hair happy again!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: The only Carol's Daughter Product I use
