Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Very thick
Review: It's very thick. Does not provide moveable moisture. Very tacky and sticky like glue. Won't be purchasing again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Perfect for new mexican high desert!
Review: Listen I love in the desert, I have 3C curls that go to 4C in places. So not only is it really dry but also I have to conserve water like crazy. This MELTS tangles and it smells so good, you will not believe how many compliments I get on my hair even on day 3. Like it's so moisturizing and makes me hair feel like the finest silk like babe get this just to try it

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Feel instant softness .. Great product
Review: My hair has been so soft after using this.. Wish I had sooner..

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This hair conditioner made my long hair softer and silkier.  The ends were dry before using this but it took only one application to really freshen up and moisturize my hair.  This is my first time to try Carols Daughter and I hope to soon try more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Like others, I really like the whole Carol's Daughter line.  Makes my hair look, and feel great.  I love that its sulphate free, and as someone who is sensitive fragrance, I love how this conditioner smells.  Its a winner all the way around.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: For dry hair issues only!
Review: Definitely will moisturize your hair!  If you aren’t already skipping days in between shampoos, you will once you start using this shampoo.  Very light fragrance.  Lathers up nicely.  For someone who doesn’t have dry hair, I would not recommend.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: I was disappointed. Made my hair hard
Review: I made a mistake and bought 2 of these. I have to dilute it with leave in conditioner cuz it makes my hair hard. I’m not happy with it and it wasn’t cheap

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am not picky about my shampoos. I do like coconut in my hair products, since I think both the scent and effect are good. This particular shampoo pumps out very little at a time, but it foams nicely, so that might actually be a feature.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is a great product, especially if you have dry and/or color treated hair. My wife has both and absolutely swears by it.  I wouldn't recommend it if you have oily hair. My son tried it and his head almost looked like he used pomade. But for everyone else this is a top line, quality product. My wife and daughter give it five stars, I give it four and my son's opinion doesn't count.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This conditioner went on nicely and left my hair feeling soft and silky.  It does not have a lingering aroma.  I have hip-length blonde hair, very fine textured, and it does seem to have moisturized the ends, which can look very dry.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have been so happy with this brand as far as hair products go. This made my hair feel so soft and I didn't have to condition it for 2 washes. Did it make my hair feel stronger? No. I like the smell and the feel of my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Soft hair
Review: Hair is very soft after using this product  :)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: this conditioner is moistening and has a nice scent.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Bought randomly, so happy I did ! Love it !!
Review: Wow ! I rarely write reviews but after getting out of the shower I fell in love with this set. I got it for cheap at Ulta and was like why not- best decision. If you like cocoa nut smells then you will LOVE this! Not much is needed to make it bubbly so a lil pump is enough ! Can’t wait to buy more !

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Good product!!
Review: I have a mixture of 4B/4C and I’ve just gone natural and by hair this is the only product that has truly moisturized my hair and clumped my curls. I love the scent as well and the texture is thick but very spreadable. I would recommend.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Sun, Sand, Salt
Review: Sun, sand, and salt makes my hair a mess in the summer as I enjoy my favorite activity - being at the beach.But once again Carol's Daughter shampoo comes to the rescue.This shampoo put life and bounce into my hair after a beach vacation after just a couple of shampoos.It lathers well and smells so good.A wonderful addition to the Carol's Daughter product line.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Item as described and fast shipping
Review: Item as described and fast shipping

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Amazing !
Review: My absolute favorite lotion! So good and applies so smoothly , you can’t even tell it’s there. I use this everyday and it’s perfect.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Great for adding moisture and setting twist outs
Review: Liked the value and the scent. You don't need a lot -little goes a long way. When issued with a leave in conditioner

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT WORKS FOR 4C HAIR
Review: At first I thought this would be another hair fail. I have 4C hair, and there are so many products that promise to be compatible that aren't, all they do is dry you hair out, and sit on top of it making it gritty and harder to manage. I have low porosity hair, and most products just don't work for me. I typically use this cream first, then add about a tablespoon of the Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Scalp Oil and Hair Oil Deep Treatment with Castor Oil, 7 Oil Blend and Black Seed Oil, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Hair Oil for Natural Hair, massage it in, and my hair is soft, and clearly moisturized.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Not good for 4c hair!
Review: I purchased this product along with the curl enhancing moisture cream for my daughter who has 4c hair. It did not work for her hair at all see pics(last two) however for my hair it did great! I have 4a/4b hair. It defined my curls perfectly! The moisture was disappointing especially since this product is supposed to be for very dry hair; It was just ok. Overall I will not be purchasing it again for my daughter but MAY buy it for myself. If you have 4c hair save your money!

Title: I get so many compliments on my hair
Review: So far I am please with this conditioner and the shampoo.  I have tried so many different products since I've gone natural about 8 yrs ago. I do not have natural curls,  therefore I need to moisturized my hair to bring the curls out. I've consistently been using this and I'm please. I use a different brand after shampoo and conditioner called leave in or rinse out conditioner by Shea Martin.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Spent 30 years looking for this
Review: I’ve literally been looking years for something like this for my very curly 3b/c frizz prone hair.  Most cremes are not strong enough to hold the curl and gels are too stiff and flaky and drying. This is perfect. I agree with other reviews that the scent is a bit strong and smells like mens cologne but I don’t hate it and it fades over time. I put it on damp hair in 4-5 sections and twist each section and then wrap around my finger and then shake my hair out. I usually wash my hair every other day and to reactivate I spray my hair down a bit and reapply some of the product. I understand that everyone’s hair is different and what may work for me may not for you but I’d definitely give this a try!

Review: Noticed my hair is not dry anymore and is feeling soft again.  Thank you

Product: Carol’s Daughter Coco Creme Curl Quenching Conditioner for Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil, Paraben Free Hair Conditioner for Curly Hair, 12 oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Retread my frizzy hair!! This and the Monoi Carol’s Daughter masks are really good. Don’t get the almond one though. It’s thick, and it makes your hair silky! If you have frizzy hair, you’ll still need something for your ends when your hair is dry, like Schwarzkopf for Ends.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Good Stuff! Not false advertisement!
Review: Loving this stuff! Was skeptical of the whole Jelly to cream thing, but it really is a noticeable change in consistency and I feel like it smells great and really helps soften and detangle my very,  dry, tangly 4a Hair.  Been using it as a daily co wash and really enjoying it!

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Smooths out curls. No more frizz
Review: I’ve always dealt with frizz my whole life. This conditioner is amazing in that it makes my frizz go away and defines the wave in my hair.I use old spice shampoo and then this. Hoping to find a Carol’s Daughter Shampoo that doesn’t weigh down my hair. The conditioner is amazing though.So many white people shampoo strips the moisture from your hair and it doesn’t nourish it like it needs to be. Even the standard white people conditioner doesn’t do much when applied at the end.I did try the shampoo that goes along with this but it weighted down my hair too much. My hair and scalp did really love the moisture though. I didn’t know my scalp needed moisturizing too.Maybe something else in Carol Daughter’s line up will work for me better. My hair is wavy, maybe even more curly than I know? I’ve had frizz issues my whole life and have never really seen my defined curls.This conditioner, though, does the trick. If I don’t use it, my hair sticks up all over.Highly recommend to buy.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: My curls are poppin!!!
Review: There is nothing to say about this product other than it is amazing for naturally curly hair...my hair is not dry at all with this product...

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: It's decent.
Review: I purchased this to help me detangle my hair thoroughly before going in with the shampoo from this collection, then deep conditioning with a masque from a different brand.It's pretty thick in consistency, almost like a curl cream with the look of a gel. It has good slip, nothing spectacular, but it gets the job done. My hair did feel moisturized and my curls were a little more defined after washing it out. I didn't expect the scent to be so heavy though. It's just straight rose, like a rose bomb hit your nostrils. Some may like it, I don't care for how fragrant it is.But other than the strong scent, it's a serviceable conditioner. I also like how much product you get for the price.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Best detangler!!!!
Review: My daughters hair gets tangled so easily and is so hard to brush out normally she cries her eyes out until I bought this conditioner !After applying to her wet hair t. Brush glides through her hair effortlessly ! The only negative thing i have to say is the strong smell . I don’t care for the smell it’s a strong floral scent but I’m willing to deal with it for the way it performs !

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 2b-2c thin, coarse, and dry
Review: I've always had problems with my daughter's hair. Her scalp has never produced oil. Her hair has always been dry and it tangles easily. If I go more than 6 hours without brushing her hair it does start to get matted. I tried all the usual white people conditioners, oils, deep conditioning treatments. I've tried a few products for African hair or mixed hair as well. This is the first thing that I've found that helps keeps her hair tangle free. It's so much softer and shinier. Which makes both of us happy because combing her hair used to be a battle.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Useless: neither detangles nor moisturizes
Review: This is a strange product. It neither moisturizes nor detangles (zero slip). I'm using it up, but honestly, this does nothing and I need to use products to supplement what this is supposed to do. Also, If you like rose-scented things, then this is for you. If you don't like rose scents or strong scents in general, then definitely stay away.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Great detangler
Review: This product is amazing if you have coily curls with tons of shrinkage, and knots this is the product for you, I dreaded wash day because of the tangled, knotted hair to only be in the shower detangling for over 45 minutes, but with Carol's daughter detangler not a problem detangles quickly, the slippage was amazing, moisturizing, very lightly scented. I recommend this product. This will be my go to detangler from here on in.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Your Hair Will Turn Frizzy + Dry
Review: Pros: With my hair getting longer, I really wanted to have a product that would have great slip. Yes - it has that and, yes, I did need to add lots of water to get a good slip.Cons: The scent is off-putting - like a cheap rose perfume scent. Once I rinsed it out, my hair looked frizzy and dry. As my hair dried, it felt weighed down and greasy.I don’t know how it got so many good reviews.Don’t recommend.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Horrible
Review: Honestly doesn’t deserve any stars. Lets start with the smell; definitely too strong. The consistency of this conditioner is like hair grease, and it didn’t help with slip at all. After rinsing, my hair didn’t feel soft and moisturized. Save your money and don’t buy this.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Nice idea, poor execution.
Review: It smells like Avon sss spray that our parents sprayed on us to keep mosquitos at bay in the 90s 😭 it stinks, and it doesn't work for detangling curly hair. It's too heavy for my own hair so it's not a product I'll ever buy again or suggest anyone else buys.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Small miracle
Review: My granddaughter is bi-racial and she has the most gorgeous soft curls that tangle very easily when she rubs her head against things. We have tried all kinds of remedies to calm her curls but nothing seemed to work until we tried Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream. We started using a Wet brush on her hair with small amounts of the detangler and we can get her hair comb out in about 2 minutes whereas before it took a good 20 minutes. I can't say enough about this product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Woow is so great
Review: Woooowwww this really works for real for real I have very thick curls I mean the very thick curls that be hard to keep moisture and looking wet instead of dry but this product was the best thing I ever got myself like really finally I found something that actually works for me keeps my hair very loose curls not dry anymore I didn't get the shampoo since I just really use conditioner and woow I really gotta get me the shampoo and more conditioner bottles very great product

Title: Softness

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: These are some key points in my experience with this product, but first I will describe my hair type..My length is right above my butt so almost 2ft of hair, my hair is previously colored but I have not colored it in over a year, its naturally curly, and is usually frizzy and dry.Now for the conditioner:- smells great: if you love rose water, you will love this conditioner! (Scent is a little strong though, if you are sensitive to scented things)- a little goes a LONG way! I have a ton of hair and used a very small amount compared to other conditioners- leaves hair soft and shiny (i didn't even need to put leave in treatment in after shower like I normally do)- jell turns into a creamy texture and has detangeling effect on hair- with most hair products i cant tell much of a difference in my hair after using, but this one worked great for me and my hair type and I'm going to keep buying it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 1.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I didn't use the shampoo so I can't attest to that and how well it works in combination with this product. What I can say is that I've used better conditioners to detangle that my hair that don't necessarily cater to kinky hair types and had better results. When I first received this and opened the jar, the smell was overwhelmingly delicious and super yummy so I just knew it was going to be a great product. The smell alone sold me and I know that Carol's Daughter has a great line of products (some of which are not as beneficial for my hair as I would have hoped). I will say that it does turn from a thick jelly consistency to a cream that's still pretty thick as well. I could feel some slip when I first rubbed it in my hands so I can tell that there is some slip and some cones in the mix. However, when applying it to my hair, I did not feel an immediate release of tangles or softening of the tangles or texture. It was at that point that I knew it wasn't going to do what I needed it to do. I should have just followed up with my normal Avlon 5 in 1. While the product was in my hair, I could not finger detangle anything and that as highly upsetting. After rinsing, I could definitely feel the cones and moisture in my strands but the tangles were there to stay and I just wasn't thrilled. It made a mess for me to detangle when rinsing out and I think I should have just stuck with what I know. I cannot say that this will work for all hair types as it felt dry just putting it in my hair. I haven't used it on anyone else to see what a difference it would have made but I'm afraid to. I may just hand this off to a family member who wants something to smell good when applying to their extensions or something. As a stylus, this could not be in my arsenal or backbar. Sorry.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Instant softness
Review: I have been growing my hair out and the longer it gets the more I am realizing that it is not completely zero upkeep to grow your hair out. My wife suggested that I begin using conditioner to soften my hair and to help with avoiding tangles. At first I bought the cheapest conditioner I could find to get the job done. I quickly realized that more than likely I would need to try some different products. I was not overly impressed with the cheap conditioners I tried.  They weren’t softening my hair at all.This conditioner is in a huge tub. I like that it’s easy to scoop out and apply as much as needed. The conditioner has a jelly sort of look and feel. It’s almost clear with a little bit of cloudiness. The fragrance is fairly strong. The rose is definitely noticeable. I did go with some thing that was fragrant because I figured if I didn’t like it then my wife could use it. The fragrance also lasts after I have conditioned my hair and it is dry. It’s nowhere near as intense of a smell as right out of the tub. Although it’s strong it’s a pleasant fragrance. It’s an old fashioned rose scent, very floral and clean.As for the effectiveness of the conditioner, it immediately adds moisture. When I add it to my hair, it is immediately softer. I have found that leaving it in for a few minutes also gives me a richer moisture experience.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I've been using Viori bar shampoo and conditioner and really liking it.  I saw this detangling conditioner on Amazon and decided to compare.  This is more like mainstream conditioner, thick, creamy, very luxurious feeling.  I have very thick hair that is over processed, growing out the gray and lots of curls underneath that like to tangle.  For years I used the heaviest conditioner products I could get.  Then I started using lighter products and realized I don't have to apply tons of heavy product for the same effect.  The things I like about this product....I like the fact in comes in a big tub.  Much easier to grab as much or as little as you want/need.  You really don't need much so it should last a long time.  My hair is below my shoulders and thick.  It feels nice and rinses cleanly.  I was able to brush my hair as easily as with the Viori Rice Conditioner bar.  Both seemed the same.  Perhaps the Carol's was a bit easier.  I was worried the Carol's product would weigh my already heavy hair down, but I just blow-dried it and it is nice and light and clean feeling.  The only thing I didn't love was the scent.  It smells strongly of rose (no surprise since it is a rose-water product) but it reminded me of the "old" days when my Mom and Grandma bought a lot of AVON products that smelled like this.  I'm kind of sensitive to scents so I generally go with no scent or very light cents.  I like the VIORI product because it is very, very, very light on scent.  It also rinsed a bit quicker but that is because it is a much lighter product.  I would definitely recommend this product if you like or don't mind the rose scent.  If you have youngsters with long hair that tends to tangle this would be great.  Don't use more than necessary though.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: love it
Review: i have straight hair but it’s always dry and sometimes it’ll get frizzy and i hate it. this helps more than regular conditioner and allows me to save some money because i end up using hair masks as conditioners sometimes and that’s costly! you get a lot so i like that but i’m not a fan of the packaging. i might move the product into a bottle that i can squeeze so i don’t get water inside the container when i need some. other than that the thicker texture makes it easier to get it all in your hair and not have to worry about it inconveniently sliding off and wasting product. i’ll be getting more for sure, it’s going to help me out a lot during the colder months.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Excellent pre-detangler
Review: I have 4a hair that is low porosity, very fine, tangles easily and absolutely cannot tolerate silicones. Because this conditioner has a strong silicone (dimethecone) in its ingredients I decided to use it to pre detangle my hair before washing instead of using it as a conditioner as directed.I wet my hair down in the sink, grab a piece of paper towel for the shed hair and begin finger detangling in sections. My hair is detangled in 15-20 minutes or less with very minimal shedding. It was unbelievable!  I then go to wash it out with the matching sulfate free Wash day Delight Shampoo and Pantene naturals conditioner.An honest god send will not use anything else to detangle this is now a staple product and I keep 2 jars on hand at all times. Excessive wear and tear shedding, breakage are a things of the past. retaining more length and fullness as a result and have only been using it for a month. Very happy with this product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have 2b/c hair bleached and dyed fantasy colors and I am figuring out what products work best for my hair. I prepoo with an oil mask, shampoo and then use conditioner or a mask and leave it on overnight, rinse in the morning. This conditioner works really well for my hair, it took a little tweaking though for me to get it right. The first time I used this I put it all over my head, and proceeded like normal. When my hair dried from my roots to an inch out my hair felt TERRIBLE, like it was coated in some fake silicone crap. I put more conditioner on my dry hair and shampooed my roots again and that worked much better, I just need to remember to keep this off my scalp. It smells amazing, very strongly of rose, but a good rose. It says its a gel to cream, but I didn't see the cream stage of it and the consistency was like vaseline, but don't worry, it rinses easily.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have thin hair, and most conditioners that I try work just fine for me.  This product, Carol's Daughter detangling jelly-to-cream conditioner with glycerin and rose water, was less than so-so for me.  You need a lot of product for it to be effective, and I found that it did not condition my hair, nor did it help with detangling (quite the opposite).  It has glycerin, isopropyl alcohol, and a lot of other ingredients, most of which aren't that slippery or hydrating.  I also don't like having to dip my fingers into the container.  The rose scent was okay, and not overpowering.  I can't recommend this product.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: So the first thing to know about this product is that is has a strong  floral scent! I like it but it may be overwhelming for some - and for us the reason we noticed this first is because it was simply popped in a bubble envelope for shipping and the top worked itself loose so we got half a tub as the rest was all over the envelopeIt is very rich and a little goes a long way! But it does a great job of conditioning and nourishes the hair without weighing it down ! Make sure to rinse well after use to remove all residue .Good conditioning , strong scent!

Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Smells great and works great...and a little bit goes a long way.I don't know if you can call a hair product versatile, but this is! I use it as a leave-in or a rinse-out.  I put a.little into a spray bottle, add water and. Keep it in the car for toucj-ups, I use it at the beach or pool to protect my hair from the sun and sea.It is incredible

My hair definitely combed through quickly and had less tangles after using this. The only thing is the fragrance is really strong. It smells like roses and the fragrance sticks around. That’s the reason for the 4 stars. The rest of the

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This tub of conditioner works double duty as a very emollient rich, wash out conditioner( for dry hair) or challenging tangle remover. I have a hard time using this product due to the pungent odor of the conditioner. I actually enjoy natural and artificial rose scents- that is actually one of the reasons I chose this product. But this is something else. I can't knock the product though, it IS good, and scent is subjective, so just heed my warning, this has a very fragrant rose scent.

Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars

The shelf life is shortened for that reason. Other than that the product is good. I recommend a pump to get the product out jar.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE

I ended up applying a deep conditioner. For people that needs help with detangling, this product might be able to help you.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 3.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have 4 c hair and was hoping this would work on my hair and it did not at all. I've been using Aunt Jackie's and will stick with that detangler instead, I used a lot of Carol's daughter product and it was a struggle to detangle my hair so I ended up going back to my current detangler. I think this product would be suited for folks that don't have 4 c hair. It does have a very lovely scent.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Love the scent and detangling, but not very moisturizing
Review: I love this rose scent even though they could dial it down a bit. I have 4A coils and it was very good for detangling my curls with a detangling brush. But after rinsing out, my hair felt overly dryer than other conditioners I use. I would buy again just for the pleasant shower experience/aromatherapy and detangling, but would still use another moisturizer in my hair

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Didn't detangle, don't like the smell
Review: This smelled overwhelmingly like rose and was just not pleasant to smell. I also got it thinking it would help detangle my daughter's horribly tangled curls. It did no such thing. I had better luck detangling with my fingers and nothing than with this product. I ended up throwing it away because it didn't seem to help and didn't smell pleasant.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love this concept of applying the conditioner as if it was a cream rather than the traditional bottle!Scent is amazingly pleasant and the product feels very premium!My daughters loved it as well and they really enjoying opening the product to use it themselves! (They are 5 and 2)Hands down 5/5 recommended.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This items works well in my daughter's hair for detangling and provides moisture to her hair. It is easy to use and to wash out. It is a good value for the brand, size of container, functionality, ingredients and price.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I really like this hair conditioner. It has a fabulous smell that reminds me of being a little girl at my grandma's house. I only needed a little of it to coat my whole head, it rinsed well and left my hair soft and without frizz. Very impressed with this.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Good Conditioner
Review: I like this conditioner and found it to be pretty good at hydrating my hair and making it manageable. I do prefer coconut oil conditioners/shampoos, especially in the winter, because those do the best with my hair. But this one is a great alternative.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Not good for 3b3c hair
Review: I didn't buy this at Amazon, I bought this in the store. I use this because I wanted to try it out. Seriously dried out my hair and made it feel like straw. I do not recommend.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: My kid is multi-racial with long, curly hair.  And, yes, it gets so tangled!Happy to say that this works beautifully.It smells great and allows me to get through her curls easily.So very happy with this!

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: sticky and does nothing for my curls.  smells nice tho.  dull, dry, and frizzy.  This product is not for natural hair made my hair feel like a steel im still trying to repair it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Detangle after protective style
Review: I used this product after taking down some box braids. My hair was easy to detangle and I didn't loose alot of hair in the process. My hair felt soft and moisturized after cleaning

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Love this stuff
Review: Took me several uses to get the hang of it for my hair, but once I did, I love it. I have wavy to light curl and it is colored and bleached.  I use the shampoo that goes with this conditioner working mainly into scalp. I then make sure my hair is really wet before adding this conditioner, I leave on while showering and use a wide tooth comb to gently comb out while standing under shower.  I is not heaving and the smell is really nice.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: It works!
Review: Brought my curls back to life.They just coil and bounce up with no other product used. The curls hold on their own ,no frizz. This is a great product

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Good stuff
Review: The smell is a little strong for me but I get over it, besides that this conditioner is amazing for any type of curls I love it so much

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: I'm addicted
Review: Yo! This product is so unique and I freaking love it. Granted, I've only used it once. I did a clarifying treatment and my hair was a rats nest. after using a scalp scrubbing tool with a powdered hard water treatment with a very low ph, my hair was matted. The treatment was necessary but so harsh and my hair was mad. I put conditioner on and my tangles FELL OUT ON THEIR OWN not kidding. I usually spend several minutes picking through knots before I rinse my conditioner out.  my hair feels smooth and conditioned but also weightless.Carol's Daughter delivered on this one. I'm so thrilled.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE !!!!!!
Review: OMG!!!! I have been washing my hair EVERYDAY for the past ten years with the SAME conditioner because I CANT use anything else. I seen this on tiktok a mother used this on her child then the shampoo and then the conditioner again that'd what I did omg I can get a brush threw it probably better than I could before it is soft smell isn't as strong as I wanted it to be BUT you can definitely smell it I feel like now I will be able to go a few days in between washes (I HOPE SO)I'll will come back and let yall know if I made it 2 or 3 days before the next wash and when I do if the conditioner can detangle these Matt's I will have. I have shoulder length blonde thick curly hair !!!

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Smooth and not sticky!!
Review: Works nicely! This is the first time we have purchased a jelly type moisturizer and my daughter likes it. She has type 4a hair and it keeps her curls soft!

Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   The scent is strong and smells cheap like dollar store lotion. My daughter's hair didn't feel conditioned even in areas where there was no matting or tangles. It feels great during use, but not after rinsing. Tangles stayed.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz

I bought this pretty randomly, not actually thinking it would work. My hair literally went from a frazzled, tangled mess, to soft, supple and perfectly straight after a single use! It feels so healthy now! I’m honestly shocked!

Title: It works with water
Review: I can comb my Afro out with this, and when I look at the comb there’s little to no breakage.  The price is reasonable also.  My hair is cotton soft and beautiful!  The best wash and go in my life

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz

Review: Quite greasy. Feels and smell like vaseline but added much daily moisture. Wish the smell was roses or lavender. the cost is a bit too high.

Title: 1.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This conditioner wasn't for me. It left a sticky greasy residue in my hair after using it. It didn't seem to wash out from the roots and I had to get back in the shower to shampoo it out. It made my hair feel awful afterward. It also made my hair tangle up.  I would not recommend.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Works on my long hair

I DO wish theyd make an unscented one that would GREAT as I see tht many ppl have mentioned the same thing. I have very long hair  that has a bit of curl and  wave in it so it gets frickn tangled..EASY!! The glycerin  in this really helps  the comb glide thru,to help this mess.

Product: Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner 20 Oz
Title: Heavenly smell!
Review: Oh my goodness this is the best product I’ve ever bought! It made my hair so soft and smells so wonderful!I wish they bundled their products more!

Title: Amazing detailer for curly hair! Smells wonderful!
Review: This makes my 5 year old granddaughter's hair so soft.  Fantastic detangler for her curly hair. Does away with her crying while I brush through her tangles. It smells really good, which is a bonus. I can't say enough good things about this conditioner.  Wish I had found it sooner.

Title: The absolute best product I’ve ever used on my hair!!!!!
Review: The best product!!!!Nothing left to say!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Don’t buy from here
Review: I think this is a fake. I bought hoping to avoid a trip to the store. My hair seems more dry and tangled than usual. I’ve been using this brand of conditioner for 3 years now and never had a problem with it until I bought from this seller. I usually buy from Target. Now that I’m comparing and taking a closer look, I noticed the labels are different.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Beware! All products not authentic
Review: Okay, so I was skeptical ordering this product from Amazon because (as mentioned by others in other posts), you don’t know if you’re getting an authentic product from a legitimate seller. So, I ordered once. I was happy with the product (conditioner) and decided to reorder, during the quarantine. Well, that was a huge mistake. I don’t know what has been done to this product, but upon application- my skin began burning almost immediately! I could hardly rinse it out before my ears, parts of my scalp and hands started to swell. By the time I removed most of the product from my skin, my hands had already blistered. Twenty four hours later and they are completely infected. I don’t know what this product is, but it is not the same that ordered previously. The reason I was so satisfied with the first conditioner I bought (via Amazon) was because it was gentle, not harsh. Second time around, not the same! I’m sitting right now trying to decide if I will need oral antibiotics from my doctor. Buyers, beware.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Not for my hair :(
Review: The only reason I'm giving low starts is because this product didn't work for MY hair. Smelled like heaven and I desperately wanted to use the product. I have baby fine hair but even with the combined leave-in conditioner it was a nightmare to brush out. I had to use my usual leave-in product to try and fix the rat nest my hair turned into. I was really bummed because I wanted to like this product since I heard such wonderful things. I'm giving a 2 instead of 1 only because the scent was so lovely.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Awful
Review: The name of this product is perfect if it's taken literally, viz. if you want dry dull hair... this is the perfect product for you. If you want healthy soft glowing hair, stay far far away.I get so frustrated with bad hair products that do more damage to your hair than the original state. This is one of those products, and since this is the only product I've tried--I will be avoiding this brand entirely.Dryness and increased breakage were noticeable after first couple uses. Finally threw the rest of the product out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Healthiest Hair I've had in 20 years!
Review: All I can say about this conditioner is WOW!  I have very coarse, dry and wavy/curly hair. I have tried every product imaginable within my limited budget and nothing has ever worked. I started using the Black Vanilla Shampoo several weeks ago but was unable to find the conditioner in a store near me. After falling in love with the shampoo I was on a mission to find the conditioner. I washed my hair tonight using both the Black Vanilla Shampoo and Conditioner and just let my hair air dry. My hair has never been this soft/shiny/healthy looking since I was young. I will be ordering another bottle of both next week so I don't run out. If you have thick, coarse, frizzy, curly hair give this a try. The scent is so beautiful yet not overpoverpowering and the quality is amazing. I am so excited to finally find something that actually works on my hair and the price is unbelievable. I hope they never stop making this product line.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Read before buying
Review: This shampoo makes my curls more detangled this is good for the look im aiming for. This shampoo is extremely good and i highly recommend that you do not hesitate to purchase this. This applies to people with a rough hair texture as wel

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: One of the best 5min conditioners I've used. Highly recommend!
Review: One of the best 5 min conditioners I've used. I previously used a DE conditioner (not the reconstructor one) that was sold in that 32oz jug. Since I ran out of that conditoner, I had to find something else. On a side note, the DE conditioner did absolutely nothing for my hair. I simply thought quick conditioners did nothing for my hair. After I ran out of the DE conditioner, I would just skip this step and move straight to the deep conditioner. It didn't feel softer nor was it easy to remove the tangles in my hair. It may as well have made my hair more matted and tangled. I have ~4b hair but it is on the fine side in terms of how thick the strands are, and my hair is about mid bra strap length. Softness and tangles are the key issues I need my conditioner to fix.Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Conditioner has a fabulous smell and made my hair feel so soft after rinsing out. I hope this comes in a bigger bottle. Used about half the bottle in one wash day. Highly recommend.As for the packaging, it was good. The pump was off when it came out the box but when using it I was able to snap it back into place. Otherwise no mess in the box.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Great scent-ok moisturizing.
Review: I tend to have very dry ends, and through some quick online research this product was recommended to me.  It smells amazing, but could stand to be a little more moisturizing.  I only shampoo my roots and only condition my ends, to avoid dry ends/oily scalp as much as possible, but after using this product my hair feels base level moisturized instead of nicely conditioned.  That said I do have a subscription to this product, but if you're looking for an intense, moisture rich product, look elsewhere.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Helped me Dramatically
Review: I really like this product, I been using other Carol's Mimosa Hair Honey  for awhile.  I've started using the Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner and shampoo a month or so before COVID, since my hair salon has been closed for sometime.  My relaxer has been long over do and these products has help to maintain my hair.Thank Carol's Daughter...

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Very Disappointed
Review: I wanted this to be awesome but it was NOT. Smells amazing, but instantly makes my hair feel like straw in the shower. And it isn’t any better once rinsed or combed or dried. Makes my hair feel awful. It just didn’t moisturize enough for me. Left my curls stringy.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Too thick for my hair
Review: I bought the product because I love vanilla and in that regard, it did not disappoint. It smells great and the scent lingers. The conditioner feels soft and creamy. It worked great the first couple of times I used it. But it does not detangle my hair easily unless I use quite a bit of it, which wears my hair down. And it does not much for my frizz. I'll work through the bottle but I don't think I'll be buying it again. This is not a good fit for my curly/wavy thick hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Awful!!!
Review: This product is awful.  It makes my hair feel like cardboard.  I have to use it in between treatments to repair the moisture.  Will never buy again.  Do not recommend.  I try to support local small businesses but this is not the one.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: It does not moisturize
Review: Dried my hair out. Not moisturizing.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Smells Nice but Not Hydrating Enough
Review: I bought this while I was trying different conditioners and I like it! It has a nice vanilla scent that’s not too overwhelming and leaves my curly hair feeling soft and smelling nice. Though it was a good price and I like it, I will likely not be purchasing it again because it did not sufficiently hydrate my hair and left it still feeling dry

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: WORST PRODUCT I HAVE EVER USED IN MY HAIR
Review: This shampoo in conditioner was by far one of the worst products I've ever put into my hair! The shampoo would not rinse out,  The conditioner did not help at all. I could not even come close to coming through my hair after using this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Not a good source for dry hair
Review: I wanted to try a product that is black owned and works well with 4C hair. This was a huge disappointment. My hair is dry and brittle. I adopted the suggested routine shared on their bottle/ product page and the results did not improve.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Not the hype

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Not for my hair and skin
Review: Not for my curly thick hair unfortunately.Leaves my hair fragrant but dry and my sensitive skin breaks up if I sweat due to the residue coming down from my hair to my face. It's a shame because I wanted to love it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Made for tender-headed
Review: I started relaxing my hair at the age of 13, because I am tender-headed. Two years ago I went natural and is extremely painful to wash my hair. This product line has made so easy and painless. I can comb my hair As I shampoo and conditioner. I recommended for those with very nappy hair or those who is tender-headed.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: I’ve heard great things about this brand but was disappointed in its performance.  When I applied it, didn’t feel like it was softening or absorbing.  After using, it was almost impossible to de tangle my hair and it didn’t seem smooth or conditioned at all.  I have thick, wavy hair and this didn’t work well on my hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: This conditioner is fantastic
Review: I love how his makes my hair feel and smell. It gives of just the perfect hint of vanilla to make my hair smell amazing.  It makes my hair soft and easier to brush through and is moisturizing without leaving my hair greasy. Myself and my teenage daughter both use it and love it. Will purchase again!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Best detangling conditioner out there.
Review: If you have thick curly/wavy hair and you feel a bit like Medusa trying to get a brush through in the shower...(Or hell, if you're just time conscious) buy this conditioner. It's lightweight, detangles better than anything else I've tried in my life and is an excellent moisturizer. You'll probably need another conditioner or other product for protein, but for everything else...This is excellent.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: I am a repeat buyer!
Review: I have curly, red hair and this product makes my hair look & feel amazing!  I have purchased this brand many times and this scent is GREAT!  Always my "go to" brand!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Smells amazing but not for me
Review: This smells absolutely incredible, but seems to do NO favors for my thick, extremely dry, coarse wavy/curly hair. Every time I use it, my hair definitely gets extremely tangled and feels much dryer than it already was. I wish it worked for me, but my hair just doesn't seem to like it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: not the real product, i don't think. buy somewhere else
Review: top was unscrewed, with  product spilled. Also doesn't smell right, the real product smells great, this kind of stinks. this texture is also different. it's possible that the company changed an excellent product for a weird one,  but i doubt it. i will re-order from sally's

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Great conditioner! Would buy again!

Title: More like hair lotion
Review: It smells like a vanilla candle. Despite rinsing thoroughly, my hair feels greasy and heavy. I had tangles when I tried to comb wet hair. And my hair was oily and greasy within 12 hours. It felt like I rubbed lotion on my head and couldn’t rinse it clean.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz

Review: I have tried several sulfate and paraffin free shampoo and conditioners and this is the most amazing product I have ever used. My hair came out phenomenal. It was bouncy and shiny and silky. Couldnt keep my hands out of my hair. Wow. Will buy again and more of thier products. I used the shampoo and conditioner together.

Title: Great for kids

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz

Review: I never write reviews, but this was so good I had to!! I used this and Maui Moisture heal and hydrate shampoo (the purple one). Seriously used them for the first time last night and my hair is so silky soft. I bleach my hair and live in a really dry climate, so I had just accepted my hair would be dry and brittle forever. Woke up this morning to the softest hair I've ever had and I could literally comb through it with my fingers. Absolutely in-love with it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Can make the dullest, over processed hair soft and shine!
Review: Fantastic conditioner for dry, color processed hair. I have longer curly hair that is very dry. I have color treated my hair for 20 yrs (highlighting since I was a teen) and it has taken it's toll. My hair is course and lacks that luster/shine we all seek. After years of trying traditional conditioners (it seems every product has a line) with little satisfaction, I thought outside the box. I went to my local Target, went for the small and often neglected multicultural section of beauty products and bought several different brands. I am embarrassed to say, that it never dawned on me prior to that. I purchased leave in conditioners, hair masks, creams, sprays and good old conditioner.Methodically I tried each product in hopes of a soft, bouncy, hydrated curls. Carols Daughter Vanilla conditioner nailed it. My hair is silk soft and manageable with this product. I only need a dab the size of a quarter to half dollar and let it soak in while I shave  or loofa. Just a minute or two and rinse. My hair is easy to comb through, smells outstanding and shines! Yes, the dull, course over processed hair shines. This stuff is impressive and worth every penny.On a side note, although I love this conditioner, I am not a huge fan of the shampoo in this line or spray leave in conditioner. The shampoo feels thick and my hair doesn't feel clean. The consistency, while probably good for my hair feels oily and it is as if I can't wash it out? The leave in conditioner smells amazing, but I don't really see or feel a difference in my hair when I use it.As for where to purchase, Walmart and Amazon seem to be neck an neck on price. It varies by a few pennies depending on when it's purchased. Target is always $1 to $2 more per bottle.

Title: Made my head itch

The back of my head and neck became itchy after using. My daughter scratched her head in her sleep so much that it drew blood. I think it just dried us out. I used it about every other day and I think that is too often to use this product. Would be better for someone whose hair is in a protective style, in my opinion. Smells great, just didn't agree with me. We discontinued using this product because of that.

Title: It's doing a good job of keeping my hair moist
Review: I have very thick, coarse, 2a-2b curly hair and wanted a moisturizing conditioner without sulfates or silicones and decided to give this a try. It's doing a good job of keeping my hair moist, and isn't too hard to lather like some natural products. It works better than a lot of natural conditioners I've tried. I also enjoy the scent, very strong vanilla! I gave it 4 stars because my hair is still pretty dull looking. It's definitely doing a lot of work (my hair is pretty soft using it, when without conditioner, it's like steel wool), but it could be doing more. The hunt for the perfect conditioner continues!

Title: sweet fragrance but it seemed like once I rinsed my ...
Review: Having seen this conditioner heavily advertised on television, I thought I'd give it a try.  It's got a lovely, sweet fragrance but it seemed like once I rinsed my hair, the fragrance was gone.  It made my hair soft but I didn't notice any difference in the rate of split ends - - which is important to me as I have very dry hair/scalp.  Maybe if the user has more oily/less dry hair, they'd have a better experience.  Overall, I found this condition to be middle-of-the-road.  It was okay but I'm not likely to buy it again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Versatile, vanilla scented luxury for your bath
Review: I loved this conditioner even more than the shampoo! It leaves my waist length hair SO soft and while it took a little experimenting on my part to figure out how much I needed, it turns out, it's not much at all! A little goes a long way! Sometimes I just use it as a detangler after the bath and leave it in rather than dealing with rinsing all my hair all over again. Everything it does, it does well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: My dream come true!! I'm not allergic to it and IT WORKS!!!
Review: Blown away!! I'm not allergic to this product, and omg the magic it works on my wavy hair!!! I didn't know my hair could look this good as with using the Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla conditioner and shampoo. I had been using the shampoo and loved it, but because of my allergies, don't trust conditioners. I finally gave in to temptation and bought the conditioner, and I am THRILLED with it!! I didn't know my hair could show curls and not be frizzy!! I thought my hair texture was frizzy!! IT'S NOT!! Carol's Daughter smoothed my hair and enhanced the curls SIGNIFICANTLY!! I mean, the love I have for this product...... I have been telling everyone in the world about these products and trying to force people to use them!!I read a lot of reviews on here, and I know this product was -originally- formulated for African American hair textures (the company has since been bought by L'Oreal and the formula has changed..... Sucks for the people who used to love it and it doesn't work for anymore!!), and I read a lot of reviews of the conditioner before I bought it. I didn't know for sure which reviewers were black and which were white to compare hair textures, so I just want to state that I'm a middle aged white woman with medium length wavy hair. There ya go!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: A M A Z I N G
Review: I purchased this product by accident and it's the best mistake I've ever made. Let me tell you why: I shaved my head two months ago and my hair texture completely changed. It went from wavy to super thick with tight curls. Also I moved to Southern California so my hair is always dry. After I wash and apply product, no matter what it was my hair was always dry like a chip. 🙄 Okay, I used this product one time, and my hair has ALL THE MOISTURE. 😩🏌🏾  Prior to using this I wasn't even able to comb through my hair once it dried. My hair dried two hours ago and my comb is gliding!! And my hair is soft as ever. I'm going to buy this entire product line. There is magic in this bottle. I'm going to attach two pictures of my hair completely dry before and after using this magic.✨ My hair looks 100 times more hydrated, I'm in love.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Conditions 4a/4b low porosity hair well!
Review: Preface: Now I've been getting mine from walmart, but I'm adding my review here as I've added it to my hair care list.I have 4a/4b low porosity hair, so I've been struggling with dryness since fall began.Grabbed this with the shampoo after trying out the combing creme. Don't have to use a whole lot on my hair, smells amazing. I use it after I deep condition (10-30 mins) and will leave it in while I finish up my shower. (I have an odd out of order wash routine lol).If you have curly coily low porosity hair and you're struggling with persistent dryness, give the 4 in 1 combing creme in this brand's line a try before you grab this conditioner/shampoo.I do not recommend for a cowash, doesn't really have any cleansing properties that I can feel unless you add ACV to it or something. But their shampoo is pretty gentle in my opinion if you want to try that in place of a cowash.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: it does the opposite
Review: instead of curing dry, dull brittle hair, IT CAUSES IT. I so badly wanted to love this. it smells so lovely and I love the ingredients used, but the WAD of hair that rinsed out of my hair in the shower was devastating. my hair was dried out and tangled even after leaving it in the 3-5 minutes. Im so bummed.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Moisture!
Review: Pros: instantly improves hair's moisture, improves moisture over time, makes my kinky curls pop, so moisturizing that I only need to apply a few drops of jojoba oil afterward to keep my hair moisturized for at least 4 days (picture shows hair on day 3 after wash), seals moisture in well, lightweightCons: need to use a lot of conditioner, not a bargain, can make hair feel oilyWarnings: this is not for people with oily hair or even normal hair. It can make your hair feel oily after 2 weeks of use. Should also use with the same shampoo for best results, since I think the shampoo actually provides the moisture and this conditioner just seals in moisture very well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: The only thing that could separate me from KeraCare was the fact that the local BSC where I buy the product was closed for the d
Review: First off let me say that I am a product junkie! I've tried/ used a little bit of everything for my hair.  I have 4a/b/c hair throughout my head and the shrinkage is out of this world.  May 2014 I dyed my hair  and once the new growth came in, I immediately regretted it.  My hair was extremely dry compared to what was coming in.  I bought this product at Target with little expectation because I have been a KeraCare fan since my relaxed days.  The only thing that could separate me from KeraCare was the fact that the local BSC where I buy the product was closed for the day- and my hair needed a wash bad!  Let me just say this- this product is fabulous!  It works wonders for my hair.  My hair feels so sleek and moisturized after conditioning.  My wash day regimen is a long process, mainly because detangling takes forever, but this product has shortened that time tremendously.  To top it all off the price is great and a little goes a long way.  My hair is super thick.  Normally it takes about 3-4 handfuls (dime sized amount- yea right LOL) of conditioner for me to get every strand; but, with this product I only need about 5-6 pumps and it's all the way through.  I usually wash with shampoo and conditioner, oil treatment with a plastic cap for about 30 minutes, and then this product for another 30 minutes.  My hair feels so soft and sleek and awesome afterwards!  I still use KeraCare, but I have definitely added this in to my regimen.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Hydrating Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Shea Butter, Biotin and Vitamin B5, 12 fl oz
Title: Contains sulfates and silicone
Review: These products are advertised to not have harsh sulfates or silicone, yet both shampoo and conditioner contain them within the first 10 ingredients. These are not CGM approved.

I started taking collagen and pairing it with this shampoo/conditioner and noticed my hair started to fall out less and less. I didn't purchase this shampoo set until March so within 1 month my hair has drastically changed. I got rid of all the shampoos and soaps that have all those unnecessary chemicals and will only use shampoos like this! I also saw you can purchase this in Target!

Title: Nice product
Review: I have tried nearly every conditioner there is, and I was pleasantly surprised by this product. It actually does something to help with dryness, frizziness, and tangling, and it makes my hair moist without oiliness, and soft and smooth and manageable without stiffness or tangling.I am very pleased and I recommend it. I gave a couple to a friend as a gift, too. It has a slight scent, nothing that special in that department, but as to the difference it makes for hair appearance and management, it’s good stuff. It is very reasonably priced, too, which is much appreciated.
