Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Read this if you have Locs!!!
Review: I've had my sisterlocks for almost 10 months. I went through the entire summer trying to figure out why my hair would have a gray looking film to it after washing it. The shampoo I used before this was thick and I had to dilute it with water to use it. I saw a review for this product on YouTube and I was intrigued. So I bought it and I'm so glad I did.This product is amazing for any type of locs. It leaves my hair squeaky clean, no film, no build up. No need to dilute it. Just get to work and it smells amazing. I use the Rose scented one for my hair and the Aloe Vera scent for my boys. After washing I immediately oil my scalp and my hair is good for another 2 weeks.My sister who has had sisterlocks for over 10 years tried it and she loves it as well. She uses it on her son and daughter who both have locs as well. Needless to say I give this product 5 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: A Holy Revival in Two Bottles
Review: Not only did this heavenly floral scent transport me to a to an 18th century rose garden, it also helped me block out the sounds of screaming and yelling from my teenager and toddler. The shampoo left my hair feeling lightweight and clean. The conditioner left my hair shiny, silky and soft. The two combined literally revived my dead, over-bleach blond hair and turned it into healthy, curly locks of gold... which I assumed was absolutely impossible. 😳 They say it only takes one wash. I was a skeptic. Now I’m not.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Strong floral scent
Review: I love the brand. It does leave your hair squeaky clean. Wasn't expecting such a strong rose/floral scent though. The scent lingers. It can't give you a headache if you are nose sensitive.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Freaking fantastic
Review: Listen....I have never "loved" a shampoo or conditioner. I always switched them up and never stuck with the same two, twice. I have dry skin and scalp...like..very annoying dry dandruff. Now, I got the dry scalp under control with the OGX Tea Tree Treatment. Alongside with my dry scalp, I wanted my hair to be smooth and hydrated.  Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Rose Water is THE BOMB. The scent stays in my hair for days afterwards, the conditioner works so very well with detangling and hydrating my hair, and the shampoo cleans my scalp GREAT. I have nothing bad to say about the two products. I will never ever stray away from them. These are my forever hair products. My hair stays soft, smooth, and clean for days. Just a great great GREAT shampoo and conditioner!!!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: It's even wonderful for straight fine hair
Review: This is the best shampoo that I've ever used and the conditioner is even better II'm a Caucasian girl and I have straight fine hair and it has done absolutely wonders for it it doesn't make it greasy my hair has growingit's great for color treated hair, and it smells wonderful, im going to have to order more because my granddaughter just loves it and I gave some to my daughter for her birthday and now she wants to use it. The conditioner is so amazing you  will probably go through two or three bottles of shampoo before you need a new conditioner tub, and you only need just a little bit of conditioner ,i promise you won't regret it.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Great Shampoo!
Review: I have longer blond hair that is highlighted every 6-8 weeks, so I do my best to wash it as little as possible to prevent damage.  I also have oily skin and workout, so this is where I am ecstatic about this shampoo.  Super light, gets right to the scalp and rinses clean.  My hair feels wonderful and bouncy!  It is also free if the nasty stuff—silicones, etc.  I wish the conditioner didn’t have all the silicones in it so right now I am using an in matching conditioner.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Shampoo still not thick enough for me.
Review: I loved the applicator tip, everything else, not so much.The scent can be very strong and most likely because we're so accustomed to a sudsy shampoo, I felt that I wasted the product in trying to get suds on my hair.  It wasn't the case when I washed my daughter's hair and I think because the product is too watery and not thick you can easily get the impression that it's being washed away in your hair and you need to apply more than you should. For that, this is not for me or my family.We will keep buying the conditioner though. Even though I still found the scent too strong, I loved the cream based conditioner brilliant! Easier application to hair without it getting to your scalp and thick enough to make you feel the product is still being absorbed by your hair follicles.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Gorgeous!
Review: I have used this for 3 washes and my hair has never felt better! I was initially worried about the liquid to foam feature but it goes on pretty evenly when applied at the root. I did notice more bubbles when I added more water but the scent in HEAVENLY. I smelled like a rose garden in full bloom. The gel conditioner made me feel like I was in a spa and I was able to massage it into my scalp which I usually never do to avoid buildup at the roots, but it rinsed away clean! My curly hair has been bouncy, shiny, and has much less frizz. I'm very happy!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Great Smelling
Review: I love Carol's Daughter products and I'm especially in love with this product now. If you love the smell of roses, you will love this product. The Smell last for days and it leaves you hair soft and manageable. It's also easy to rinse out unlike other shampoos where you're left rinsing hair for what feels like hours.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Disappointed ☹️
Review: I wanted to love this and thought I would after reading the reviews. Even though I love the scent of roses this is overpowering. Worse yet, it made my hair a dry, tangled mess. I used it several times to be sure. My hair looked terrible and lifeless with no volume. So this is not for everyone. I was hoping it would be great for my hair but I'm sadly very disappointed!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Great smell and cleanses well...
Review: Good lather (after the first wash), love the rose scent, not super strong, but you do smell it, cleans really well...but because it is a micellar water-based cleanser, it takes a lot to wash your hair...I can only get about 2.5 uses out of one bottle...which is why I gave four stars...

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Can’t open bottle

I’ve had several people try to open it for me thinking I was just too weak to open it, but no one seems to be able to get this bottle open. I have no idea how the product works, but the design is definitely flawed.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces

Review: Mmm. Smells so damn good. Makes hair squeaky clean. Recommend a deep condition treatment after using. Lathers very well. I like the liquid application for my scalp. I only use every other week on wash day. But it is hard to resist because it smells so wonderful.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces

I used it twice and both times followed up with a co-wash shampoo. The conditioner did help some with all of the tangles. I will not buy again.

Title: Causes horrible burn in throat and nose
Review: I wanted to love this. Unfortunately I can't keep using it. It creates an awful burn in my throat and nose that doesn't go away for hours. The first few times I thought maybe somehow I'd gotten a tiny bit in my mouth. But no matter how careful, I end up feeling like I'm coming down with a bad cold when I'm done. I do not have any known allergies. I'm a bit worried there's something dangerous in it!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Smells Like Soap, Very Greasy
Review: I have type 4b/4c hair, and I saw a sponsored post for this product on TikTok. I decided to test this product out because of the great reviews and the appealing ads. I purchased both the shampoo and the conditioner from my local Target, but I purchased the Aloe-scented one off of Amazon. I opened the lid of this rose-scented one to an unpleasant stench. At first you got a hint of rose, but it left a sour after-smell. It reminded me of the soap that I used for blowing bubbles as a child. I wish that I could give the scent column zero stars, and I will never purchase this product ever again. It left my hair greasy and made it harder for me to detangle. I would recommend buying the other wash day set with aloe and glyercin in it instead. It has a much better smell and left my hair softer. Would not recommend this one to anyone.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Works GREAT!
Review: I hesitated to purchase the sulfate-free shampoo, for fear of no sudsing.  The products suds are fine and in combination with the conditioner, my hair feels and looks great.  The rose fragrance is nice.  Dispensing the shampoo is easy and the conditioner is perfect for my dry ends without weighing my hair down.  my hair is platinum-white and these products are working fine!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: I have never loved a shampoo so much!
Review: Since I started my Curly Girl journey 3 years ago I have struggle to find the right products. This is the first shampoo that does exactly what I need. It gets my hair so clean without leaving it feeling course and stripped. It just feels really clean but soft. I was hooked after the first use and it just keeps getting better. My hair and scalp feel clean and buildup/residues are no longer an issue. My hair is super shiney, has more body and less frizz and my conditioners and styling products seem to work better now that my hair is so clean. I get way better results on wash day and can go 4-5 days between washes just refreshing my hair daily. I use both the rose fragrance and the aloe and I love them both. This is an awesome much needed product!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: At first I was skeptical
Review: At first I thought this would be another hair fail. I have 4C hair, and there are so many products that promise to be compatible that aren't, all they do is dry you hair out, and sit on top of it making it gritty and harder to manage. Even the smell, I have really sensitive skin so the fact that is has a fragrance scared me even more, but to my pleasant surprise, the shampoo left my hair feeling clean, light, moisturized, and smelling amazing.I wash with the shampoo, then condition with the "Carol's Daughter Detangling Jelly-to-Cream Conditioner With Glycerin and Rose Water, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair Paraben Free for Moisture, Hydration, and Shine, Curl Conditioner"I leave the conditioner in for 30 minutes with a plastic cap, rinse it out.Then massage in about 2 tablespoons of the "Curly Hair Products by Carol's Daughter, Coco Creme Coil Enhancing Moisture Butter For Very Dry Hair, with Coconut Oil and Mango Butter, Paraben Free and Silicone Free Butter for Curly Hair"."Then massage in about a tablespoon of the "Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Scalp Oil and Hair Oil Deep Treatment with Castor Oil, 7 Oil Blend and Black Seed Oil, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Hair Oil for Natural Hair", then let it air dry, and voila!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Perfect if you have to wash your hair everyday
Review: I workout everyday, and I can't get away without washing my hair. My hair is very dry. I live this because I can literally apply the watery shampoo directly to my scalp from the bottle. (Do not try and put this on your hand and then put it in your hair, it's too thin.) I can give my scalp a scrub and then just rinse it through my hair. I don't notice the shampoo being moisturizing, but I'm using it on my scalp so I don't need it to be. I love the scent, it doesn't hang around long after you wash your hair, even if you use the corresponding conditioner.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Great buy
Review: So after reading some of the reviews I was a bit scared to try it thinking it would strip my hair of the oils but I was pleasantly surprised how well it worked. Now I will say after I washed out the shampoo it was a little dry and I mean just a little and not enough to where you would have to add a ton of oil back to it but once I used the conditioner it was super soft! And to detangle was less of a hassle. I didn’t have to comb out too many knots. It was my first time using but I will be using again for sure!

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: Great Product!!
Review: This shampoo is wonderful. I used Sheamoisture products for years as I lived in Los Angeles County which is really a desert. However, upon moving to the Mid-Atlantic I noticed that Sheamoisture products are a bit heavy for the Mid-Atlantic’s humid summers.  This shampoo is light, lathers well and rinses clean without stripping. It does not compromise my curls and has a very subtle rose scent.The matching conditioner is also excellent as it conditions without adding weight.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces

I will say I do not use it daily, but for an every three days or so deep clean, yes! Love it:)

Title: Absolutely AMAZING shampoo for anyone!
Review: I’m still in awe about this shampoo!  My hair has never been so soft and shiny until I tried this.The scent has a mild rose scent…not overwhelming.  I will never use regular shampoo again…this is my forever go-to.

Product: Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight Water-to-Foam Sulfate Free Vegan Shampoo with Rose Water and Micellar Technology, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Best for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fluid ounces
Title: I’m sold!!!
Review: Okay…so I saw a few people use the aloe one on social media and thought it looked interesting so I searched for it on Amazon. I had no idea they even had a Rose scented one. After reading on both the rose and aloe ones I decided to go ahead and try the rose since I absolutely love how roses smell. I washed my hair this morning using only the rose wash and nothing else. Whenever I try a new shampoo I use ONLY that shampoo so that I can truly see how it performs with my hair. Y’all…..between the luxurious rose scent, the nozzle tip making it easy to put directly on your scalp, the easy foam up lather, how light it felt on my hair and how easy it rinsed out…it felt I was getting my hair shampooed in a field in Italy on a warm summer day while my dog was napping next to my feet! Yes! I was THAT impressed! I normally use a clarifying shampoo followed by a moisturizing shampoo and I can honestly say that I’m 100% sure that this will only be the shampoo that I use from now on. My hair is only shoulder length but very thick and I have microlocs so it usually takes my hair 8 hours or longer to dry. Today it was dry after 2 hours. I was shocked but it also made sense because my other two shampoos were thick. Even when I diluted them it still too forever to wash out. Not this Wash Day Delight. It foamed up nicely and was light. I was hoping to keep this review short but I’m just so amazed at what I’ve seen with one wash of this. My hair is completely dry and it feels so good. It’s soft, smells amazing and my scalp doesn’t feel tight and dry. Also another thing I noticed…with any other shampoo, normal, clarifying or moisturizing, after I wash my hair is ALWAYS frizzy. Not today. That lets me know that my hair was not stripped and I’m loving it. No hot oil treatment needed. No conditioner needed. Just this one bottle. Some may be sensitive to the rose smell if smells bother you. But I love it! My whole house smells like roses now. Needless to say…I’m sold!!

Title: Bad product

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Returned conditioner the same day I received it...never again
Review: I have low porosity 4b/4c hair and while in the shower this conditioner worked well even though it has the consistency if vaseline. It was sleek and made my tight coils loosen and smooth out also a nice smell. BUT once out of the shower and once the steam cleared from my mirror I was in shock. My hair looked dull, dry, and frizzy and felt rough to the touch, the exact opposite of how it felt in the shower. This was the first time I had to reapply water to my hair after a shower to complete the "O" from the "L.O.C" system my hair was so dry. This was a lesson to me to read the ingredients before I purchase; the 1st ingredient is glycerin, 2nd ingredient is water, 3rd ingredient is alchohol...enough said.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: AWFUL

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: dude.
Review: Amazing...I have never used anything like this.  The smell washes out very subtle and does not bother my skin or migraine sensitivities which is awesome.  I would hate not being able to use this because it is a great product.  I really feel it detangled my hair and just completely transformed it without being a typical sort of conditioners.  Im im pressed.  PS...I have very curly naturally dreading fine hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Great product but recurrently leaks during shipping
Review: Love this.  I used to use Nexus Humectress which was bought out by a big conglomerate, had its formula changed, and was RUINED (I’m still mad).  I have protein-sensitive hair and this is basically pure glycerin (#1 ingredient even ahead of water) so it detangles and moisturizes GREAT without any buildup.  I searched and searched for something new after Nexus and this is it!!!!  I have long, blond, fine, wavy, low-porosity hair.  If you do too, then this is for you.  The scent is strong but attractive and not perfumy, and it dissipates quickly.  I love it.Amazon, however, can’t seem to figure out how to ship this, so I will occasionally get a container that leaks.  I may have to stop ordering and go buy local if they don’t get it together soon.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: When regular conditioner won't cut it
Review: This is an absolute game changer. Cannot believe I have went without this for so long I am so glad I got it and will 100% be buying again. Detangles my 3a/b hair effortlessly. Smells a little too green for my taste but I honestly don't care.. it works that well.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: A jar????
Review: okay I love this conditioner, but I do not have the type of shower that enables one to unscrew the top of a VERY large jar of conditioner, scoop it out, then screw the top back on and place it down.  This is the WORST possible container for a product you're trying to use in the shower, unless you're in a different tax bracket and have a huge spa shower with a HUGE ledge to put this damn thing back on to.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Truly a Wash Day Delight...
Review: I like the idea of a gel to cream conditioner. In my opinion, the fragrance of this conditioner is wonderful. However, some might find it a bit strong. It depends on how how your sense of smell is. I let  this conditioned sit in my hair for a few minutes and washed it out. I didn't have to wait 20 or 30 minutes for it to sit in my hair. I loved that! As I combed through my hair, I found that the slip was good!  My hair felt rejuvenated and moisturized like it had a  spa day. I loved seeing my defined (4A) curls afterwards. My hair was satisfied and I am too.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: No more tangles!
Review: I have very long 3/a/b/c hair. It gets very tangled even in a bun. I can’t believe I went all this time without this product. Probably because I didn’t care for the shampoo. My niece got the rose set but the scent was so overwhelming. I loved the conditioner tho so I decided to try this scent. It’s not as strong.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Mixed mama
Review: My son is 3 and we have yet to cut his hair. The curls are strong. This conditioner is PERFECT. I have tried it all and Carols Daughter brand is affordable and the most effective. I tried it all including dove and this lasts so long and creates a natural curl clean curl even if I haven’t been able to keep up with his hair for a couple of days!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Not for 4C hair. Not enough moisture
Review: Absolutely trash. It has a thick consistency, but it takes forever to penetrate the hair and once rinsed, it leaves hair feeling coated. Not enough moisture for 4C hair. The shampoo left my hair a tangled mess as well. Carol's daughter should have advertised this as a clarifying duo because it is much too harsh for drier hair textures.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Amazing results
Review: I purchased this conditioner to use for my first wash day after having my hair blow dried and flat ironed for about 2 weeks. my hair is natural with no relaxers or color dye. My hair is susceptible to heat damage very easily and I only straighten my hair about once a year. After deep conditioning with this amazing conditioner my curls have come back stronger than ever!! I am truly impressed with the quality, size, and cost.  It is definitely a unique and different texture than most conditioners, in my opinion it is a bit heavier, But I had no issue with is after i got used to it and especially after rinsing and seeing how much moister was retained in my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Good for hair loss
Review: My partner wanted a conditioner with aloe vera to help with balding. After 3 weeks of use they noticed more hair growth and healthier hair. They did not use any other products or change their hair care in any way other then using this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I don’t know if maybe I got a bad batch or what? But my experience with this Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner (Aloe) is nothing like what it says on the label. I followed the instructions exactly and I’m now sitting here writing this review with the waxiest hair of my life. I even spent extra time in the shower trying to rinse this stuff out and my hair is still coated with this thick wax-like film. I brushed my wet hair and pulled it back into a ponytail and my hair is like molded into place now. This stuff is unreal. I’m going to have to re-wash my hair to get it out and back to normal. This is so bizarre. Not at all what I was expecting from this conditioner. There’s no way this is how this product is supposed to perform. All I gotta say is buy with caution. Maybe just go for the shampoo and not the conditioner.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I found it confusing that the other reviews talked about shampoo--this is a conditioner, not a shampoo. I just wanted to make sure that anyone reading this would know. There is a companion product that is the shampoo that is intended to be used before this conditioner, but this is just the conditioner.That said (or clarified) I did enjoy using this. It has a nice, clean scent on the herbal side and while in the shower, it did glide through my hair and make it feel smoother. But once I got out of the shower and dried my hair, it wasn't as free from tangles or as soft as I had hoped. I have thinning, very dry and brittle hair so I had hoped this would help with some of that. It did--a little--and worked better than other conditioners I've tried, but it didn't prevent me from having to apply a bit of leave-in hair oil to really help with tangles, dryness, and lack of luster. Mind you, it helped and it helped a lot more than other conditioners I've tried, but it wasn't the total solution for me. I'm still using Moroccan hair oil so that I can comb out the tangles in my hair after washing it.So overall, it's a good conditioner. It smells nice and does help detangle hair in the shower, but in the end, I still need hair oil to give my old, brittle hair some shine and softness.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This detangling conditioner is a decent value for the money because of the generous amount of product that comes in this large container. This moisturizing jelly is easy to apply and instantly softens hair and releases tangles. It makes my hair shinier and easier to comb and brush through. I like the crisp and invigorating scent of this. The scent reminds me of a botanical rainforest. I like that this contains aloe foe its moisturizing and nourishing benefits.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I've tried at least a few of Carol's Daughter products before and they've all been so great that we have continuously returned as purchasing customers since trying them. My daughter is mixed and I find this line to be the best for her. Another popular brand ends up drying her hair out even more. That's not the case with Carol's Daughter. This product included. I was still doubtful, before the product arrived, because the other brand I mentioned has a jelly-type curl product that was a no-go and I thought this might be like that. It's not. It's so great. The texture is so nice and works into her hair really well. Feels conditioning as it's sitting on her hair and is very helpful with combing and detangling her curls. Afterward her hair looks and feels hydrated. Leaves it shiny and healthy looking. Smells fresh, a little citrusy. Love it, another product that we will be buying on the regular now!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have a few products from Carol's daughter and some I love, others not so much. This Jelly to Cream conditioner is sadly one I am not a fan of. For one I am just not crazy about the fragrance. There is just something that I am not crazy about.The texture of it is different and takes some getting used to but I just didn't like how it felt in my hair even once it became more conditioner like. Once it was rinsed out my hair still felt a little weird to be honest and just felt like it had some residue on it. All in all not happy with this one and am going to pass on it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I was super excited to get this product because I was sure that it would do great on my hair. I have to say that I was disappointed in how it performed on my relaxed hair. I am transitioning and I noticed that it does great on my natural hair or regrow that. It softens and smells wonderful and moisturizes well. However my ends did not respond well to this conditioner as it still felt dry and stringy. It could be due to the nature of my relaxed hair being damaged beyond repair. The conditioner is pretty thick and changes from a gel to a cream as you rub it in your hands. It’s very thick. It may best benefit those that are truly natural with hair that’s already in healthy states.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: great conditioner
Review: i have straight hair but it’s always dry and sometimes it’ll get frizzy and i hate it. this helps more than regular conditioner and allows me to save some money because i end up using hair masks as conditioners sometimes and that’s costly! you get a lot so i like that but i’m not a fan of the packaging. i might move the product into a bottle that i can squeeze so i don’t get water inside the container when i need some. other than that the thicker texture makes it easier to get it all in your hair and not have to worry about it inconveniently sliding off and wasting product. i’ll be getting more for sure, it’s going to help me out a lot during the colder months.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have thin hair, and most conditioners that I try work just fine for me.  This product, Carol's Daughter Wash Day Delight jelly-to-cream conditioner has a strong organic smell, which I really didn't care for..  You need a lot of product for it to be effective, and I found that it did not condition my hair, nor did it help with detangling (quite the opposite).  It has glycerin, isopropyl alcohol, and a lot of other ingredients, most of which aren't that slippery or hydrating.  I also don't like having to dip my fingers into the container.  I've never disliked any conditioner as much as I did this one, and I can't recommend it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: I was a bit worried with it being a detangler because because my detangling products tend to have a watery consistency to aid in tangles but I love this stuff! Here are my main reasonings to why:-The smell is amazing! I wish I could describe it but it’s kind of like a sweet coconut flower scent.-The consistency is nice and holds good! It has the potential to keep the moisture locked in your curls if used correctly.-I like to use as a leave in as it gives my curls a beautiful definition-works good with my other curly hair products as well!I am very much interested in trying more from this collection.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I've read a bit about Carol's Daughter products but have not tried any until now.  I LOVE this.  It was a little strange to apply it to my hair but it really did work VERY well to get rid of the tangles.  It does not seem to be the most hydrating  - my hair feels like it has no product in it but my hair is really soft and touchable.  It is a little frizzy - I would add a styling product to cut down on the frizziness but I normally use a product to style after my shower.The amount of time it saved in the shower, and the amount of breakage it prevented makes it hugely worth it.  2 thumbs up

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I'm a 3b and my hair gets super dry, so normally I love a good leave in conditioner, but I was not loving this stuff. I've used Carol's Daughter stuff before, most of it I've liked well enough, so while I was excited to try this, I was completely underwhelmed. I found it to be too thick, more like petroleum jelly, and my hair did not react well to it either. I tried a couple times, following the instructions, just to be sure I was doing it right and giving it a fair chance, but this ended up drying out my hair, made it a bit rough, and it really isn't for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Really Amazing
Review: I damaged my hair by using an awful shampoo/conditioner. I had been waiting to try this until I finished that off but my hair was getting worse. Within two days of using my hair was back to normal - soft, tangle free, shiny, and well moisturized. The consistency of this product is different but really so much better than traditional conditioner. It’s thick like petroleum jelly but not greasy. It glides over every single strand and cover it so well! It smells amazing too! I’m fully converted to this conditioner and highly recommended it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The conditioner is a nice texture with lots of slip and detangles well. I rinsed it, but after I blow dried it left a sticky residue; the stickiness went away after straightening but I’m use to a softer texture. It left it super shiny... the pic is my hair after washing with no product added.Though I like the sheen, I prefer a lighter, soft, more fluffy texture so I won’t use again for straightened styling. I will use again for my daughter’s hair.  She wears her hair in a naturally curly state.It smells very good!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am a big fan of Carol's daughter products, and I have never seen anything like this jelly to conditioner before so I really wanted to try it.  The smell is very good I love the smell of their haircare products and it went on really easy, I kept it in for about 20 mins then washed it out, it came out good and it left my hair feeling soft and light which I was pleased with.  The jar of this is huge so it will last for a very long time which I am happy about, I will be using this often.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Works well
Review: I like this jelly-to-cream conditioner. I haven't tried anything like this before, so I was happy I could try this out. The scent of this is pretty refreshing. I have been putting this in my hair about 2 times a week and I feel like my hair has slightly gotten better when it comes to tangles.  I feel like my hair does not tangle as much when it's dry after using this product, which is a huge plus for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Great for hair, bad for acne.
Review: It smells great, is as sheer and light as they advertise, it did make my hair feel more moisturized for a while post wash, and it did *slightly* better detangling than most other silicone free conditioners. The only bad part is that it has salicylic acid in it and it made my acne flare up. Some people's acne responds well to that, others like me, it makes our acne worse. I work too hard keeping my acne at bay to keep using this product :(

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Miracle Conditioner- Finally!!
Review: This is the miracle I’ve been looking for! My daughter has 4b hair and more of it than 4 adults! It has changed our lives on wash day. It cut out wash day time in 1/2. We wash with the companion shampoo, which is so great because we can get to my daughter’s scalp with ease. I use quite a bit of the conditioner, well, because see above. How anyone could rate this product a 1 star is beyond me.  I have been waiting for a product like this for 11 years! Since my daughter was 1. Love love love!  Thank CD for finally making natural fros easier to manage. Especially for the little girls who have to endure hours of detangling comb outs. I will be buying a case of this stuff!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: My favorite shampoo ever!!!!!
Review: I have curly thick hair. It’s hard for me to get most shampoo down to my scalp. This bottle makes it a breeze and smells so good. It feels like a clarifying shampoo which is perfect for me. I use a lot of heavy conditioners and products to keep my frizz in check.I love this product!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This product works great in my daughter's hair. It works great to detangle her mixed, curly hair. It provides moisture and smells good. I have always loved this brand...and this product work great for my needs. It is a good value for the size of the bottle, results after use and price.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This conditioner is not moisturizing but it did have an okay level slip. It feels like if you have wavy hair, this would work perfect for you. The scent is too strong and not pleasant. When I applied this conditioner, it did give me slippage but not enough to be done at a quicker time. I still struggled with my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: 4 stars ⭐️ for this wash day delight conditioner by Carol’s Daughter. It works wonders on my hair when taking my braids down!! Comb slides right through my hair and removes tangles. Easy to use and smells great. Use after shampoo to assist with tangles. Rinse out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I am obsessed with this conditioner.  It is great to use to comb through hair and it smells good.  I was not entirely sold on the jelly to cream, but it is cool.  Another great CD product.  I will be buying this regularly for my girls' hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This works pretty well.  It smells nice and does a good job at keeping the curls intact without making them greasy or slimy.  It keeps the curls in untangled and bouncy all day. You don't have to use much.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Works exceptionally well. It goes on smooth and rinses out smooth. I cant get over how delicious this smells and the hair definitely feels softer and the tangles get removed easily ‘

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: good conditioner
Review: This conditioner feels really good on my hair. I have very thick and coarse hair. It leaves my hair feeling moisturized. It is easy to wash out. This is a great product for cowash days.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Love.
Review: I have oily hair and usually am not a fan of conditioners. I love this one. It’s so light and smells amazing. I use it on the ends of my medium length hair and then use the small bit left over on my hands for the top of my head. Did I mention the wonderful, clean scent?

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: dry and crunchy hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: This is one of my new Favorites!!
Review: I live this shampoo and conditioner!! It smells SO GOOD and the smell lingers!  It leaves your hair very soft!  I love the jelly to cream conditioner!! 😁

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: YES! For 4c
Review: It makes detangling a breeze and less damaging!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: The wetter your hair is the better this works
Review: Wow I wish we would have had a detangler like this backindaday I must’ve combed out a whole head of hair.  This product is fantastic!  Just be sure to have your hair soaking wet, the wetter the better then put it in on your hair rub it in and you will be finger combing your hair in minutes!  Then rinse it out!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: This product is winner!
Review: I was looking for a product that would be moisturizing as well as be able to detangle.  I’ve used on my hair and my sons and their hair came out so soft.  One of my sons has tiny twists in his hair and each time I used this product, I was able to come through his hair without him saying “ouch”.  The smell was an added bonus!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Silky Soft and Clean
Review: Coarse hair but what a difference after use. Got me sold on this and the Shampoo.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: This SAVED my Fly Paper Stuck Hair!!!!!!!!!!
Review: I am a white girl with thin, long hair - and somehow I managed to get an ENTIRE ROLL of sticky fly tape in my hair - right before work! I got in the shower, and OVER AND OVER washed, conditioned it, nothing was working, no amount of my regular conditioner and shampoo was working.Then, I reached into my jar and took a giant glop of this stuff after shampooing, and slathered it through every strand.OH.MY.GODMy hair is saved! I was so convinced I was going to have to cut it! Not my long hair 6 years in the making!Not sure what this product has in it, but the sticky fly stuff is gone, my hair is nice and moisturized!LOVE THIS STUFF!!!!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Leaves my hair tangle free and silky smooth! Five stars!
Review: I love everything about this product. From the scent to the price. It’s the nicest conditioner I’ve ever used!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Detangling Jelly-To-Cream Conditioner with Glycerin and Aloe, Paraben-Free for Moisture, Hydration and Shine, Moisturizing Conditioner for Curly Hair with Aloe, 20 Oz
Title: Dried out my sons curls
Review: This product did not cream up as advertised. It was mainly a gel form and actually made my sons hair feel dry, stripped, and especially dry on the ends.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not a Moisturizing Shampoo!
Review: I was really looking forward to getting this product according to all the reviews.  It was horrible!I didn't detect much of a scent at all.  The worst part was how drying it was .  As soon as I applied it to my hair and started to wash it out I knew I was in trouble.  It leaves your hair feeling Like straw.  Their conditioner does nothelp.  Nor does the leave in conditioner.  I had to get out of the shower and get ANOTHER  conditioner just to get some moisture back in my hair.Do not buy

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Super Gentle Shampoo
Review: All my life I have had moderately oily hair requiring daily shampooing.  Then after going through menopause my hair dried out to the point of losing its shine and luster. I suddenly no longer had to wash my hair everyday and found when I did wash it daily it made my hair even drier.  After tweaking my diet and using the Black Vanilla shampoo my hair has vastly improved and now has much of its old shine and luster back!  I really love this shampoo!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Works perfectly for different Hair types. Very rich and sulfate free
Review: My daughter and I both love this shampoo. She has thick black straight Asian hair and I have fine straight thin damaged blonde. It works perfectly for both of us!  It is rich,  smooth and sulfate free. We use the conditioner too.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Finally! A shampoo for my little girl!
Review: My daughter has coarse, thick hair with sulfate allergies and we have tried several shampoo brands with them either making her head itch or leaving it oily. This product does neither. It leaves her hair clean, tangle free (she no longer needs conditioner, so money saved! Bonus) and smelling great! I use Carol's Daughter Mirabelle Plum Sulfate-Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz which works well for my hair type. Great line of products!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: BROKEN PUMP BUT PRODUCT IS AMAZEBALLS
Review: My product was broken when I received it (the nozzle is snapped off, pics attached) BUT THIS ENTIRE LINE is amazing. I have curly, frizzy hair and I hate the scent of lemons and such that I have been finding in most curly hair products. This smell is like heaven in a bottle. The smell lasts between washes and I'm always complimented on it. My hair is not at all frizzy anymore and I will never use anything else. I just wish the bottle wasn't broken during shipping.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great for bleach ravaged hair
Review: I'm in the process of growing out my hair after a bleach damage DISASTER almost a year ago. My 2b/2c hair is extremely dry, coarse, damaged and brittle. Any sort of shampoo, even low poos and very mild surfactants, makes my hair feel like straw and turns it into a complete tangled mess.This shampoo is so good that I can run my fingers through my hair as I rinse it out, something I've never been able to do with shampoo. It's very thick like honey and lathers very well so a little goes a long way. I have long hair and I use maybe 2 pumps. My hair is wavy and I find this doesn't weigh it down at all, but my hair is also very thirsty and porous.This is the ONLY shampoo I will use between clarifying as it does not strip or tangle my hair and also effectively cleans it. It smells heavenly too. For those with coarse damaged hair I highly reccomend adding the hair oil to your routine as well.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good Shampoo  for little price !
Review: This shampoo  is quite nice , has a pleasant smell and leaves my soft and shiny . I am not a black woman and also not young -74 to be exact , but this is now my favorite shampoo !  I just wish it came in a larger size , say a 32oz. bottle . I go through it very fast as I shampoo everyday , so this little bottle doesn't last long . My only complaint is like the other customers have said , the pump is inferior . I had to to take the pump dispenser out of the bottle and shake it into my palm to get out the shampoo which was difficult because it it quite thick . That's a pain . If the dispenser problem could be remedied and put it in a bigger bottle I would be over the moon !

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: It's ok
Review: It's not a bad shampoo by any means. If you like the scent this just might be the stuff for you. For me, it was a little difficult to get the pump working. I think I would prefer a regular pour cap top. It doesn't lather that heavily, and yes, I know, this is not any indication of how well it works. It is just that if you grew up with very lathery shampoo this might take some getting used to, I am not fond of the scent, which feels too thick and too heavy to me. After washing my hair it felt ok, as in: not bad. After my hair had fully dried, however, and I took a brush to my head, my hair turned out to feel silky and smooth like a very expensive coat. I like that alright. But probably not well enough to put up with the packaging and the smell. Earlier this year I reviewed another strongly perfumed vanilla scented shampoo, and for what it's worth, if I were going to over look the scent I would probably go back for that one. Or just buy a different high quality shampoo that is unscented, or has a less overpowering scent.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: A scent that lasts
Review: This is the thickest shampoo. it's almost like a gel, and I was glad it came with a pump top, instead of the squeeze type. You can smell it as soon as it comes out of the bottle, and if you like vanilla scent, you'll like this.Next came the lather. A little bit goes a long way! I'm used to needing a lot more shampoo (I have long hair), but what I normally use was more than enough on my first use. I learned I didn't need as much from then on.I can smell this shampoo even after I've rinsed, and dried my hair. I can smell it for a few hours afterwards too.As a shampoo, it lathers great, moisturizes better than most, and leaves my hair smelling good.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not as good as other CD products
Review: I enjoy several other Carol’s Daughter products, including the Curl Refresher Spray and Curl Defining Butter/Cream, so I had high hopes for this shampoo. The only thing it has going for it though, is it smells delicious.I usually prefer a squeeze/pour bottle to a pump, and this pump doesn’t even operate easily. It operates kind of tightly. Not a lot comes out each pump, so my fairly short hair takes at least 6 (difficult) pumps. I doubt I’ll even use the whole bottle because the pump issue is going to get annoying real fast. It’s also not nearly as moisturizing as Suave Moroccan Infusion, which costs 1/3 as much as this.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for me...
Review: I’m pretty middle of the line when it comes to shampoos, I only wash my hair once a week so I’m typically not too choosy. This product, however, didn’t do much for me. First off, the pump was broken, and then after a few weeks of use I got some dandruff (which is completely unusual for me, and this was the only new hair product I had been using). After I stopped using this the dandruff went away. Maybe this works for others, but for me it’s a no. (By the way I have course, color treated, long hair).

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Awesome - the best! Packaging could use help though :)
Review: Product is great! My hair and scalp are in so much better condition with this brand! No more flaky residue left behind, and my scalp doesn’t itch anymore. I love the scent as well.I took 1 star off because of the packaging. I keep getting shipments where it leaked some during shipping. It’s just enough to get the bag yucky (but smelling great, haha). However this one was packaged so poorly the pump broke during shipment. I’ll just reuse the pump from my previous bottle. But it’s frustrating that the bottle is just thrown into the box with other items. Not like the delivery guy/gal is really careful with the box either, lol! Perhaps it’s better to order this separately, and hold off on the other things I probably don’t need anyway, lol!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells great and is deeply moisturizing
Review: Smells great and is deeply moisturizing. I started using this shampoo with the black vanilla conditioner and my curls are really responding well. I have between a 2C and 3A curl and this shampoo is cleansing and does not dry out my hair in the least. I absolutely cannot get over how nice the smell is though- every shower feels like a spa day

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Great Cleansing Shampoo
Review: After one wash this shampoo had my hair feeling lighter and less greasy. It was like it had stripped my hair of all the crap built up from cheap products I've used. It also smells amazing. I look forward to trying out other Carol's Daughter products.Only complaint I have (which isn't a big deal at all) is that I had a hard time getting the dispenser pump to work at first.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Not for children
Review: I do not recommend this product for children. My daughter is half black and mexican almost 5 years old and I used this product for two weeks and it dried her hair out. Dried out the ends. I had to purchase another product to restore her hair.  Maybe it should only be for adults.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Good Shampoo for Locs
Review: I use this diluted on my locs and it's wonderful. No build up, no squeaky hair or scalp. Just clean locs, scalp and a very faint fragrance left on them. It isn't too harsh either. It does take a while to lather (loc'd hair is hard to lather in general) but it does it after a few passes. I love it and will buy again.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Dried my hair out
Review: This did not moisturize my hair at all it did make my hair curler but I had to comb it out in the shower with water going through it and that was breaking my hair.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Haircare staple
Review: I try to use more natural/less chemical products when I can find really great ones, and this shampoo is the one thing I keep coming back to in the Black Vanilla line (tried the conditioner and detangler but wasn't a huge fan). My hair gets greasy with the wrong products, but this formula leaves it feeling completely clean but soft and not stripped of its moisture. One thing to note -- it doesn't lather as much as a shampoo with sulfates, so you may have to use a little more than usual for long hair like mine (or mix it with a conventional shampoo if you like the sudsy feeling). It really does leave your hair feeling hydrated and is one of the only shampoos that gives me noticeable shine.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Perfect!
Review: I noticed my hair was falling out a lot in February--due to stress. I started taking collagen and pairing it with this shampoo/conditioner and noticed my hair started to fall out less and less. I didn't purchase this shampoo set until March so within 1 month my hair has drastically changed. I got rid of all the shampoos and soaps that have all those unnecessary chemicals and will only use shampoos like this! I also saw you can purchase this in Target!

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Awesome shampoo!
Review: I love how his makes my hair feel and smell. It gives of just the perfect hint of vanilla to make my hair smell amazing.  It makes my hair soft and easier to brush through and is moisturizing without leaving my hair greasy. Myself and my teenage daughter both use it and love it. Will purchase again!

Title: Irritates my scalp

Perhaps the fragrance causes irritation. I am not sure. It is really a pity because I love the vanilla smell, part of what attracted me to the line, and the fact that is a curly girl approved line.

I try to use it sparingly, though because I'm usually pretty frugal and don't spend this much on a bottle of shampoo but it's definitely worth the treat.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: I really wanted to like this. I have thick
Review: I really wanted to like this. I have thick, coarse, 2a-2b curly hair that I am finally wearing naturally (instead of straightening it) and wanted this shampoo since it is sulfate free. I'm not sure if I got a messed up bottle, but the product I received was ridiculously thick and sticky, almost like molasses. As such, I could not get it to permeate the top layer of my hair. I had to use about 15 pumps to get my hair even halfway clean (it was still oily afterward, probably because I couldn't stand trying to make this syrup shampoo work and gave up). I even tried mixing water into the shampoo, and it was still sticky.I know several other reviewers mentioned that their bottles were opened, and mine was too. The shampoo leaked in the shipping box (which had other items in it as well). Not sure why this is such a prevalent issue with this product.As far as the smell (another issue in many other reviews), I liked it, but can understand why others didn't. The scent is kind of overpowering (the other items that shipped in that box still smell like this!), and very vanilla-y, so if you don't really like the smell of vanilla, don't buy this.Overall, I can't recommend this product. Like I said, this may have been a bad batch or something. If every bottle was like the one I received, I'd find it difficult to believe this product had good reviews.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Smells good and that's it
Review: I ordered this shampoo and conditioner as an alternative to sulfate containing shampoos that I suspected were causing my hair to thin. After using the product for about 3 weeks I noticed my scalp was feeling dry and tight. I used it on my daughter too and noticed that she has been itching the back of her head so much she started to break the skin. After about 2 minutes of internet research I found out that while the shampoo says it does not contain sulfates, it contains other ingredients that act in the same way. Before switching, mind you, I was not having a reaction to other shampoos, just though a sulfate free shampoo would be better, healthier choice (less chemicals) for me. Of course, I end up having a reaction.  That is extremely disappointing to me and the main reason I will discontinue the use of these products. I gave 1 star because it does smell good, but that's it. It didn't do anything miraculous for my hair and definitely didn't do my scalp any favors.

Product: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture and Shine Sulfate Free Shampoo For Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe and Rose, Paraben Free Shampoo, 12 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
Title: Works Great on Multiple Hair Types, but Varies with Water Type
Review: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla smells amazing and works great on different hair textures, keeping both my and my husband's (different hair types, curly multi-ethnic and curly caucasian) hair healthy. It is also gentle on my sensitive skin. It lasts awhile because don't need to use a lot when shampooing. I did not think I'd find a budget-friendly shampoo that is sulfate-free and good for my curly hair, and I never thought I'd care enough to have a "favorite" shampoo--Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla has become my favorite shampoo.Update: I still like Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla, but unfortunately it does not work as well with the high iron city water where I live now. I still use it when I am visiting somewhere else. Also, maybe I am more use to it now, but I don't think it smells as amazing as I first thought. I am dropping it one star since I can't use it with my current water and the scent is now subtle.

Title: Didn’t work for me

Title: My hair LOVES it!
Review: I discovered this shampoo when it was on sale at Target! I have very long hair which is a problem as long hair takes special care to keep it looking good. I have been paying huge money for Paul Mitchell Ginger shampoo that is sulfate free. I love Paul Mitchell, but let's face it, it is very expensive. I have tried MANY shampoos that are sulfate free and they all made my hair feel very heavy and look greasy within a day. This shampoo works just as well on my hair and scalp as my beloved Paul Mitchell shampoo and I love it. My hair is very soft and manageable. I also use the conditioner on the lower half of my hair (that is the part that always needs conditioning when your hair is long) and I love that as well.

Title: Smells good, not mixed
Review: My bottle arrived with a good deal of sediment at the bottom of the container. I tried shaking the bottle, but it wouldn't mix. It was very dark and sticky, so i did not use it on my hair. Once I got it out, the remaining shampoo was wonderful.I have thick and wavy Caucasian hair, and since switching to this shampoo and conditioner, my hair is growing faster than it breaks off at the ends. Even with frequent trims, I have brittle hair - these products leave my hair smelling good and it seems to strengthen it as well.

Thank you so much, I wish I had known about this earlier!

Title: happy shampooer!
Review: I've been loving using this shampoo. It smells delightful, although the smell doesn't linger heavily like the other reviewers said (which disappointed me, since I love vanilla!). That being said, this is the first time I've used a non-sulfate shampoo, and I love what it's done for my hair. It's much shinier and smoother now right after a wash, whereas before my hair would be puffy and frizzy after a shampoo. I think the gentle nature of this shampoo has made my hair healthier. I also love the pump feature (so much easier to get your shampoo out) and I love that it still foams up, even though I've read non-sulfate shampoos normally don't. I've had this bottle for over a month now and I easily still have 4/5 left to use, so I think it'll last me a good while (although I do only shampoo my hair every 2 or 3 days).
