Review: At first I was leery at spending $18 for a shampoo and $20 for a conditioner that might not work. I also have always thought this brand to be aimed more to African American women. But the sales lady at Sephora convinced me anyone with damaged hair would benefit from it.The Shampoo and Conditioner are pretty much the best hair products I have found in so many years.  I am from a mixed background (indigenous Indian/Caribbean/Spanish) so my hair is naturally frizzy curls, that the curls eventually fade and my hair is one giant puff ball and with years of the hot iron its now dry and brittle.  I saw a change instantly on the first try. I've been using it for a month now, and I see my hair has transformed. No more clumps of hair in the drain, I can run my hand through my hair and come up with no hair on the floor. Less breakage for sure and all around healthy shiny look. I am so happy with my hair now. Even when I don't use heat to straighten my hair, my curls are soft and bouncey, and need a little leave in conditioner to keep the style all day. I have People definitely noticed the change. I will keep buying until my hair resists its awesomeness. My only gripe is the selling price on here for $33! There's no way I am paying for that. Sephora.com has the conditioner for $20 and the shampoo for $18.  I have seen a crazy inflation all across amazon.com for this product.  The only reasonably priced item in this line is the hair mask, which runs at $29 on Sephora.com. But if you add the shipping, its about the same. If you have unmanageable frizzy dry unhappy hair, give this a shot. Just not from here :P

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Fabulous!
Review: I have thick, course hair that is damaged/dry ends (due to ombre style). My hair feels clean and smells great.The Conditioner is thick and goes a long way, I didn't find myself using very much, but my hair feels very hydrated and smooth.It helped seal down my fly away hairs, leave my usually fried looking bangs smooth and silky, and I see zero-frizz.So far, I'm very happy!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Good moisture for fine dry hair - and smells great!
Review: I would give this product five starts if it wasn't so pricey.I got a sample for the shampoo, conditioner and hair mask and fell in love with this line. When I ran out I decided to buy just the conditioner because its SO hard to find a conditioner that works for my hair (but I would get all of them if they cost a little less.)I have very fine straight hair. Last summer I thought my hair was boring so I decided to get a perm to make it wavy and super model-like. Well, the perm didn't exactly turn out that way and I regret the day I ever thought about doing it. Now my hair is super dry from the perm and from my everyday use o flat iron.This product leaves my hair silky without wearing it down. Plus, as others have mentioned, it smells soooo good, kind of like coconuts. Will definitely keep buying.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This Carol's Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner leaves my hair soft and easy to manage so I'm very pleased with it. My hair is usually on the dry side, dry hair is all over the place but after one treatment I see a big improvement!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Made my Scalp ITCH Like Crazy
Review: I purchased the CD Monoi Shampoo & Conditioner at the same time.  One or both immediately caused my scalp to itch to the point where I had to shampoo a few times with my previous shampoo to reduce the itching.  Also, my hair felt very dry afterward, and my comb didn't go through my hair smoothly after conditioning.  'Back to WEN I go.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: There's so much to like about this conditioner, excellent ingredients and performs well.  I just don't care for the fragrance smell which I find contrary to the spirit of healthy hair products.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: It feels nice and hydrates well overall though
Review: A very thick conditioner, this brand might be too heavy for many hair types. Even when I do tips only, it still seems to really weigh my hair down. It feels nice and hydrates well overall though.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Didn't like the scent
Review: I really like Carol's Daughter products and am using several but I couldn't get past the scent of this one.  It was too strong for me and I can't use it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Truly binds to the hair shaft (both smell and repair)
Review: Smells good and does what it says. My hair smells like this for a few days just from this conditioner and no added leave in (i.e. cd monoi oil serem or spray) also if you use a different shampoo and conditioner your next shampoo you will still smell this in your hair afterwards and ive also used the monoi conditioner and cowashed every few days after and the scent lasted thru 2 cowashes. I feel this shows how high quality this product is.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: One Star
Review: Not a good product. Customer service from company even worse. Stay away

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Great for dry hair!
Review: I find this way too heavy and rich for my fine hair that is prone to the "oilies", but on my daughter's super dry hair, it is AMAZING. We've tried all sorts of conditioners, leave-ins and oils. They all either don't moisturize enough or are too heavy. This conditioner moisturizes nicely, keeps her frizz under control and smells HEAVENLY. I can't stop smelling her hair after we condition it! We're trying to find this fragrance as a perfume as now!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Works great
Review: This is a new fave product of mine. It works wonderfully with Carol's Daughter Monoi Repairing Shampoo, and leaves my hair soft, shiny, and healthy. It is worth every dollar. I highly recommend it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Not pleased
Review: Does not work...  Will never try again!!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: AMAZING
Review: this stuff is AMAZING.... it smells sooooo good. i use the shampoo and conditioner and my hair feels so soft and manageable after using versus feeling dry and rough.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Five Stars
Review: Hair is soft and managable

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: monoi shampoo
Review: I love this product and happy I purchased it. On a scale 1-10.....I give it a 10. Carol's daughter is an amazing product. It does exactly what it says I will do.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Five Stars
Review: So good, damage free and smells divine!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Love this product!
Review: Great product for dry thirsty hair of all textures!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Good product, but has an annoying smell

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Its nice but definitely not worth the high price and time it takes to ship to Canada. Its not different than morrocon oil products.0

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Wonderful product! I highly recommend.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Monoi Repairing Conditioner with Monoi Oil, Bamboo Water and Pro Vitamin B5 for Strength and Less Breakage, 8.5 fl oz
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: C'est un très bon après shampoing qui tient ses promesses (cheveux moins cassants) rend les cheveux doux et structure mes boucles et l'odeur est à tomber.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: What’s up with these negative reviews!?!
Review: I can honestly promise you on my life that in my 13 years of searching for the perfect shampoo that I have never bothered to write a review until this one. This is the best shampoo I have ever tried—I really feel clean after my showers now and I do not see any build up, no matter how much I exercise or products I use. It is definitely water based, but you can tell the difference between this shampoo and the water. It actually feels soothing. It turns into foam immediately without you barely having to touch it, and it’s fun, too! Don’t get me started on the fragrance 😍 the highlight of my days is using this shampoo! Not to mention how it looks much shiner and my hair got its life back after 3 years of miserable greasiness and product buildup! Yes, I have tried every brand you can think of—Organic to drugstore to salon, but none ever worked as beautifully as this shampoo. I can go longer without shampooing now and just head for the conditioner instead. This is A. M.  A. Z.  I. N. G! I am definitely a forever customer now.EDIT: I completely forgot that it’s 2020, and everything requires a pic or no proof :p so I’ve attached a picture of myself on the 2nd day (I normally will have to put it up in a bun at this point). 3 weeks later, still so hyped about this shampoo!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Not for my hair
Review: I give this shampoo a 2 star because it was easy to use and it went directly to my scalp. Otherwise I didn't like it at all. It made my hair very dry and hard, it felt like all my moisture was stripped from my hair. I had to use a Shea Moisture conditioning treatment to add the moisture and softness back to my hair. I won't purchase this product again, but I will keep the bottle to add other shampoo in it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Awesome!
Review: I LOVE this product!! I hope it stays around forever because no other clarifying shampoos match it for me! It follows the curly girl method and it really takes care of build up. I was always asking my stylists how to clear my dandruff that I had for years, they would tell me that I didn’t have dandruff (and for some reason not explain build up). Finally I realized that the flakes I kept seeing might have been build up, so I looked into taking care of it. A head scrubber alone wasn’t working and neither were the clarifying shampoos. Just ONE use of this product and all of the flakes were gone. Some people complain about the liquid form, but that’s the best part for me because it can flow down my scalp and reach every section before I scrub to make it foam. The pointed nozzle makes it easy to control as well. Plus it smells amazing!! I would advise using a good conditioner afterwards, of course.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Stripping
Review: I love clarifying shampoos and I love that squeaky clean feeling. This however also made my hair feel very brittle and hard after using. I would of course follow up with conditioner+deep conditioner but I didn't like how it made my hair feel. It tangled my hair even though i started on detangled hair which was kind of weird for me. I usually use Tresemme Deep Cleanse but wanted to try something 'natural' and 'curly girl' approved. I wasted ten bucks. I used it once then used it to clean my oil applicator bottles then i gave it away. It's stripping to the point of making my hair feel like straw. Didn't like it. The scent is okay, kind of smells like Jasmine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Great as a pre-poo
Review: I needed to wash my hair but I didn't want the moisture stripped from my hair. I have waist length locs.  I tried this and I was pleasantly surprised. I liked the tip where I was able to apply the product on my scalp.  It took a few minutes to foam but keep in mind my hair was dirty.  I wouldn't use this alone, I followed up with a moisturizing and deep cleaning shampoo.  I used mainly on my scalp and not the rest of my hair.  My scalp didn't feel dry.  I will continue to use as a pre-poo.  Please note this has a scent.  The smell didn't bother me but if you're sensitive to smells I would pass on this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Great product!
Review: I have thick, curly hair that was lacking volume and shine lately. I figured I’d try a cleansing shampoo, because I probably had a good amount of build up. I decided on this one, and I am not sorry. My hair is shinier, curlier, and fuller than it has been in a very long time. Will purchase again, for sure.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: OMGG!!
Review: This shampoo is AMAZING!  I'm not even exaggerating.  It feels sooooo good on my scalp!  I think that's the best part in my opinion.  I love the fact that it doesn't take much.  I just put a few drops in certain spots on my head and it lathered completely and fully.  You can really feel the cleanliness.  It is true that it's not stripping away, and it's doing exactly what it says.  When I started my natural hair journey, 10 years ago, I started using Carol's Daughter products. Over the years, I had drifted away from Carol's Daughter, and went towards Cantu products.  BUT this shampoo alone is making me come back!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Tangled my hair really bad
Review: I am kinda shocked that someone wrote a positive review bashing the negative reviews when our reviews are absolutely valid..and to see it go to the top as if we are liars or something. I have natural hair, about 3c texture and I have never had my hair tangle in my life. This shampoo made my hair tangle and knot up sooooooooo bad. I have never experienced anything like this in my entire life. I wash my hair in sections, I did nothing different with this shampoo on my wash day but it tangled up my hair so bad I will never use it again. I thought I was going to have to cut my hair. My curls are very loose but this shampoo had me wondering if it killed my curls. Took me 2 weeks to get my curls back to normal. They were frizzy and dead after this. Detangling my hair felt almost impossible, I was very close to cutting my hair...

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Disappointing - Dried my hair out
Review: I only received the shampoo, not any conditioner, & after using the shampoo, I will not seek the conditioner.  The shampoo is thin & watery; it looks like diluted shampoo.  It smells like a combo of citrus & herbal.  The shampoo lathers up easily but your hair has to be soaking wet which for me takes a couple of minutes under the water.I used the shampoo twice as is, & it made my hair feel dry, stripped & coarse.  I added grapeseed oil, then  argan oil, which made the shampoo feel better in my hands but still left my hair very dry.  After 6 shampoos I've discontinued use, & chalked it up as a learning experience: I won't try this brand again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: it's ok
Review: First off I want to say that I love the bottle design since I only wash my roots. I also want to say the scent is amazing. It smells like a fresh herb garden or something I love it. What I do not love, it that my hair feels seriously dry after I wash. I wash once every 5 days and that includes conditioning. I have very thick hair and it is moderately wavy, and I have not had dryness before. I do not think this agrees with me or something which sucks because this stuff smells amazing. I will be gifting to my husband

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Not too drying & leaves my hair feeling soft!
Review: I am a 4b/4c natural with low porosity hair...I used to avoid shampooing my hair because it would always feels hard and super stripped of moisture. But cowashing doesn't do enough to help my scalp, and I can tell it has buildup because it feels itchy.  With that said, this product was a total game changer. I love that I can target my scalp without needing to wash my ends, and it leaves my hair feeling both clean AND surprisingly softer than before! I still can tell that I used a more "stripping" product, but it is way way way less drying than any shampoo or rinse I've tried before. Importantly, it does a really good job of cleansing my scalp - I can see all the buildup wash down the drain and I don't get that effect nearly as much with cowashing.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Where have u been all of my life
Review: I found this product through a chemist on YouTube that specializes in hair care and iam so happy that I did this shampoo cleanses not only the hair but the scalp I feel like my scalp has been awakened the applicator allows you to place the shampoo directly on the scalp it starts out as a liquid but once the water hits it it lathers into a shampoo the scent is amazing and  when u rinse your hair u will literally see the dirt from your scalp and hair be removed its light and refreshing on the scalp not to mention it soothes and I think thats due to the aloe in it and I think this has helped with hair growth for me as well because once I began using this I have noticed growth which was a very slow process previously but using this for the past two weeks I can honestly say iam seeing growth so definitely pick this up u won't regret it

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Best Shampoo I've Ever Used
Review: I have thin, straight, fine, oily hair. I struggled to go no-poo, finally giving up. This shampoo is heavenly and makes my hair soft, manageable and healthy without stripping. It smells amazing. I love the foaming aspect. It allows me to go 2 days without washing. I've washed my hair every day for my entire life! And now I don't have to. I can't imagine ever using anything else.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Frizzy, dry hair
Review: I really wanted to love this product. I've been searching for a replacement for DevaCurl's Micellar Cleanser. This isn't it. The only thing I like about it is the scent, which is fresh and subtle. Everything else, however, is a total bust. It's SO watery that it's impossible to control the amount used during application. After rinsing it out, my hair didn't exactly feel stripped, but it didn't feel silky like it does with similar products. After my hair dried, it turned into a frizzy, static-y mess. I'm on the second day after washing and my hair looks like a mess. I won't be using this again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Not bad but not for me
Review: Pros:It smells goodIngredients are better than most shampoosIts light weightCons:I don't like using the top applicator to apply to my scalp directly because I use considerably more shampoo than a traditional lather in my own handAlso it was very hard for me to get my fingers in my hair to try to work a lather on my scalp and because my hair is fragile it just created friction and added to the breakage I'm already seeing.Conclusion: this might be a good shampoo for someone that doesn't have fragile thin hair but I will not be repurchasing. I will keep it in hopes that once I get my hair in a better healthy state that I might be able to use it again but for now it's going to sit and collect dust.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: New Favorite Shampoo
Review: I have a lot of fine hair that gets fairly oily. I prefer sulfate-free shampoos because sulfates irritate & dry my scalp, but a lot of them don’t have much lather, have difficulty penetrating my hair, and don’t remove enough oil. This formula completely fixes all those issues! The watery consistency and pointed applicator goes right to the scalp, and gives a nice fresh feeling without being drying. I was struggling with some flakiness that was almost completely eliminated in one wash, and my hair stayed cleaner for longer (Oily by day 3 instead of day 2). It has a fresh, pleasant scent too.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Helped me with my protein overload!
Review: This stuff is amazing! If you're like me and are suffering from protein overload I highly recommend this clarifying cleanser.I watched a ton of videos, read tons of articles, Reddit posts on protein overload and they kept saying the same thing; YOU HAVE TO CLARIFY. Well the shampoo I had wasn't cutting it so I decided to give this one a go. At first it made a difference, but not enough to get my hair back to normal. I washed my hair with this every other day, but when that wasn't working, I decided to wash and rinse my hair TWICE in one shower and then do a thick moisturizing mask and that was when I saw the difference in my hair! This stuff did a great job of stripping it all off and my hair is curly and bouncy again :')Definitely recommend you wash twice a few times with a thick protein free moisturizing mask. You'll feel amazing!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I like to use clarifying shampoo about once a month to take off any shampoo and conditioner build-up that may accumulate.  This shampoo cleans my scalp and hair to "start all over".  It's strong and intense cleaning, so I wouldn't use it all the time.  I wish it wasn't quite so liquidy, because it is easy to waste a lot.  But, it does the trick, so I am happy with my purchase.  I like another drugstore stocked name brand micellar water clarifying shampoo too that is a thicker--so no waste, but have been unable to find it.  So, this is a perfectly acceptable back-up.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Micellar Shampoo And Gel Conditioner, Game changer!
Review: I love this stuff, it can be initially applied with no added water because it is a micellar water shampoo it lathers all on it’s own. Of course adding water is ideal, but not entirely necessary. Can be used standing up or even sitting in a chair! It’s not messy or runny at all and doesn’t drip. My daughter uses it as she’s learning to wash her own hair in the shower so it’s great for kids learning independence to use on their own. It’s way different and less messy than traditional shampoo. It does seem to have clarifying properties, so it’s not as moisturizing, but after using the Wash Day Delight conditioner which is a gel, my hair was moisturized with good slip. A very good leave in conditioner was needed afterward to maintain maximum moisture and I seal with oil. I love this set and I love the smell! Makes a great addition to your child’s personal care items because they aren’t creamy and drippy so the chances of shampoo and conditioner getting in their eyes is no worry at all. I will purchase again!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Great Clarifying Shampoo
Review: This product is a clarifying shampoo. It stripped everything off my hair and scalp and left it feeling  extremely clean. If you are looking for a moisturizing shampoo, especially for curly folks, this is not the product. The shampoo effectively removed buildup and left the hair feeling stripped. In order to add moisture again to my hair I used the Goddess Line conditioner. Overall, it did what I expected it to do and will repurchase again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Good product!
Review: Interesting product!! It’s the consistency of water and the spout is great for getting the product right onto the scalp! It foams up well but the magic happens when you rinse the product out! All of a sudden, it’s super soft and moisturizing through the length of your hair! Must be the micellar. I haven’t had any pimples on my scalp since using this product. Smells clean and crisp! I use this every 2-3 washes and it doesn’t dry my scalp out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Converted from Ouidad to this and never looked back.
Review: I love this product. I have to wash my hair everyday due to workouts. My hair is on the dry side, but when working out I sweat significantly. I LOVE that I can apply this to my roots scrub the roots and just rinse it out. My hair is leads dry over all. The smell is a light honeysuckle-ish. I generally hate all fragrance but this is light and beautiful. My daughters hair is also less dry with this. I have curly, she is a cross between curly and coily.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Smells great, leaves hair clean and soft!
Review: I've used this two times so far and I'm so impressed! Most clarifying shampoos leave your hair feeling like straw, just stripped of life directly after rinsing it out, but this shampoo was not like that at all! I could feel the hydration, right after rinsing it out and the lather is perfect! It smells mild, but sweet at the same time. After drying my hair, it was flowy, soft, and fluffy. It felt SO clean without being stripped. I foresee using this for a long time to come.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: It's the bomb yall.
Review: I love this stuff!!!!First off:  The scent is somewhat strong while washing hair.  However it doesnt induce migraines or cause itching for me as many fragrances usually do.  It also doesnt permeate and overtake your hair or entire bathroom as most others that contain so many hazardous chemicals.  This smell washes right out and leaves a very light pleasant scent that only someone close could smell.Also my hair and scalp health has improved since using this shampoo and conditioner.  It really is a delight and I use it about every three days.  It is different than anything I have ever used and I love it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Curls Beware— Nope. This ain’t It.
Review: This smelled amazing and did what the title says....... it foamed easily when applied to my wet hair/scalp. This shampoo however, did NOT make my hair feel clean. I shampooed about 6x. I’m a curl girl (3c/4a and shoulder/upper back length hair). This did not remove the oils on my scalp(Castor, Coconut etc). BUT, it definitely softened my hair. If that’s all you need, great. But Carol and her Daughter def let me down with this product. No, I will not buy this again, ever. And I wish I could send back the open and used bottle.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: First time use, updated review coming up
Review: I just received the shampoo and have honestly only been able to use it once so I don't feel this review will do justice, but for first time use I loved it! I recently started the processes of bringing my curls back from extreme heat damage and been trying new moisturizing products. Only thing about these products is that they are so hard to remove from hair that is why I decided to try this shampoo and as of now it worked wonders! The bottle is not that big but u only use very little and starts foaming so easily even before I start lathering it. I will do an updated review in a few weeks.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Really cleansed my hair from all of the product I use
Review: I found that this product really did a great job of actually cleaning all of the product out of my hair. I have very thick, naturally curly hair so I tend to use a lot of styling products to tame it. This product made my hair feel so clean and soft.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Do NOT use this every week if you have moisture retention problems
Review: It gets your hair so clean and the scent is amazing. I'm honestly waiting for wash day delight to come out with a leave in so my hair can smell like this all the time. It is a bit too drying for people that shampoo every week, which is not a problem for me since i only do that once a month. It gets your hair a bit TOO clean tho so i use it sparingly with my shampoo brush. It has adequate slip if you detangle with shampoo and can do it fast enough(do leave shampoo sitting in your hair for a long time please). You definitely have to deep condition after using this shampoo or your hair may get brittle over repeated uses. When i run out i probably will just use the bottle as an applicator bottle  because of the nozzle.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Perfect for SL Locs!
Review: I LOVE this for my locs. This leaves my locs with some sheen to it bc it is clear and doesn't deposit any residue on the locs. I also love the fragrance. I'm sensitive to smell and this one didn't bother me. I absolutely could not stand the rise water one. I gave it to mys sister and she likes it just as much as this one.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: My hair doesn't like it too much.
Review: This didn't work for my hair type. My scalp is oily and ends get dry. This product messes with curl pattern every time I use it. Its like my hair hates it. I am Hispanic with medium thick curly/wavy hair. Maybe this is good for other hair types but not mine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Helps dandruff and smells amazing!
Review: I love this stuff. I have dandruff and an itchy scalp and this stuff actually reduces it! It's not even labeled as a dandruff product, but it really does help! I think it's the aloe. It also smells amazing. It takes a while to lather up. I use a scalp brush so that definitely helps. It probably takes more product and time if you're using just your fingers. Anyways, just go for it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Easy to Use
Review: I'm a senior citizen with short, straight, gray hair that after years of coloring I found out was oily.This is fantastic.  It lathers quickly.  Hair gets very clean.Please don't think you have to have curly hair to use this product or brand.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Game changer!
Review: Reading the reviews I was not sure this would work but I was so wrong. I swim daily and teach swimming 3 days a week so my hair is very dry even in a cap.  I have 2C curls but if I lived in more humid climate would be much curlier.  This product removed chlorine film and my scalp has never felt better.  This is my new 1x a week treatment and would recommend to anyone.  My curls bounced up higher and my crown even has waves and body.  I didn’t need to use as much product as I would normally.  I have been a fan of the other products in this line for years but this just upped the game.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Great cleaning shampoo.
Review: This shampoo cleans your hair well. I have locs and it really gets out the surface dirt build-up. Love the smell and the lather. The only down side it cleans so well you must use a moisturizer to rehydrate your hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: really nice shampo
Review: i love carol's daughter products. i have super curly, thick 3B hair. i cowash most days and like to use micellar shampoo when i do wash my hair. this is very gentle, low suds and rinses out completely with minimal tangles. i was using a less expensive brand which did remove all the hair product but was too sudsy and hard to rinse out. i believe i have found my ideal shampoo. they 'd better not discontinue it!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: THIS IS IT
Review: I got the shampoo and conditioner and I am so happy I want to cry. For years my hair has been getting matted so easily and tangled. I’ve been using this for only 3 weeks and I have hardly had to brush my hair. The knots fall right out and my hair stays sooooo clean and soft for days. I will never use another shampoo and conditioner again.....wow

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Love everything but the fragrance!
Review: I have a nasty itchy, oily, painful, and flakey scalp - this washed away my worries and pain with two applications in one shower. I love everything about it except the fragrance :( please do away with it and it would be PERFECT!!!!! I will tolerate the smell if it works..

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: It's a no for me!!!
Review: I actually like the concept of this shampoo it was easier to wash my hair with. Although it completely dried it out. Also the smell is so overwhelming I had to wash my hair with a different brand shampoo to lessen the smell. And it's not like it's a good smell either it's like beauty supply store perfume. Taking this crap back asap

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Very unique shampoo.
Review: This shampoo is like washing with water that cleans. By this I mean it cleans, but when it comes out of the bottle, it's like water. I have never used a shampoo like this before. It also smells like nothing I have ever smelt before. It is a very different kind of shampoo. The bottom line is that it does clean hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: I Love it.
Review: I'm unsure how this product even works, much less how it gets SO FOAMY, with no sulfates. But I'm here for it. It smells like fresh aloe coming straight from the plant, and my hair feels super clean. I'm switching over from previously using monat, and just can't get over how much easier, quicker, and nicer this shampoo is to use!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Better than regular shampoo
Review: I purchased this at the suggestion of a Youtuber I follow. It arrived on time and as described. Using it is quite different from typical shampoo as it has a thinner consistency. Yet, despite the liquidity, it foams instantly and very well. After using it my scalp and hair feel very clean without losing moisture. I often use a scalp massager with it, but I don't think it's necessary to get the full effects.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Not for me.
Review: The packaging is pretty and it smells fine. My fine, 2C hair instantly becomes a tangled mess with this shampoo. I don’t think I’ve ever used a shampoo that made my hair feel so rough.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Not what I expected....
Review: I disliked the way my hair became hard and dread lock texture. I had to give a deep conditioning treatment in order to come through my hair. I did enjoy the scent and the lathering of the shampoo.  This product is terrible on the hair BUT SMELLS AMAZING AND LATHERS GREAT!!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Great Shampoo!
Review: I was super impressed with this shampoo.  I have very fine, wavy, Caucasian hair that is medium length.  Typical shampoos dry my ends out horribly.  This shampoo did not and my hair feels light and bouncy and not dry.  I did use a conditioner after the shampoo and then a leave in conditioner.  Would never be without this shampoo now!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: So many tangles :(
Review: This smells sooo good and that's why I'm very disappointed that I will probably never use it again. This shampoo is very clarifying, which  I knew before I bought it. It was actually the reason I bought it, it dried my hair out, which is not bad because its supposed to clarify, BUT the tangles I got afterwards were the worst. It took me hours to detangle my hair when it usually does not take that long. I had never seen my hair this tangled before. It did what it was supposed to, however im sure there are other clarifying cleanses out there that will do this job with less tangles.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Non drying
Review: This shampoo is amazing. I have frizzy blonde wavy/curly/ kinky hair and it’s a total pain. I use this on my wash days and it never leaves my hair feeling stripped but it feels clean. Other shampoos make my already hard-to-manage hair even more dry and unruly. The smell is fresh and clean and not overpowering.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Takes a lot to work
Review: Requires lots of product to create suds and feel saturated completely. I typically only apply at the roots and slip down my hair but that doesn’t work well with this clarifier. It requires lots of product to fully clean hair. I’m switching back to my previous clarifier.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Lightweight
Review: This shampoo is unique. Unlike many moisturizing shampoo, it doesn't weight your hair down, doesn't leave residue, but it doesn't dry down my hair either. Pairing with the hair mask it works well for my super long,  straight hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Lovin' the smell!
Review: I love this shampoo.  It leaves your hair clean, and without build up.  The smell is like some kind of citrus, and comes out watery but lathers up nice.  Leaves my hair light and not weighted down.  Definitely 5 stars for this one.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Could stop smelling my hair
Review: Smell lemony and leave your hair smelling so good and fresh. Not too perfume. Will definitely be buying again

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Cleans without Stripping Hair
Review: I have long,thick wavy hair.  As this is a very watery shampoo, I appreciate the squeeze bottle with nozzle.  This cleans well without stripping.  However, if I get some in my eyes- it does irritate/sting.  I use as a detox shampoo between co-washes.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Moisture level and ease of combing not what I expected
Review: It was okay but it did not create the ease and management Shown and spoken about for my son's hair. I have gotten a better result from less expensive basic products.Will try on mine and my daughters and see.....

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Worth a try!
Review: I liked the idea of it being a lightweight shampoo so it wouldnt cause build up on my already oily hair. It was more water based than gel like. My hairs long, thick, and needs washing every 2 days. I REALLY like the pointed cap. You run it along your scalp so youre not using more than needed but..it runs out faster than "normal" shampoo. Better for shorter hair or people with dry hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Ok but not enough slip or moisture.
Review: Not as much slip as I thought nor as moisturizing as I thought it would be. Pleasantly fragranced. Gave it to my daughter who has braided hair she doesn’t necessarily want to take out after the first week. She likes it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: It was ok
Review: It made my hair really dry. I liked the tip of the bottle because it was able to get to my scalp easier but other than that, it stripped all of my oils from my hair. As to where my hair was hard. I had to use a lot of conditioner to get my hair back moisturized. Being an African American, my hair needs moisture.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: very pleasant
Review: I love this product, I can't imagine not using it anymore. I have straight oily hair and I use this in between washes to target my oily roots without over-drying the lengths of my hair. The floral scent is gorgeous too.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Nice product
Review: Works differently, I am trying to get used to squirting the soap on my scalp instead of in my hands and not having loads of suds. Works pretty good cleaning my hair. Not very moisturizing.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Worth a try
Review: The one convenience I appreciate the most is that applying the shampoo directly to the scalp enables me to apply conditioner to my rest of my hair.  So, even though I dont find the product itself to be moisturizing it allows for moisturizing.  There is no significant scent or color. Also, I don't require as much product so it lasts longer than I expected.I'm  not sure if I will repurchase, but I'm glad to be trying it out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: ABSOLUTELY Amazing
Review: Money well spent! I never write reviews and just wow. I wish I took before and after pictures. I don't remember the last time my scalp was so clean. All of the build up (a mix of hair product and dandruff) just gone. I have literally been dealing with this for years. I am sooo happy! The fresh scent was a pleasant added bonus. Recommending this to everyone.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Buy this shampoo!
Review: Oh my gosh! This shampoo is amazing! I purchased for the bottle to refill because my hair is so thick that shampoo doesn’t get to my scalp. But I will continue to purchase. The smell, the way it cleans and suds. OMG!!!! Worth the $$$$

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: I Would Order This Again
Review: I can't remember the reason why I sent this back. There wasn't anything wrong with it. I would definitely buy it again when I run out of shampoo.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Great clean
Review: This definitely provides a great clean without stripping. I have loose curls and like this alot to remove and product as i use a lot of it. Smells good havent had a chance to use the conditioner

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Waste of money
Review: Made my hair hard and my scalp itch like crazy. This will be a on use only for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Love Love Love
Review: This shampoo is everything! from the scent, to the weightlessness its exactly what I was looking for in a shampoo for my 4C hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Love it!
Review: This is the best shampoo I've ever used.  I have long, extremely thick, wavy Mediterranean hair that always looks frizzy and coarse.  This made my hair soft, smooth and frizz free while getting rid of the grease on my scalp.  I follow up with Wella conditioner as usual, so the only change I made was the shampoo, it's excellent.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First Wash Water To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
Title: Love
